IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_MILOKU.NAME: Miroku Loincloth
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_MILOKU.EXPR: [Holy Brawler [Miroku]-Only Equipment] Max HP +56, AGI +3, PATK +10, CRIT +10, Stun Res +10, Charm Res +10, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_MILOKU.FLAVOR: Originally from Greed Dike, but now found across the world, this type of sash is worn by only the most experienced of holy brawlers. One of the ornamentations adorning it contains the powers of universal salvation of Miroku, which provides invaluable aid on the battlefield.

IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_FUDOU.NAME: Fudo Loincloth
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_FUDOU.EXPR: [Holy Brawler [Fudo]-Only Equipment] Max HP +60, AGI +3, PATK +16, CRIT +6, Stun Res +5, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_FUDOU.FLAVOR: Originally from Greed Dike, but now found across the world, this type of sash is worn by only the most experienced of holy brawlers. One of the ornamentations adorning it contains the immovable spirit of Fudo, which unleashes its true power in the face of adversity, swiftly reversing the course of battle.

IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_SENJYU.NAME: Senju Loincloth
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_SENJYU.EXPR: [Holy Brawler [Senju]-Only Equipment] Max HP +50, AGI +4, PATK +12, CRIT +8, Stun Res +5, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_SENJYU.FLAVOR: Originally from Greed Dike, but now found across the world, this type of sash is worn by only the most experienced of holy brawlers. One of the ornamentations adorning it contains the power of a being with a thousand hands, which makes it possible to overwhelm even the mightiest of armies.

IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_SYURA.NAME: Shura Loincloth
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_SYURA.EXPR: [Holy Brawler [Shura]-Only Equipment] Max HP +48, AGI +3, PATK +18, CRIT +6, Stun Res +5, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH_SYURA.FLAVOR: Originally from Greed Dike, but now found across the world, this type of sash is worn by only the most experienced of holy brawlers. One of the ornamentations adorning it contains the spirit of the war-god known as Shura, which rains down death and destruction upon foes.

IT_EQ_ZUKIN_KIRIN.NAME: Giraffe Hood
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_KIRIN.EXPR: [Ninja [Qilin]-Only Equipment] PATK +16, AGI +3, DEX +16, LUCK +6, Wind Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_KIRIN.FLAVOR: A hood with a forehead protector attached that is used by ninja to help them blend into the shadows. It allows the wearer to sense the presence of enemies by reading subtle changes in the air, helping his or her blade find its mark even in the dead of night. The incredible speed of the legendary Qilin enables the wearer to outrun any opponent.

IT_EQ_ZUKIN_GENBU.NAME: Black-Tortoise Hood
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_GENBU.EXPR: [Ninja [Black Tortoise]-Only Equipment] PATK +20, AGI +3, DEX +12, LUCK +6, Wind Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +16
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_GENBU.FLAVOR: A hood with a forehead protector attached that is used by ninja to help them blend into the shadows. It allows the wearer to sense the presence of enemies by reading subtle changes in the air, helping his or her blade find its mark even in the dead of night. The power of the Black Tortoise grants the wearer the stamina to walk for hundreds of miles without rest.

IT_EQ_ZUKIN_SUZAKU.NAME: Vermillion Bird Hood
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_SUZAKU.EXPR: [Ninja [Vermillion Bird]-Only Equipment] PATK +20, AGI +3, DEX +10, LUCK +12, Wind Res +1, Paralyze Res +12, Daze Res +12, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_SUZAKU.FLAVOR: A hood with a forehead protector attached that is used by ninja to help them blend into the shadows. It allows the wearer to sense the presence of enemies by reading subtle changes in the air, helping his or her blade find its mark even in the dead of night. The power imbued in it allows the wearer to jump to incredible heights, like the Vermilion Bird soaring through the heavens.

IT_EQ_ZUKIN_BYACO.NAME: White-Tiger Hood
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_BYACO.EXPR: [Ninja [White Tiger]-Only Equipment] PATK +22, AGI +3, DEX +12, LUCK +12, Wind Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_BYACO.FLAVOR: A hood with a forehead protector attached that is used by ninja to help them blend into the shadows. It allows the wearer to sense the presence of enemies by reading subtle changes in the air, helping his or her blade find its mark even in the dead of night. The power of the nimble White Tiger allows the wearer to dodge enemy blades with ease.

IT_EQ_ZUKIN_SEIRYU.NAME: Azure Dragon Hood
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_SEIRYU.EXPR: [Ninja [Azure Dragon]-Only Equipment] PATK +24, AGI +3, DEX +9, LUCK +6, Wind Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ZUKIN_SEIRYU.FLAVOR: A hood with a forehead protector attached that is used by ninja to help them blend into the shadows. It allows the wearer to sense the presence of enemies by reading subtle changes in the air, helping his or her blade find its mark even in the dead of night. The power of the ferocious Azure Dragon turns the wearer into a living weapon that massacres any and all foes.

IT_EQ_DRAGON_VRITRA.NAME: Vritra Sphere
IT_EQ_DRAGON_VRITRA.EXPR: [Dragon Cavalier [Vritra]-Only Equipment] Max HP +40, PATK +22, DEX +10, LUCK +6, Fire Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_DRAGON_VRITRA.FLAVOR: Only dragon cavaliers, a more powerful form of the dragon knight, are permitted to carry orbs such as this. They symbolize a bond with dragons, and this particular orb is said to bestow all the power of the dragon Vritra upon the bearer. Vritra's mighty, soaring wings make it possible to reach faraway lands.

IT_EQ_DRAGON_GARUDA.NAME: Garuda Sphere
IT_EQ_DRAGON_GARUDA.EXPR: [Dragon Cavalier [Garuda]-Only Equipment] Max HP +40, PATK +18, DEX +16, LUCK +6, Fire Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_DRAGON_GARUDA.FLAVOR: Only dragon cavaliers, a more powerful form of the dragon knight, are permitted to carry orbs such as this. They symbolize a bond with dragons, and this particular orb is said to bestow all the power of the dragon Garuda upon the bearer. Garuda's powerful  wings make it possible to soar high up to the heavens--high enough to touch the sun.

IT_EQ_DRAGON_RUDRA.NAME: Rudra Sphere
IT_EQ_DRAGON_RUDRA.EXPR: [Dragon Cavalier [Rudra]-Only Equipment] Max HP +40, PATK +14, DEX +9, LUCK +16, Fire Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +10
IT_EQ_DRAGON_RUDRA.FLAVOR: Only dragon cavaliers, a more powerful form of the dragon knight, are permitted to carry orbs such as this. They symbolize a bond with dragons, and this particular orb is said to bestow all the power of the dragon Rudra upon the bearer. Rudra's storm-bringing wings grant the bearer the power to annihilate anyone who brings harm to dragons

IT_EQ_SOUL_DENE_SEN.EXPR: Required in order for Deneb to change to the "Astrologer+" job type

IT_EQ_DENEB_GLOBE.NAME: Albireo Globe
IT_EQ_DENEB_GLOBE.EXPR: [Deneb/Astrologer+ Equipment] MATK +28, PATK +16, DEX +20, LUCK +24, AGI +6
IT_EQ_DENEB_GLOBE.FLAVOR: This globe is used by those who are able to tell fortunes by looking up at the stars in heaven. Inside it dwells the power of a beautiful star known as the jewel of the northern sky, which allows the bearer to see into the future. Deneb likes it because it suits her own style of fortune-telling perfectly.

IT_EQ_DENEB_DRESS.NAME: Albireo Dress
IT_EQ_DENEB_DRESS.EXPR: [Deneb/Astrologer+ Equipment] HP +30, MDEF +16, DEX +16, CRIT +12, Blind Res +8
IT_EQ_DENEB_DRESS.FLAVOR: This dress is worn by those who are able to tell fortunes by looking up at the stars in heaven. It is adorned with celestial stars, and allows the wearer to channel their power. Deneb wears it when she needs to ensure that her fortune-telling is as accurate as possible.

IT_EQ_DENEB_NECKLACE.NAME: Vega Necklace
IT_EQ_DENEB_NECKLACE.EXPR: [Deneb/Astrologer+ Equipment] HP +20, Max Jewels +16, PDEF +24, MDEF +30, MATK +8
IT_EQ_DENEB_NECKLACE.FLAVOR: This necklace is worn by those who are able to tell fortunes by looking up at the stars in heaven. It is set with star crystals that possess a unique gravitational power. Deneb apparently wears it at all times, as a protective charm.

IT_EQ_DENEB_BOOTS.NAME: Altair Boots
IT_EQ_DENEB_BOOTS.EXPR: [Deneb/Astrologer+ Equipment] Light Res +5, Dark Res +5, Petrify Res +24, Silence Res +8, Stop Res +8
IT_EQ_DENEB_BOOTS.FLAVOR: These boots are worn by those who are able to tell fortunes by looking up at the stars in heaven. They glitter beautifully when the light hits them, and the fabric used to make them is in fact interwoven with star crystals. These crystals possess a unique gravitational power that is said to grant the wearer incredible lightness of step.

IT_EQ_DENEB_SASH.NAME: Altair Sash
IT_EQ_DENEB_SASH.EXPR: [Deneb/Astrologer+ Equipment] MATK +20, LUCK +20, AGI +4, CRIT +16, Jewels Obtained +5
IT_EQ_DENEB_SASH.FLAVOR: This sash is worn by those who are able to tell fortunes by looking up at the stars in heaven. Its base material is made from star crystals that possess a unique gravitational power, and although it looks extremely light, it in fact feels incredibly heavy if held by anyone other than Deneb.

IT_EQ_DENEB_HAT.NAME: Albireo Hat
IT_EQ_DENEB_HAT.EXPR: [Deneb/Astrologer+ Equipment] AGI +3, Wind Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Stun Res +8
IT_EQ_DENEB_HAT.FLAVOR: This hat is worn by those who are able to tell fortunes by looking up at the stars in heaven. It is said to grant the wearer the power of a star known as the jewel of the northern sky, which makes it possible to sense the movements of the stars. Deneb the astrologer wears it at all times.

IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_SWORD.EXPR: [Holy Cavalier [Isaiah]-Only Equipment] Max HP +66, PDEF +18, LUCK +9, DEX +12, Light Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8, Slash Res +6
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_SWORD.FLAVOR: A meticulous reproduction of the armor said to have once been worn by a legendary holy knight. It offers excellent defensive ability, and is particularly strong against slashing attacks. When worn by one lacking the necessary strength and ability, however, it is worthless.

IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_LANCE.NAME: Armor of Porta
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_LANCE.EXPR: [Holy Cavalier [Porta]-Only Equipment] Max HP +66, PDEF +20, LUCK +9, DEX +6, Light Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8, Pierce Res +6
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_LANCE.FLAVOR: A meticulous reproduction of the armor said to have once been worn by a legendary holy knight. It offers excellent defensive ability, and is particularly strong against piercing attacks. When worn by one lacking the necessary strength and ability, however, it is worthless.

IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_BLOW.NAME: Armor of David
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_BLOW.EXPR: [Holy Cavalier [David]-Only Equipment] Max HP +78, PDEF +14, LUCK +9, DEX +6, Light Res +1, Charm Res +12, Sleep Res +12, Slow Res +12, Strike Res +6
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_BLOW.FLAVOR: A meticulous reproduction of the armor said to have once been worn by a legendary holy knight. It offers excellent defensive ability, and is particularly strong against striking attacks. When worn by one lacking the necessary strength and ability, however, it is worthless.

IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_MAGIC.NAME: Armor of Magi
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_MAGIC.EXPR: [Holy Cavalier [Magi]-Only Equipment] Max HP +66, PDEF +10, MDEF +16, LUCK +12, DEX +6, Light Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8, Magic Res +6
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_MAGIC.FLAVOR: A meticulous reproduction of the armor said to have once been worn by a legendary holy knight. It offers excellent defensive ability, and is particularly strong against magical attacks. When worn by one lacking the necessary strength and ability, however, it is worthless.

IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_WIDE_ATK.NAME: Ark Armor
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_WIDE_ATK.EXPR: [Holy Cavalier [Arch]-Only Equipment] Max HP +62, PDEF +12, MDEF +4, LUCK +9, DEX +6, Light Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_ANTI_WIDE_ATK.FLAVOR: A meticulous reproduction of the armor said to have once been worn by a legendary holy knight. As well as protecting the wearer, it allows guards against area attacks directed at surrounding allies. When worn by one lacking the necessary strength and ability, however, it is worthless.

IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_HEALING.NAME: Armor of Pieta
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_HEALING.EXPR: [Holy Cavalier [Pieta]-Only Equipment] Max HP +68, PDEF +10, MATK +10, LUCK +16, DEX +10, Light Res +3, Charm Res +12, Sleep Res +12, Slow Res +12
IT_EQ_GUA_TYPE_HEALING.FLAVOR: A meticulous reproduction of the armor said to have once been worn by a legendary holy knight. As well as offering excellent defensive ability, it is also said to grant support abilities. When worn by one lacking the necessary strength and ability, however, it is worthless.

IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_HEALING.NAME: Aid Flask
IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_HEALING.EXPR: [Professor [Aid]-Only Equipment] Max HP +12, DEX +20, LUCK +12, AGI +3, Paralyze Res +5, Poison Res +5, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_HEALING.FLAVOR: These handcrafted flasks are made from a powerful form of glass. They are filled with a variety of chemicals that bolster the subject's physical condition, which makes them suitable for use in a variety of situations. As a result they are extremely popular with professors who have mastered the "Aid" discipline.

IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_BUFF.NAME: Mud Flask
IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_BUFF.EXPR: [Professor [Mad]-Only Equipment] Max HP +30, DEX +16, LUCK +16, AGI +2, Paralyze Res +5, Poison Res +5, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_BUFF.FLAVOR: These handcrafted flasks are made from a powerful form of glass. They are filled with chemicals that boost the subject's innate abilities, making it possible to strengthen allies to their upper limits. As a result they are extremely popular with professors who have mastered the "Mad" discipline.

IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_POISON.NAME: Bio Flask
IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_POISON.EXPR: [Professor [Bio]-Only Equipment] DEX +20, LUCK +12, AGI +4, Paralyze Res +5, Poison Res +16, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_POISON.FLAVOR: These handcrafted flasks are made from a powerful form of glass. They are filled with chemicals that are extremely dangerous to living beings, and require a high degree of specialist knowledge to handle safely. As a result they are extremely popular with professors who have mastered the "Bio" discipline.

IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_CHARM.NAME: Honey Flask
IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_CHARM.EXPR: [Professor [Honey]-Only Equipment] DEX +18, LUCK +16, AGI +4, Paralyze Res +5, Poison Res +5, Charm Res +12, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_DOC_TYPE_CHARM.FLAVOR: These handcrafted flasks are made from a powerful form of glass. They are filled with chemicals that are extremely harmful to living beings, and require a high degree of specialist knowledge to handle safely. As a result they are extremely popular with professors who have mastered the "Honey" discipline.

IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_AVOID.NAME: Falcon Quiver
IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_AVOID.EXPR: [Ranger [Falcon]-Only Equipment] PATK +16, DEX +26, CRIT +12, AGI +4, Wind Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_AVOID.FLAVOR: This mystical quiver changes color according to how the light hits it. It is awarded to those who have mastered the way of the ranger. It is said that only those with the agility to escape any foe can use it, and to others the bearer appears to take on the form of a nimble falcon.

IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_MONS.NAME: Lupine Quiver
IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_MONS.EXPR: [Ranger [Lupus]-Only Equipment] PATK +24, DEX +28, CRIT +12, AGI +2, Wind Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_MONS.FLAVOR: This mystical quiver changes color according to how the light hits it. It is awarded to those who have mastered the way of the ranger. It is said that only those with the strength to capture any beast can use it, and to others the bearer appears to take on the form of a mighty wolf.

IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_JEWELDAMEGE.NAME: Serpent Quiver
IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_JEWELDAMEGE.EXPR: [Ranger [Serpent]-Only Equipment] PATK +18, DEX +32, CRIT +26, AGI +3, Wind Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_RAN_TYPE_JEWELDAMEGE.FLAVOR: This mystical quiver changes color according to how the light hits it. It is awarded to those who have mastered the way of the ranger. It is said that only those with the knowledge to outmaneuver any opponent can use it, and to others the bearer appears to take on the form of a cunning serpent.

IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_MONS.NAME: Beast's Gold Seal
IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_MONS.EXPR: [Martial Master [Beast-Destroyer]-Only Equipment] PATK +32, PDEF +30, Max HP +20, CRIT +16, AGI +3, Daze Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_MONS.FLAVOR: Golden stamps such as this are thought to have been presented to the retainers of a once-prosperous dynasty. This one would have been awarded in recognition of meritorious service in combat against beasts. Despite its small size, it is solid gold and fairly weighty, so it also makes an excellent paperweight.

IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_HUMAN.NAME: Survivor's Gold Seal
IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_HUMAN.EXPR: [Martial Master [Man-Breaker]-Only Equipment] PATK +24, PDEF +36, Max HP +18, CRIT +24, AGI +2, Daze Res +7, Charm Res +12, Sleep Res +12, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_HUMAN.FLAVOR: Golden stamps such as this are thought to have been presented to the retainers of a once-prosperous dynasty. This one would have been awarded in recognition of meritorious service in combat against human opponents. Despite its small size, it is solid gold and fairly weighty, so it also makes an excellent paperweight.

IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_MECHA.NAME: Dark Tinker's Gold Seal
IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_MECHA.EXPR: [Martial Master [Mech-Crusher]-Only Equipment] PATK +28, PDEF +30, Max HP +36, CRIT +16, AGI +2, Daze Res +12, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BLA_TYPE_TK_MECHA.FLAVOR: Golden stamps such as this are thought to have been presented to the retainers of a once-prosperous dynasty. This one would have been awarded in recognition of meritorious service in combat against machines. Despite its small size, it is solid gold and fairly weighty, so it also makes an excellent paperweight.

IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_MOVE.NAME: Espion Helmet
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_MOVE.EXPR: [Dark Cavalier [Espion]-Only Equipment] AGI +4, PATK +10, CRIT +9, Max HP +22, Dark Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +20
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_MOVE.FLAVOR: A helmet worn by soldiers who have been possessed by darkness. When worn it sharpens the mind and senses, boosting agility and evasive ability. The helm's design is modeled after a demon who once tried to plunge the world into darkness.

IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_ITIGEKI.NAME: Guernica Helmet
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_ITIGEKI.EXPR: [Dark Cavalier [Guernica]-Only Equipment] AGI +3, PATK +22, CRIT +12, Max HP +18, Dark Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_ITIGEKI.FLAVOR: A helmet worn by soldiers who have been possessed by darkness. When worn it sharpens the mind and senses, enhancing the wearer's ability to make incantations. The helm's design is modeled after a demon who once tried to plunge the world into darkness.

IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_RISKY.NAME: Faust Helmet
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_RISKY.EXPR: [Dark Cavalier [Faust]-Only Equipment] AGI +3, PATK +16, CRIT +9, Max HP +30, Dark Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_RISKY.FLAVOR: A helmet worn by soldiers who have been possessed by darkness. When worn it sharpens the mind and senses, enhancing the wearer's ability to sacrifice his or her own life force. The helm's design is modeled after a demon who once tried to plunge the world into darkness.

IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_DRAIN.NAME: Zeele Helmet
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_DRAIN.EXPR: [Dark Cavalier [Zeele]-Only Equipment] AGI +3, PATK +16, CRIT +9, Max HP +24, Dark Res +2, Charm Res +12, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_DRAIN.FLAVOR: A helmet worn by soldiers who have been possessed by darkness. When worn it sharpens the mind and senses, enhancing the wearer's ability to absorb power from others. The helm's design is modeled after a demon who once tried to plunge the world into darkness.

IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_ATTAK.NAME: Jaeger Helmet
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_ATTAK.EXPR: [Dark Cavalier [Jaeger]-Only Equipment] AGI +2, PATK +30, CRIT +12, Max HP +12, Dark Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BAA_TYPE_ATTAK.FLAVOR: A helmet worn by soldiers who have been possessed by darkness. When worn it sharpens the mind and senses, enhancing the wearer's ability to strike down multiple opponents. The helm's design is modeled after a demon who once tried to plunge the world into darkness.

IT_EQ_FATE_ASS.FLAVOR: The clothing worn by the nameless swordsman who was illegally summoned as an Assassin. Fitting combat attire for a master warrior--not only does it help boost attack power and agility, it also boosts resistance against Death Sentence.

IT_EQ_FATE_SABR.NAME: Saber Armor
IT_EQ_FATE_SABR.EXPR: PATK +30, PDEF +18, AGI +8, DEX +12, CRIT +10, Fire Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_SABR.FLAVOR: Armor worn during combat. It is materialized from the wearer's mana, and can be equipped and unequipped at will. Because of this, it cannot be used when the wearer's mana is depleted. It strengthens the user, boosting various attributes.

IT_EQ_FATE_ARCH.NAME: Archer Black Bow
IT_EQ_FATE_ARCH.EXPR: PATK +16, DEX +8, AGI +8, CRIT +5, Light Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_ARCH.FLAVOR: The black bow materialized by Zahar when transmuted as an Archer. It's very easy to use--so much so that Zahar could not believe it was the first time he had used it. It enhances the bearer's abilities as an Archer, boosting attack power and agility.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_ARCH.NAME: Archer Black Bow Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_ARCH.EXPR: Required in order to create: Archer Black Bow

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_ARCH.NAME: Archer Black Bow Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_ARCH.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Archer Black Bow Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_A.NAME: Archer Coat
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_A.EXPR: PATK +24, DEX +6, CRIT +4, Fire Res +2, Water Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_A.FLAVOR: Worn during combat, this coat offers protection against attacks from the outer world. Thought to have been made from the shroud of a holy man, when worn it is said to boost not only defensive ability but also a range of other attributes.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_EMIYA_A.NAME: Archer Coat Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_EMIYA_A.EXPR: Required in order to create: Archer Coat

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_EMIYA_A.NAME: Archer Coat Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_EMIYA_A.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Archer Coat Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_B.NAME: Archer Vest
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_B.EXPR: HP +5, PATK +18, PDEF +2, MDEF +2, Thunder Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_B.FLAVOR: This vest is made to be worn underneath an Archer Coat. It is designed to fit tightly around the muscles, ensuring maximum comfort even during intense movement. Simply donning it is said to boost the wearer's physical abilities.

IT_EQ_PIECE_FATE_EMIYA_B.NAME: Archer Vest Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_FATE_EMIYA_B.EXPR: Collect 10 of these to create: Archer Vest

IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_C.NAME: Archer Legwear
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_C.EXPR: AGI +6, DEX +5, LUCK +4, Light Res +2, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_FATE_EMIYA_C.FLAVOR: These jet-black pants are made to be worn underneath an Archer Coat. The legs are wrapped with numerous belt-shaped ornamentations, but rather than restricting movement these are in fact said to boost agility and dexterity.

IT_EQ_PIECE_FATE_EMIYA_C.NAME: Archer Legwear Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_FATE_EMIYA_C.EXPR: Collect 20 of these to create: Archer Legwear

IT_EQ_FATE_CAS.NAME: Caster Garment
IT_EQ_FATE_CAS.EXPR: MATK +28, MDEF +24, AGI +2, Dark Res +2, Light Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_CAS.FLAVOR: This orthodox magician's robe has a hood that covers the head. As well as being useful for those who like to avoid being identified, what makes this robe truly invaluable are its magic power and resistance-boosting properties.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_CAS.NAME: Caster Garment Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_CAS.EXPR: Required in order to create: Caster Garment

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_CAS.NAME: Caster Garment Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_CAS.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Caster Garment Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_BSKR.NAME: Berserker Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_BSKR.EXPR: HP +76, PATK +35, PDEF +30, MDEF +30, AGI +10, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_BSKR.FLAVOR: This waist armor is said to have been worn by a legendary hero who defeated myriad monsters, and even gods, in combat. Made from a fabric designed for maximum ease-of-movement, and a very tough ore, it provides ample protection for the lower body. When worn it boosts not only defense but also attack power.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_BSKR.NAME: Berserker Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_BSKR.EXPR: Required in order to create: Berserker Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_BSKR.NAME: Berserker Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_BSKR.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Berserker Outfit Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_RIDR.NAME: Rider Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_RIDR.EXPR: HP +15, PATK +9, DEX +7, AGI +6, Blind Res +7, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_RIDR.FLAVOR: These clothes are made from a flexible material that doesn't obstruct movement, making them ideal for agile and acrobatic hand-to-hand combat styles. When worn they allow the wearer to move more nimbly, and also boost resistance against blinding attacks.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_RIDR.NAME: Rider Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_RIDR.EXPR: Required in order to create: Rider Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_RIDR.NAME: Rider Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_RIDR.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Rider Outfit Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_LAN.NAME: Lancer Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_LAN.EXPR: HP +15, PATK +16, PDEF +10, DEX +8, AGI +8, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_LAN.FLAVOR: This blue combat gear is designed to stand up to the rapid and intense movements performed when using a lance in combat. It forms a one-piece suit, and is fitted with guards to protect the neck and shoulders. When worn it is said to shape itself to fit the wearer's body, boosting a range of different attributes.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_LAN.NAME: Lancer Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_LAN.EXPR: Required in order to create: Lancer Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_LAN.NAME: Lancer Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_LAN.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Lancer Outfit Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_TMAG.NAME: Rin's Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_TMAG.EXPR: HP +16, PATK +5, PDEF +16, MATK +18, AGI +2, Water Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_TMAG.FLAVOR: The color red is symbolic of Rin Tohsaka, and her clothes are naturally also this color. The chest area is adorned with a white, cross-like motif. They're cute, provide good ease-of-movement, and are said to boost attack power and agility.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_TMAG.NAME: Rin's Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_TMAG.EXPR: Required in order to create: Rin's Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_TMAG.NAME: Rin's Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_TMAG.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Rin's Outfit Diagram

IT_EQ_FATE_IMAG.NAME: Illya's Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_IMAG.EXPR: HP +7, MATK +25, MDEF +20, AGI +2, Fire Res +2, Thunder Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_IMAG.FLAVOR: With her beautiful silver hair and youthful appearance, and because she lives in the snowy mountains of Einzbern, Illya is known as the "snow fairy." This purple coat accentuates her pale, snow-like appearance. As well as, of course, offering protection against the cold, it also possesses magic circuit-boosting properties.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_IMAG.NAME: Illya's Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_IMAG.EXPR: Required in order to create: Illya's Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_IMAG.NAME: Illya's Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_IMAG.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Illya's Outfit Diagram

IT_AF_ARMS_EXCALIBUR.NAME: Excalibur Shard
IT_AF_ARMS_EXCALIBUR.EXPR: Collect 50 of these to create: Excalibur

IT_AF_ACCS_TOSAKA_PENDANT.NAME: Tohsaka's Pendant Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_TOSAKA_PENDANT.EXPR: Collect 50 of these to create: Tohsaka's Pendant

IT_AF_ACCS_IRIYA_BIRD.NAME: Storch Ritter Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_IRIYA_BIRD.EXPR: Collect 50 of these to create: Storch Ritter

IT_AF_ACCS_GILG_SWORD.NAME: Gate of Babylon Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_GILG_SWORD.EXPR: Collect 50 of these to create: Gate of Babylon

IT_AF_ARMS_KANSYOUBAKUYA.NAME: Kanshou and Bakuya Swords Shard
IT_AF_ARMS_KANSYOUBAKUYA.EXPR: Collect 150 of these to create: Kanshou and Bakuya Swords

IT_PI_GILGAMESH.NAME: Gilgamesh Soul Shard
IT_PI_GILGAMESH.EXPR: Required for Limit Breaks. If you collect enough Soul Shards, you can also transmute the corresponding unit.

IT_EQ_FATE_GOLD.NAME: Gilgamesh's Outfit
IT_EQ_FATE_GOLD.EXPR: PATK +10, DEX +8, AGI +6, LUCK +10, Jewels Obtained +6, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_FATE_GOLD.FLAVOR: The black-and-white jacket worn by the Hero King himself. It's simple in design, but is made of a luxurious and valuable material fitting of the Hero King. When worn it is said to boost the amount of Jewels obtained by the wearer.

IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_GOLD.NAME: Gilgamesh's Outfit Diagram
IT_EQ_DIAGRAM_FATE_GOLD.EXPR: Required in order to create: Gilgamesh's Outfit

IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_GOLD.NAME: Gilgamesh's Outfit Diagram Piece
IT_EQ_DIAGRAMPIECE_FATE_GOLD.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Gilgamesh's Outfit Diagram

IT_US_FATE_TAIYAKI.NAME: Taiyaki
IT_US_FATE_TAIYAKI.EXPR: Casts Quicken status on user for three turns.
IT_US_FATE_TAIYAKI.FLAVOR: A fish-shaped bean jam-filled snack sold at the "Edomae-ya" food stall found in the shopping district. Despite its low price, it's packed with bean jam right to the end of the tail, making it extremely popular among students. The pastry is soft and fluffy, and it's apparently still pretty tasty even when it's cooled down.

IT_US_FATE_SANDWICH.NAME: Rin's Sandwich
IT_US_FATE_SANDWICH.EXPR: Removes all statuses except Death Sentence and slightly recovers HP.
IT_US_FATE_SANDWICH.FLAVOR: A special sandwich made by Rin Tohsaka. She gets up early in the morning to make them, and they're certainly very special, with a delicious flavor that'll satisfy even the most discerning of gourmands.

IT_EV_ARCH01.NAME: Cleaning Tool
IT_EV_ARCH01.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Archer
IT_EV_ARCH01.FLAVOR: The tool used by Archer when he was given his first order by Rin Tohsaka after summoning him: to clean up her room. Archer did so reluctantly, but the next day the room was apparently astonishingly tidy...

IT_EV_ARCH02.NAME: Tea Set
IT_EV_ARCH02.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Archer
IT_EV_ARCH02.FLAVOR: The tea set used by Archer to prepare tea for Rin Tohsaka. Even Rin, his master, will admit how delicious the tea he makes is. Why Archer is so good at making tea is a total mystery, though...

IT_UG_APPLE_FATE.NAME: Mana Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_FATE.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_FATE.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with magical energy. This energy is passed onto the user, and lives on forever inside him or her. The apple has the power to improve the owner's fate, and is extremely rare and valuable.

IT_UG_APPLE_PUNK.NAME: Dulyn Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_PUNK.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_PUNK.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with memories of Dulyn's research. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. It looks like an apple fairy, but saying this out loud will cause it to become angry and indignant.

IT_UG_APPLE_SHINOBI.NAME: Trick Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_SHINOBI.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_SHINOBI.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with memories of the Land of Shinobi. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. It's mechanized, and can move autonomously--caution is advised, as if left unattended it may wander off by itself.

IT_US_POTION.NAME: Healing Potion
IT_US_POTION.EXPR: Medicine that recovers a unit's HP (small amount).
IT_US_POTION.FLAVOR: This bottle contains an elixir that is said to be able to instantly heal any wound. It is effective on not only humans, but also transmuted Phantoms. Due to its high potency, it is most commonly sold in small bottles of this size.

IT_US_HIGH_POTION.NAME: Strong Potion
IT_US_HIGH_POTION.EXPR: Medicine that recovers a unit's HP (medium amount).
IT_US_HIGH_POTION.FLAVOR: This bottle contains an elixir that is said to be able to instantly heal any wound. It is effective on not only humans, but also transmuted Phantoms. This larger-than-average dose is popular with adventurers embarking on lengthy journeys.

IT_US_EXTRA_POTION.NAME: Super Potion
IT_US_EXTRA_POTION.EXPR: Medicine that recovers a unit's HP (large amount).
IT_US_EXTRA_POTION.FLAVOR: This bottle contains an elixir that is said to be able to instantly heal any wound. It is effective on not only humans, but also transmuted Phantoms. This large bottle is quite pricey, but when traveling in dangerous areas a dose of this size could well prove to be a lifesaver.

IT_US_PANACEA.NAME: Panacea
IT_US_PANACEA.EXPR: Medicine that removes all statuses except Death Sentence.
IT_US_PANACEA.FLAVOR: This beautiful, rainbow-colored potion is made from a mix of several different elixirs. It lives up to its name, and is able to simultaneously cure a range of different ailments. Its taste, however, is quite unpalatable. It was first concocted by chance long ago, but its effectiveness means it is still a best seller to this day.

IT_US_POISON.NAME: Antidote
IT_US_POISON.FLAVOR: This elixir has been mixed with special ingredients extracted from a variety of sources, such as crystals and berries, imbuing it with additional properties. It will relieve Poison status, and despite its off-putting appearance, in fact has a pleasant, sweet flavor.

IT_US_ENERGY.NAME: Energy Potion
IT_US_ENERGY.EXPR: Medicine that removes Daze, Silence, and Bind statuses.
IT_US_ENERGY.FLAVOR: This elixir has been mixed with special ingredients extracted from a variety of sources, such as crystals and berries, imbuing it with additional properties. It will relieve Daze, Silence, and Bind statuses. Its striking green hue is reminiscent of young leaves, and it tastes like fresh grass.

IT_US_VITALITY.NAME: Vitality Potion
IT_US_VITALITY.FLAVOR: This elixir has been mixed with special ingredients extracted from a variety of sources, such as crystals and berries, imbuing it with additional properties. It will relieve stat reductions. It has an extremely spicy flavor that is at odds with its pastel pink hue.

IT_US_LIFE.NAME: Angel's Bell
IT_US_LIFE.EXPR: Medicine that removes Death Sentence status.
IT_US_LIFE.FLAVOR: Designed with an angelic motif, this bell emits a beautiful, gentle tone when rung. It was originally made in an area of Lustburg and sold as a protective amulet. The sound it makes is said to steer the bearer away from death.

IT_US_POWDER_POWER.NAME: Power Powder
IT_US_POWDER_POWER.FLAVOR: Made by extracting Alchemia from plants, this powder grants temporary enhancements to the body. The dosage size required varies depending on the type of powder, but each one has the same herb-like taste. This green powder only requires a small dose to work, and is able to activate dormant power within the body.

IT_US_POWDER_GUARD.NAME: Guard Powder
IT_US_POWDER_GUARD.FLAVOR: Made by extracting Alchemia from plants, this powder grants temporary enhancements to the body. The dosage size required varies depending on the type of powder, but each one has the same herb-like taste. This orange powder requires a fairly large dose to have any effect, but is able to boost the body's defensive properties.

IT_US_POWDER_HP.NAME: Vitality Powder
IT_US_POWDER_HP.FLAVOR: Made by extracting Alchemia from plants, this powder grants temporary enhancements to the body. The dosage size required varies depending on the type of powder, but each one has the same herb-like taste. This yellow powder requires the largest dose of all the different types, but is able to amplify the user's stamina.

IT_US_POWDER_SPEED.NAME: Speed Powder
IT_US_POWDER_SPEED.FLAVOR: Made by extracting Alchemia from plants, this powder grants temporary enhancements to the body. The dosage size required varies depending on the type of powder, but each one has the same herb-like taste. This blue powder only requires a small dose to work, and is able to boost the user's agility.

IT_US_SC_FIRE_Lv1.NAME: Scroll of Flames Lv1
IT_US_SC_FIRE_Lv1.EXPR: A scroll that invokes a Fire Lv1 magic attack.
IT_US_SC_FIRE_Lv1.FLAVOR: This scroll has been inscribed with an arcane spell, using ink with a high Alchemia concentration. Not only do such scrolls require a special ink, their authors must also possess a high level of ability, and in most lands they are created only in a handful of areas. When used, it creates a relatively small flame.

IT_PG_CLOVER1.NAME: Clover of Foresight
IT_PG_CLOVER1.FLAVOR: This magical plant increases reactivity with Alchemia. By using it together with a Philosopher's Stone, a lump of concentrated Alchemia, it is said to heighten the user's powers of perception in various ways. This green-colored leaf is only young, and its power is weak.

IT_PG_CLOVER2.NAME: Clover of Insight
IT_PG_CLOVER2.FLAVOR: This magical plant increases reactivity with Alchemia. By using it together with a Philosopher's Stone, a lump of concentrated Alchemia, it is said to heighten the user's powers of perception in various ways. This peach-colored leaf has matured, and possesses high reactive power.

IT_PG_CLOVER3.NAME: Clover of Omniscience
IT_PG_CLOVER3.FLAVOR: This magical plant increases reactivity with Alchemia. By using it together with a Philosopher's Stone, a lump of concentrated Alchemia, it is said to heighten the user's powers of perception in various ways. Gold-colored leaves such as this one are hard to find, and possess extremely high reactive power.

IT_UG_APPLE1.NAME: Apple of Experience
IT_UG_APPLE1.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (small amount).
IT_UG_APPLE1.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Green apples such as this are said to contain several years' worth of memories.

IT_UG_APPLE2.NAME: Apple of Skill
IT_UG_APPLE2.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (medium amount).
IT_UG_APPLE2.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Red apples such as this are said to contain several decades' worth of memories.

IT_UG_APPLE3.NAME: Apple of Accomplishment
IT_UG_APPLE3.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE3.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Golden apples such as this are said to contain an entire era's worth of memories, and are extremely valuable.

IT_UG_APPLE4.NAME: Forbidden Apple
IT_UG_APPLE4.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE4.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Rainbow-colored apples such as this are said to contain multiple eras' worth of memories, and are seldom seen at all.

IT_UG_APPLE5.NAME: Crystal Apple
IT_UG_APPLE5.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (huge amount).
IT_UG_APPLE5.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Crystal apples such as this are said to contain a near-infinite amount of memories, and are incredibly rare.

IT_UG_APPLE6.NAME: Apple of Memories
IT_UG_APPLE6.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).

IT_UG_APPLE_GRI.NAME: Metal Fiend Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_GRI.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_GRI.FLAVOR: This apple is said to have been the favorite food of a demon's son from a parallel world. The memories contained within it are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. It is dropped by Fiends, and is considered extremely valuable, as it is thought to contain the memories of a holy war spanning hundreds of years.

IT_UG_APPLE_MGOD.NAME: Metal God Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_MGOD.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_MGOD.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. It is dropped by Metal Gods, and is considered extremely valuable as it is thought to contain memories of unimaginable valor.

IT_UG_APPLE_ACORN.NAME: Acorny Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_ACORN.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's Exp (extra-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_ACORN.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers who attempted to conquer the Yggdrasil Labyrinth. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. It contains the knowledge and wisdom required to complete the maze, and is extremely valuable.

IT_UG_APPLE_80CP.NAME: [800K Celebration] Cryptic Apple
IT_UG_APPLE_80CP.EXPR: An apple that raises a unit's EXP (super-large amount).
IT_UG_APPLE_80CP.FLAVOR: This apple is said to be imbued with the memories of adventurers from around the world. These memories are inherited by the user, and live on forever inside him or her. Carried by a young girl, it possesses the power to see the future and is extremely rare.

Rainbow-colored apples such as this are said to contain multiple eras' worth of memories, and are seldom seen at all.

IT_SG_POT1.NAME: Bronze Alchemia Pot
IT_SG_POT1.EXPR: A pot that increases Enhancement Points by a small amount.
IT_SG_POT1.FLAVOR: This pot was created using Alchemy, and is filled with Alchemia particles. When opened, these particles are released, stimulating the target item's Alchemia. Once this process is complete, the item's alchemic properties will have slightly increased.

IT_SG_POT2.NAME: Silver Alchemia Pot
IT_SG_POT2.EXPR: A pot that increases Enhancement Points by a medium amount.
IT_SG_POT2.FLAVOR: This pot was created using Alchemy, and is filled with Alchemia particles. When opened, these particles are released, stimulating the target item's Alchemia. Once this process is complete, the item's alchemic properties will have increased.

IT_SG_POT3.NAME: Gold Alchemia Pot
IT_SG_POT3.EXPR: A pot that increases Enhancement Points by a large amount.
IT_SG_POT3.FLAVOR: This pot was created using Alchemy, and is filled with Alchemia particles. When opened, these particles are released, stimulating the target item's Alchemia. Once this process is complete, the item's alchemic properties will have significantly increased.

IT_CV_GOLD1.NAME: Bronze Ingot
IT_CV_GOLD1.EXPR: A lump of bronze that can be exchanged for 8000 Zeni.
IT_CV_GOLD1.FLAVOR: This ingot originates from one of the Alchemy mines that once existed around the world. The value of such ingots corresponds to how deep inside the Alchemy mine they were found. Many bronze ones such as this one would have been excavated from near the mine entrances.

IT_CV_GOLD2.NAME: Silver Ingot
IT_CV_GOLD2.EXPR: A lump of silver that can be exchanged for 20,000 Zeni.
IT_CV_GOLD2.FLAVOR: This ingot originates from one of the Alchemy mines that once existed around the world. The value of such ingots corresponds to how deep inside the Alchemy mine they were found. Many silver ones such as this one would have been excavated from halfway into the mines.

IT_CV_GOLD3.NAME: Gold Ingot
IT_CV_GOLD3.EXPR: A lump of gold that can be exchanged for 80,000 Zeni.
IT_CV_GOLD3.FLAVOR: This ingot originates from one of the Alchemy mines that once existed around the world. The value of such ingots corresponds to how deep inside the Alchemy mine they were found. Many gold ones such as this one would have been excavated from the innermost depths of the mines.

IT_CV_GOLD3_SPECIAL.NAME: Special Gold Ingot
IT_CV_GOLD3_SPECIAL.EXPR: A lump of gold that can be exchanged for 100,000,000 Zeni.
IT_CV_GOLD3_SPECIAL.FLAVOR: Special prize from the Countdown Lucky Draw.

IT_CV_GOLD4.NAME: Rainbow Ingot
IT_CV_GOLD4.EXPR: A prismatic crystal that can be exchanged for 160,000 Zeni.
IT_CV_GOLD4.FLAVOR: This ingot originates from one of the Alchemy mines that once existed around the world. The value of such ingots corresponds to how deep inside the Alchemy mine they were found. Prismatic ones such as this one are extremely rare, and would have been excavated only occasionally from the innermost depths of the mines.

IT_EQUP_COP.NAME: Damask Ore
IT_EQUP_COP.EXPR: An ore that can be used to enhance equipment.
IT_EQUP_COP.FLAVOR: This ore was gradually formed over time from a meteorite that once fell from the sky. It can be used to enhance equipment, namely weapons and armor. Ores such as this can be found near to the earth's surface, and are often seen for sale.

IT_EQUP_SIL.NAME: Mithril Ore
IT_EQUP_SIL.EXPR: An ore that can be used to enhance equipment.
IT_EQUP_SIL.FLAVOR: This ore was gradually formed over time from a meteorite that once fell from the sky. It can be used to enhance equipment and make it more powerful. Ores such as this, which have a distinctive ashy silver color, are less common than Damask ones, and quite difficult to obtain.

IT_EQUP_MIT.NAME: Adamantine Ore
IT_EQUP_MIT.EXPR: An ore that can be used to enhance equipment.
IT_EQUP_MIT.FLAVOR: This ore was gradually formed over time from a meteorite that fell from the sky in ancient times. Equipment enhanced with ores such as this is said to be imbued with a silver hue and a strength greater than that of steel. Such ores are only found deep beneath the earth's surface, and are rarely seen for sale.

IT_EQUP_ORI.NAME: Orichalcum Ore
IT_EQUP_ORI.EXPR: An ore that can be used to enhance equipment.
IT_EQUP_ORI.FLAVOR: This ore was formed from a meteorite that fell from the sky in primordial times and slowly fused with the earth's energy, deep below its surface. Equipment enhanced with ores such as this is said to become imbued with this mighty energy. The very existence of such ores is doubted by many, and finding one is an extremely difficult task.

IT_US_TICKET.NAME: Skip Ticket
IT_US_TICKET.EXPR: A ticket used to skip one battle.
IT_US_TICKET.FLAVOR: This ticket-like item allows the user to sense the presence of hostile beings. The mark in its center glows red when detecting animosity, growing brighter according to the hostile being's proximity to the bearer, and allowing him or her to effectively avoid combat.

IT_US_DJ_SKIP_TICKET.NAME: Sacred Stone Skip Ticket
IT_US_DJ_SKIP_TICKET.EXPR: A ticket used to skip one Sacred Stone Memories event battle (Cannot be used with some quests, such as EX stages and other Hard quests).
IT_US_DJ_SKIP_TICKET.FLAVOR: This ticket-like item allows the user to sense the presence of hostile beings. The mark in its center glows red when detecting animosity, growing brighter according to the hostile being's proximity to the bearer, and allowing him or her to effectively avoid combat.

IT_KEY_QUEST_GOLD.NAME: Gold Key
IT_KEY_QUEST_GOLD.EXPR: A key used to unlock the Key Quest "Gold Rush [Bgn-Adv]" for 30 minutes. You can also use five of this item to unlock [Pro].

IT_KEY_QUEST_APPLE.NAME: Garden Key
IT_KEY_QUEST_APPLE.EXPR: A key used to unlock the Key Quest "Apple Garden [Bgn-Adv]" for 30 minutes.

IT_KEY_QUEST_ORE.NAME: Mine Key
IT_KEY_QUEST_ORE.EXPR: A key used to unlock the Key Quest "Mineral Garden [Bgn-Adv]" for 30 minutes.

IT_KEY_QUEST_P_EXP.NAME: Training Key
IT_KEY_QUEST_P_EXP.EXPR: A key used to unlock the Player EXP Bonus Reward Key Quest "Time of Training" once.

IT_US_GACHATICKET.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon 10 special things.

IT_US_1UNIT10TICKET.EXPR: Use this ticket in Summon to get 10 special summons with one unit guaranteed.

IT_US_SOUBI10TICKET.EXPR: Use this ticket in Summon to get 10 special summons for equipment.

IT_EQ_HP_CAP.NAME: Thick Hat
IT_EQ_HP_CAP.FLAVOR: Thick hats such as this are worn by both adventurers and regular civilians, male and female, young and old. It may not be much to look at, but is very well-made, and offers lasting durability that will stand up to even the harshest of environments. A popular item in a range of different regions.

IT_EQ_HP_PILOTHAT.NAME: Pilot Helmet
IT_EQ_HP_PILOTHAT.FLAVOR: Hats of this sort were originally worn by pilots, but won popularity among adventurers for their warmth and durability. The attached goggles also provide a certain level of protection for the face, without obstructing the wearer's field of vision.

IT_EQ_HP_JACKET.NAME: Cloth Jacket
IT_EQ_HP_JACKET.FLAVOR: Jackets like this are often worn by adventurers. Despite its rigid appearance, it has in fact been designed to allow for ease of movement of the arms. Not only is it both light and durable, it has been lined with protective charms that boost the wearer's stamina.

IT_EQ_HP_COAT.NAME: Noble Coat
IT_EQ_HP_COAT.FLAVOR: Coats of this type were once considered a sign of nobility. This modern version has been designed with adventurers firmly in mind, and what appear to be mere ornamentations in fact serve to help maintain the wearer's stamina during long and arduous journeys.

IT_EQ_HP_FURCOAT.NAME: Sacred Fur Coat
IT_EQ_HP_FURCOAT.FLAVOR: This coat is trimmed with the fur of a holy beast that magically repels all dirt and grime. Its fine, soft texture makes it comfortable against the skin of the discerning adventurer, and it also provides excellent defensive capabilities. A truly first-class item: made from luxury materials, and with a level of artisanship to match.

IT_EQ_HP_EARRING.NAME: Earrings
IT_EQ_HP_EARRING.FLAVOR: These earrings are set with jade-green gemstones. Their small size is designed to avoid them catching on hair or clothing during battle. A popular item among long-haired adventurers and those who like to be as lightly dressed as possible.

IT_EQ_HP_CIRCLET.NAME: Circlet
IT_EQ_HP_CIRCLET.FLAVOR: This beautiful circlet has been crafted from an ore that flows with magical energy. As well as raising the wearer's powers of sorcery, it also boosts physical strength. The stone at its center contains Alchemia, and is said to grant a blessing upon those with low stamina.

IT_EQ_HP_BUTTERFLY.NAME: Red Butterfly's Charm
IT_EQ_HP_BUTTERFLY.FLAVOR: This charm is adorned with a red butterfly. It causes magical energy and strength to flow through the bearer. Inside it is a crystal, modeled after a Philosopher's Stone, that glows faintly when detecting water energy, making it possible to anticipate floods and other water-related disasters ahead of time.

IT_EQ_HP_CUP.NAME: Golden Cup
IT_EQ_HP_CUP.EXPR: HP +40, PATK +16, MATK +12, Thunder Res +1, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_HP_CUP.FLAVOR: This golden cup is thought to have once been used to toast and celebrate a legendary hero renowned for both brain and brawn. Drinking from it is said to cause energy to surge through the body, endowing the drinker with a mighty strength akin to that of the hero.

IT_EQ_ATK_WOODENSWORD.NAME: Wooden Sword
IT_EQ_ATK_WOODENSWORD.FLAVOR: Wooden swords such as this are used by knights-in-training and the like. Although intended for training purposes, it possesses the same weight as an iron blade, and as such can still inflict considerable injury. The first weapon that any prospective swordsman must master.

IT_EQ_ATK_MACE.NAME: Mace
IT_EQ_ATK_MACE.FLAVOR: A bludgeoning weapon. Its simple yet effective design, with the weight concentrated in the top end, means that just a simple swing will produce a powerful blow. To use it to its full potential, however, requires considerable training.

IT_EQ_ATK_SABER.NAME: Saber
IT_EQ_ATK_SABER.FLAVOR: A single-edged sword with an extremely keen blade. Modeled after the swords of Wadatsumi, its light-weight design makes it a favorite among adventurers who are inexperienced with weapons. It is also pleasing to the eye, with an intricate lion design adorning its guard.

IT_EQ_ATK_LANCE.NAME: Great Lance
IT_EQ_ATK_LANCE.FLAVOR: This exquisite lance was clearly a labor of love by its maker. It is relatively long, in order to allow for use on horseback as well as on foot. It is said to bring great glory to its wielder, and others of its kind were supposedly used to fell many a commander in battles long past. Naturally a very popular item.

IT_EQ_ATK_SWORD.NAME: Sacred Lion Blade
IT_EQ_ATK_SWORD.FLAVOR: This greatsword is adorned with a golden lion pommel. Its blade glows with a magnificent hue, and when held up to the sky it is said to inspire one's comrades and even draw gasps of wonder from one's foes. Despite having seen countless battlefields, its glorious glow remains unfading.

IT_EQ_ATK_KNIFE.NAME: Ogre Knife
IT_EQ_ATK_KNIFE.FLAVOR: This carving knife is said to be able to cut through even the gigantic bones of an ogre. Its blade is quite thick, and for a relatively small weapon it is definitely on the heavy side. A simple swing can carve through many things with ease.

IT_EQ_ATK_MORNINGSTAR.NAME: Morning Star
IT_EQ_ATK_MORNINGSTAR.FLAVOR: This bludgeoning weapon is a variation on a mace, featuring two iron balls attached to its end by chains. It packs considerable destructive power, and perhaps because of its relation to the mace, it also slightly enhances the bearer's magical energy.

IT_EQ_ATK_AX.NAME: Great Axe
IT_EQ_ATK_AX.FLAVOR: This double-bladed axe was made to be used with one hand, but its weight means that doing so requires considerable strength and skill. The skull in its center gives the weapon a somewhat sinister appearance, but it was in fact originally designed to ward off evil.

IT_EQ_ATK_SPEAR.NAME: Dragon Halberd
IT_EQ_ATK_SPEAR.EXPR: PATK +20, MATK +16, CRIT +12, Fire Res +1, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_ATK_SPEAR.FLAVOR: A halberd with a dragon wrapped around the length of it. As well as brute attack power, it also grants a boost to the wielder's magical energy, and the dragon's protection is said to grant increased resistance against fire and poison. Designed for use by expert halberdiers.

IT_EQ_DEF_VEST.NAME: Vest
IT_EQ_DEF_VEST.FLAVOR: Vests of this sort are often worn by villagers, but their durability and low cost mean they are also popular with novice adventurers. Some shops apparently offer a wide range of different colors.

IT_EQ_DEF_MANTLE.NAME: Leather Cape
IT_EQ_DEF_MANTLE.FLAVOR: This long cape is a very versatile item, and an essential for any journey. Made from tanned leather, it offers good protection against wind and rain, as well as basic protection against the cold. If pulled up to the face it will also provide some degree of defense against harsh desert sands.

IT_EQ_DEF_SHELM.NAME: Cross Helmet
IT_EQ_DEF_SHELM.FLAVOR: This sturdy silver helm provides excellent cover for the eyes and neck. While such helms are often issued to soldiers for training purposes, they can most certainly stand up to actual combat use. Recommended for use by beginner to intermediate level soldiers.

IT_EQ_DEF_SHIELD.NAME: Lion Monarch Shield
IT_EQ_DEF_SHIELD.FLAVOR: A shield emblazoned with a roaring lion motif. Its size means that it provides a wide defense area, and it is said to be so strong that it can withstand a hundred sword blows without sustaining a single nick. When used by veteran warriors, it is said to grant even greater success in battle.

IT_EQ_DEF_ARMOR.NAME: Flame Emperor Armor
IT_EQ_DEF_ARMOR.FLAVOR: Combines a magnificent, imperial cape with a sturdy metal armor section that protects the torso. The metal part is double-layered, and was mixed with an ore containing Alchemia during the forging process, making it exceptionally strong.

IT_EQ_DEF_BANGLE.NAME: Copper Bangle
IT_EQ_DEF_BANGLE.FLAVOR: A simple copper bangle. Its low price and unassuming appearance make it an easy choice for anyone, regardless of gender, who is in the market for a piece of jewelry. It is also a useful item for adventurers to pick up, as it provides modest magical and physical defensive powers.

IT_EQ_DEF_TURBAN.NAME: Turban
IT_EQ_DEF_TURBAN.FLAVOR: This thick turban is adorned with decorative feathers that signify prayers for a safe journey. Despite being made from cloth, it boasts impressive defensive qualities. What's more, it keeps the head warm in cold climates and cool in hot ones!

IT_EQ_DEF_BELT.NAME: Black Belt
IT_EQ_DEF_BELT.FLAVOR: This belt is made from black-dyed leather, entwined with metal and fitted with a gem in its center that is imbued with magical energy. Its simple appearance belies significant defensive power, and it also provides a small amount of protection against water energy, perhaps because the gem set in it was discovered near a source of water.

IT_EQ_DEF_HAGOROMO.NAME: Celestial Robe
IT_EQ_DEF_HAGOROMO.EXPR: PDEF +12, MDEF +12, HP +32, Water Res +1, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_DEF_HAGOROMO.FLAVOR: This robe is said to have been worn by a celestial being spoken of in the legends of Wadatsumi. The floating scarf that accompanies it, known as a "hagoromo," is what really makes the robe stand out. It possesses powers that originate not from Alchemia but from some other mysterious source, and grants the bearer protection against disaster.

IT_EQ_MAG_BRANCH.NAME: Branch
IT_EQ_MAG_BRANCH.FLAVOR: This tree branch contains a tiny amount of Alchemia. Although they're often thought of as the imaginary weapons of young children, in Lustburg the children really do train using branches in place of staffs.

IT_EQ_MAG_WAND.NAME: Wand
IT_EQ_MAG_WAND.FLAVOR: A wand of the type used by trainee mages. Such wands are useful for controlling magical energy, but by nature they can only carry a limited amount of energy, no matter how much is channeled into them. Graduating from one is considered the first step to becoming a full-fledged mage.

IT_EQ_MAG_ROD.NAME: Skull Rod
IT_EQ_MAG_ROD.FLAVOR: The crystal skull at the tip of this wand emits an eerie glow that changes in response to its bearer's magical energy. Some users make use of this feature in place of a torch when inside dimly lit rooms and caverns.

IT_EQ_MAG_STAFF.NAME: Star Staff
IT_EQ_MAG_STAFF.FLAVOR: The star on this staff's tip is part of a real shooting star that fell from the sky. Around the star runs a form of magical circuitry that is designed to help more effectively channel the wielder's energy into the staff. If used by someone lacking the necessary experience, however, the star will easily shatter.

IT_EQ_MAG_GEARROD.NAME: Gear Rod
IT_EQ_MAG_GEARROD.FLAVOR: This special rod combines the mechanical technology of Slothstein with the magical technology of Lustburg. The complex mechanism incorporated into its design serves to automatically amplify the wielder's magical energy when the rod is used.

IT_EQ_MAG_BROOM.NAME: Broom
IT_EQ_MAG_BROOM.FLAVOR: A simple broom with a vague fairy tale-like atmosphere to it. It has no special qualities to really speak of, but does serve to slightly boost the user's magical energy. Incidentally, one will occasionally see children sitting on brooms like this and trying to jump up into the air.

IT_EQ_MAG_MAGICWAND.NAME: Magic Staff
IT_EQ_MAG_MAGICWAND.FLAVOR: This wand has been crafted from the branch of a tree containing Alchemia. As well as helping to reinforce the wielder's magical powers, it is tipped with a metal head that allows it to serve as an effective bludgeoning weapon. A popular choice among magic users looking for some sort of physical protection on their journeys.

IT_EQ_MAG_NECRO.NAME: Necronomicon
IT_EQ_MAG_NECRO.FLAVOR: Magic texts such as this are said to have once been used by magic users known as necromancers. In order to safely harness their power, today they are sealed firmly shut using belts imbued with magical energy. However, it is said that when those with darkness in their hearts attempt to use such books, they will quickly be consumed by them.

IT_EQ_MAG_CRYSTAL.NAME: Crystal Orb
IT_EQ_MAG_CRYSTAL.EXPR: MATK +16, PATK +16, DEX +12, Dark Res +1, Blind Res +7
IT_EQ_MAG_CRYSTAL.FLAVOR: This orb is modeled after Lustburg Lake, and is said to grant various blessings to the bearer. The crystal used requires a complex Alchemia extraction process to create, and as such other examples of its type are rarely seen on the market.

IT_EQ_MND_GROVE.NAME: Gloves
IT_EQ_MND_GROVE.FLAVOR: These gloves have been reinforced using simple metal bands. Although their defensive power is only modest, they are renowned for their sturdiness, and are a good choice for long journeys. Their low price also makes them a popular item among young adventurers.

IT_EQ_MND_MUFFLER.NAME: Wool Scarf
IT_EQ_MND_MUFFLER.FLAVOR: This simple yet versatile woolen scarf offers good protection against the cold, making it popular among all sorts of different people. The defensive power it provides is not that great, but some people simply like the look of it.

IT_EQ_MND_CAPE.NAME: Magic Cape
IT_EQ_MND_CAPE.FLAVOR: This cape's design is based on one worn at a famous school for magicians. Its lining is embroidered with magical inscriptions that protect the wearer against evil energy. Apparently it also has some value as a collection piece.

IT_EQ_MND_PARKA.NAME: Magus Hood
IT_EQ_MND_PARKA.FLAVOR: Thick hoods of this type are often worn by intermediate-level mages. It is as light as a feather, but also offers substantial protection against magic. There is even a tale of a mage wearing one such hood who fell to earth from high up in the sky and landed without a scratch.

IT_EQ_MND_ROBE.NAME: Saint's Robe
IT_EQ_MND_ROBE.FLAVOR: This special robe, which is also used for ceremonial purposes, grants holy protection to the wearer. The modest decorative elements incorporated into it are designed so as not to impede movement, and each one provides a different defensive effect. Children in mage families are given robes such as this once they come of age.

IT_EQ_MND_CHARM.NAME: Charm
IT_EQ_MND_CHARM.FLAVOR: A small charm of the type often sold to travelers as a protective talisman. It can be attached to a bag or piece of clothing. It offers a fair degree of defense, but perhaps due to its low price is generally categorized more as an accessory than a piece of equipment.

IT_EQ_MND_MIRROR.NAME: Crystal Mirror
IT_EQ_MND_MIRROR.FLAVOR: This elegant crystal mirror has been a staple design in Lustburg since time immemorial. It was even the model for the magic mirror that appears in a famous fairy tale. Its ability to repel evil energy also makes it a very effective defensive item.

IT_EQ_MND_CAP.NAME: Mage's Hat
IT_EQ_MND_CAP.FLAVOR: This hat was designed by a committee of experienced mages. The fabric used is inscribed with magic spells, and provides both physical and magical defense, as well as added resistance against Light magic.

IT_EQ_MND_MASK.NAME: Phantom Mask
IT_EQ_MND_MASK.EXPR: MDEF +12, PDEF +12, LUCK +12, Light Res +1, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_MND_MASK.FLAVOR: This mask is said to have been worn by a famous phantom thief who lived hidden in the shadows and was impossible to imprison. The patterns engraved on it and the gems set in it each have their own significance, and serve to protect the wearer from harm.

IT_EQ_SPD_FEATHER.NAME: Blue Feather
IT_EQ_SPD_FEATHER.FLAVOR: The feather of a bird said to be the fastest in the whole world. It emits an enchanting and otherworldly blue glow, and even if the feather becomes dirty this glow quickly returns. When worn on the body it makes the wearer more agile.

IT_EQ_SPD_GEAR.NAME: Harmonic Cogs
IT_EQ_SPD_GEAR.FLAVOR: This pair of uniquely shaped cogs have been designed with minimal friction in mind, and have an extraordinarily long life span. They are also extremely smooth and quiet, and today are an essential component in a variety of machinery.

IT_EQ_SPD_HOURGLASS.NAME: Rainbow Hourglass
IT_EQ_SPD_HOURGLASS.FLAVOR: The sand inside this hourglass shines with all the colors of the rainbow. As this sand falls, it is said to slow the flow of time for the bearer, making those around him or her appear to move in slow-motion. The principle behind it is still not understood, and is a constant source of debate to this day.

IT_EQ_SPD_MACHINEWING.NAME: Mechanical Wing
IT_EQ_SPD_MACHINEWING.FLAVOR: A mechanical wing created using the technology of Slothstein. Simply carrying it on one's person boosts agility and nimbleness. The mechanism behind it is so complex that few people understand it, and examples of its type are rarely seen on the market.

IT_EQ_SPD_WATCH.NAME: Old Pocket Watch
IT_EQ_SPD_WATCH.FLAVOR: A legendary pocket watch. Its hands have stopped, and it is said that if started again it will alter time itself. Although spoken of in ancient texts, the very existence of this relic was previously unconfirmed.

IT_EQ_SPD_GETA.NAME: Single-Tooth Geta
IT_EQ_SPD_GETA.FLAVOR: A pair of single-tooth geta clogs. They originate from Wadatsumi, where they were once used by people training in the mountains. They are somewhat cumbersome, but by the time the wearer becomes accustomed to them, his or her agility will have ended up increasing significantly.

IT_EQ_SPD_SHINOBI.NAME: Shinobi Shoes
IT_EQ_SPD_SHINOBI.FLAVOR: A type of footwear worn by the "shinobi" of Wadatsumi. These mysterious shoes combine a steel-like toughness with a feather-like lightness, and some even say that they are able to completely silence the wearer's footsteps.

IT_EQ_SPD_BOOTS.NAME: Winged Boots
IT_EQ_SPD_BOOTS.FLAVOR: These distinctive winged, sky blue boots were designed with a legendary hero known as "The Fierce Wind" in mind. They grant the wearer a bird-like nimbleness, making it possible to strike at openings in opponents' defenses with ease.

IT_EQ_SPD_GBOOTS.NAME: Ancient Boots
IT_EQ_SPD_GBOOTS.EXPR: AGI +4, CRIT +19, DEX +14, Wind Res +1, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_SPD_GBOOTS.FLAVOR: These boots were made in ancient times, and although Alchemy was not used in their creation, they provide extraordinary, fortress-like defensive power. The bestial visage that adorns the upper part of them is thought to be that of a guardian deity worshipped by their makers.

IT_EQ_CRI_NEEDLE.NAME: Needle
IT_EQ_CRI_NEEDLE.FLAVOR: Thin, sharp needles such as this have been used by assassins as concealed weapons since long ago. They also continue to be carried as self-defense weapons by weak-bodied people and the like to this day. Although somewhat limited in their ability to inflict fatal wounds, they can still cause serious injury when piercing vital points.

IT_EQ_CRI_KUKURI.NAME: Kukri
IT_EQ_CRI_KUKURI.FLAVOR: This knife has a distinctive, inwardly curved blade. Although in fact originally used for hunting and farmwork, it has been reappropriated as a weapon. Although very effective when in the right hands, if used by someone lacking the necessary expertise it may fall somewhat short in combat.

IT_EQ_CRI_GOGGLES.NAME: Goggles
IT_EQ_CRI_GOGGLES.FLAVOR: A pair of goggles that originate from Slothstein. One eye provides a night-vision function, and the other a zoom one, and it is possible to switch between these two features as and when necessary. The lenses used are specially designed to not cause fatigue to the eyes.

IT_EQ_CRI_KATAR.NAME: Platinum Katar
IT_EQ_CRI_KATAR.FLAVOR: This highly valuable katar boasts a platinum blade. Its extremely light-weight design is intended to make it as easy as possible to strike at foes' vital points during combat. A beautiful weapon to behold—but one might well say that it shows its true beauty in combat.

IT_EQ_CRI_TWOSWORDS.NAME: Orichalcum Blades
IT_EQ_CRI_TWOSWORDS.FLAVOR: These twin swords were supposedly forged from the legendary metal orichalcum. They are extremely light, and require no physical strength to swing effectively. Despite this, however, one swing of them is said to be enough to slice clean through a boulder.

IT_EQ_CRI_DAGGER.NAME: Dagger
IT_EQ_CRI_DAGGER.FLAVOR: Daggers such as this can be found in weapon shops everywhere. As well as having a range of practical, everyday uses, many travelers carry them for self-protection. They are easy to use for even the most inexperienced novice, and in the hands of an expert can inflict serious damage.

IT_EQ_CRI_JAVELIN.NAME: Javelin
IT_EQ_CRI_JAVELIN.FLAVOR: This lance-shaped throwing javelin is modeled after a legendary weapon that was said to always hit its target without fail. Its light-weight and aerodynamic design, intended to make it as easy to throw as possible, also makes it an effective weapon when swung around at close range.

IT_EQ_CRI_SCOPE.NAME: Wonder Scope
IT_EQ_CRI_SCOPE.FLAVOR: This extraordinarily powerful scope allows the user to view thermal air currents, which cannot be seen with the naked eye. In addition to the perfectly precise aim that it enables, it also grants increased resistance against lightning attacks. A rare item that is only produced in Slothstein.

IT_EQ_CRI_HAMMER.NAME: Giant's Hammer
IT_EQ_CRI_HAMMER.EXPR: CRIT +16, DEX +16, LUCK +12, Thunder Res +1, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_CRI_HAMMER.FLAVOR: This mighty hammer is said to have once been wielded by a legendary giant. It is said that if used to its full potential it can smash mountains to dust. As well as formidable offensive power, this outstanding weapon also provides added resistance against lightning attacks and paralysis.

IT_EQ_DEX_PEN.NAME: Mage's Fountain Pen
IT_EQ_DEX_PEN.FLAVOR: This fountain pen is thought to have once been used by a distinguished mage. All the weak points of regular fountain pens have been eliminated: its ink never runs dry, and it is strong against shocks, blockages, and so forth. Of course, though, it is not the sort of pen for just anyone.

IT_EQ_DEX_INK.NAME: Ink Jar
IT_EQ_DEX_INK.FLAVOR: Fountain pen ink of the sort used by everyone, from children to adults. Despite its low price, it flows and covers well, and retains its quality over time. However, its lid has a habit of coming loose, and it should always be kept out of the reach of young children.

IT_EQ_DEX_FURO.NAME: Stamp of Certain Delivery
IT_EQ_DEX_FURO.FLAVOR: A stamp of the type used when sealing envelopes. Its seal contains a small amount of magical energy, and letters stamped with it are said to be guaranteed to reach their recipient.

IT_EQ_DEX_NOTEBOOK.NAME: Research Notebook
IT_EQ_DEX_NOTEBOOK.FLAVOR: An old research notebook. It was used by a renowned mage to note down spells, and contains a wealth of different knowledge. The notebook itself is also enchanted, and simply opening it up will boost one's abilities.

IT_EQ_DEX_GLASSPEN.NAME: Glass Pen
IT_EQ_DEX_GLASSPEN.FLAVOR: This pen is made from glass created using Alchemy. Words written with it never fade, and it is also said to bring good fortune to its owner. Despite its fragile appearance, most blows will not even leave a scratch on it.

IT_EQ_DEX_TRIANGLE.NAME: Set Square
IT_EQ_DEX_TRIANGLE.FLAVOR: A triangle like one used in school classrooms and other places of learning. As well as drawing straight lines and measuring lengths, they are also extremely useful for determining angles. Some people also use them as improvised throwing weapons, but this is definitely not their intended use...

IT_EQ_DEX_LOUPE.NAME: Magnifying Glass
IT_EQ_DEX_LOUPE.FLAVOR: A magnifying glass of the sort used in research and educational institutions. Although it may not look like anything special, its level of magnification is said to be powerful enough to allow one to draw a picture on the back of a flea—provided you have a small enough pen, of course. No matter how hard you look through it, though, it cannot grant X-ray vision...

IT_EQ_DEX_COMPASS.NAME: Compass
IT_EQ_DEX_COMPASS.FLAVOR: A simple compass, as used by everyone from schoolchildren to top-class architects. Despite their simplicity, some people seem to have a lot of trouble using them. Such people will never acknowledge that this is completely down to their own clumsiness, of course...

IT_EQ_DEX_MICROSCOPE.NAME: Explorer's Microscope
IT_EQ_DEX_MICROSCOPE.EXPR: DEX +16, LUCK +16, HP +32, Fire Res +1, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_DEX_MICROSCOPE.FLAVOR: A powerful microscope of the type used by researchers studying microorganisms and particles. It may look easy to use, but adjusting the lens and so forth in fact requires a fair amount of skill. Using it for too long can cause some people to become nauseous, so a certain degree of caution is advised.

IT_EQ_LUK_SILVERCOIN.NAME: Fortune Coin
IT_EQ_LUK_SILVERCOIN.FLAVOR: A famous silver coin, spoken of in old songs, that is said to bring happiness and good fortune when carried in one's pocket or shoe. Today, such coins are carried by travelers as good-luck charms.

IT_EQ_LUK_KEY.NAME: Traveler's Key
IT_EQ_LUK_KEY.FLAVOR: This silver key is said to bring luck to its bearer. It is imbued with wishes for good fortune at the end of one's journey. Apparently, it is modeled after the key to a treasure chest that was hidden by a traveler who journeyed across a whole continent. The chest contained no money or treasure, only memories...

IT_EQ_LUK_TRUMP.NAME: Arcana Card
IT_EQ_LUK_TRUMP.FLAVOR: A deck of cards said to guarantee victory in games and bets. However, if both people taking part possess these cards, they will become locked in an endless stalemate.

IT_EQ_LUK_DICE.NAME: Dice of Fate
IT_EQ_LUK_DICE.FLAVOR: These mysterious dice hold the power to control fate. They are a replica of the dice used by a great hero when making important decisions. They are said to bring good fortune to their owner, and to help him or her make the right choices.

IT_EQ_LUK_RABBITDOLL.NAME: Lucky Rabbit Figurine
IT_EQ_LUK_RABBITDOLL.FLAVOR: This rabbit figurine is thought to bring good luck to its owner. Simply placing it nearby will produce this effect, but it is also said that when the moonlight hits it the rabbit will come to life and summon a whole herd of its comrades. Although this is only a rumor, many people believe it to be true.

IT_EQ_LUK_RABBIT.NAME: Rabbit's Foot
IT_EQ_LUK_RABBIT.FLAVOR: The foot of a rabbit has been considered a good-luck charm since olden times. Ones such as this, which come attached to small straps, are popular with both adventurers and regular folk. It's well-made, and the fur is soft and pleasant to the touch.

IT_EQ_LUK_BELL.NAME: Silver Bell
IT_EQ_LUK_BELL.FLAVOR: This rare, silver-blue bell is said to summon a messenger of good fortune. Not only does it look exquisite, the beautiful sound it makes soothes both the mind and body. Bells like this are given as gifts to travelers when departing on long journeys, or used for decorative purposes.

IT_EQ_LUK_CHESS.NAME: Knight Chess Piece
IT_EQ_LUK_CHESS.FLAVOR: This knight piece comes from a custom-made chess set crafted using a magical ore, and is not available for general sale. It is imbued with divine blessings, and can be used as either an actual chess piece or a talisman.

IT_EQ_LUK_KAGO.NAME: Blue Bird of Fortune
IT_EQ_LUK_KAGO.EXPR: LUCK +16, AGI +3, CRIT +12, Dark Res +1, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_LUK_KAGO.FLAVOR: This blue bird is considered a symbol of good fortune. Its distinctive call is said to be so soothing that when hearing it, time ceases to exist for the listener. It is said that seeing one brings immeasurable blessings, and that this never happens more than once in a single person's lifetime.

IT_EQ_GEM_WHISTLE.NAME: Whistle
IT_EQ_GEM_WHISTLE.FLAVOR: This whistle emits a sound that cannot be heard by humans. Although it looks like a regular whistle, the sound it makes accumulates Soul Jewels and increases their effect. Rarely seen for sale.

IT_EQ_GEM_MARACAS.NAME: Maracas
IT_EQ_GEM_MARACAS.FLAVOR: Maracas such as these are used by various different musical troupes. They increase the amount of Soul Jewels in the area around the user, though only slightly. They have no effect unless shaken simultaneously, which takes some practice to pull off perfectly.

IT_EQ_GEM_TRUMPET.NAME: Trumpet
IT_EQ_GEM_TRUMPET.FLAVOR: The scale of this trumpet can be changed freely by its player. When played it attracts Soul Jewels, and this effect is further increased when multiple people play together. Its clear tone touches the heart, captivating all those who hear it.

IT_EQ_GEM_CHIKUONKI.NAME: Gramophone
IT_EQ_GEM_CHIKUONKI.FLAVOR: This gramophone usually emits no sound, but when it detects Soul Jewels nearby it begins to play very faintly, so that only its owner can hear it. The sound it makes changes according to the type and density of the Soul Jewels detected.

IT_EQ_GEM_RADIO.NAME: Alchemic Radio
IT_EQ_GEM_RADIO.FLAVOR: A special radio created using Alchemy. It plays sound when it picks up the energy radiated by Soul Jewels. Turning its dial to adjust the reception frequency is what makes the device really come into its own, but it's somewhat difficult to master.

IT_EQ_GEM_SPOON.NAME: Silver Spoon
IT_EQ_GEM_SPOON.FLAVOR: A beautiful silver spoon. Spoons such as this are mainly produced in Lustburg, and are created using magical energy. When Soul Jewels are touched with it, it supposedly increases the amount absorbed by the user's body.

IT_EQ_GEM_MAS.NAME: Drunkard's Masu Cup
IT_EQ_GEM_MAS.FLAVOR: A lacquer wooden box like those sometimes used for drinking in Wadatsumi. Apparently only the angriest of angry drunkards are permitted to drink from them. When alcohol is poured into this box, the Soul Jewels contained in it begin to overflow. Remember, though—alcohol should always be enjoyed in moderation...

IT_EQ_GEM_TENBIN.NAME: Gem Seller's Scales
IT_EQ_GEM_TENBIN.FLAVOR: These scales are said to be able to measure the nature of a person's soul. Originally called the "Soul Judger," their misleading name was apparently given to them by a merchant in order to try and sell them more easily. They increase the amount of Soul Jewels collected by the owner, as well as vitalizing his or her body in various ways.

IT_EQ_GEM_TSUBO.NAME: Magic Stone Scales
IT_EQ_GEM_TSUBO.EXPR: Jewels +20, LUCK +16, AGI +3, Light Res +1, Blind Res +7
IT_EQ_GEM_TSUBO.FLAVOR: These scales are thought to have once been used to weigh all the magic stones in the world. They are a relic of an age long passed, but their radiant glow remains unfaded. As well as increasing the owner's Soul Jewel accumulation rate, they also grant him or her a mysterious protection.

IT_EQ_ATTRIBUTE_CHOKER.NAME: Elemental Belt
IT_EQ_ATTRIBUTE_CHOKER.EXPR: Fire Res +1, Water Res +1, Thunder Res +1, Wind Res +1
IT_EQ_ATTRIBUTE_CHOKER.FLAVOR: A belt imbued with the power of the four elements. It grants a modest increase to resistance against Fire, Water, Wind, and Thunder. These belts were originally only permitted to be used by a select few mages, but today they are worn by all sorts of different people.

IT_EQ_ATTRIBUTE_BROOCH.NAME: Brooch of Resistance
IT_EQ_ATTRIBUTE_BROOCH.EXPR: Fire Res +2, Water Res +2, Thunder Res +2, Wind Res +2
IT_EQ_ATTRIBUTE_BROOCH.FLAVOR: A talisman in the form of a brooch. It is set with a gemstone that, using Slothstein's technology, has been infused with Alchemia, thus increasing its elemental-resistance power. A very popular item, but one that requires a great deal of effort and expense to produce and is therefore not seen on the market very often.

IT_EQ_STATUS_SMALL.NAME: Picmy Figurine
IT_EQ_STATUS_SMALL.EXPR: Stun Res +5, Paralyze Res +5, Sleep Res +5, Petrify Res +5
