IT_EQ_STATUS_SMALL.FLAVOR: A figurine modeled after a well-known mythical creature called a Picmy. Picmies love getting up to mischief and playing tricks on people, but hate nothing more than having tricks played on them. Old texts cite this as the reason for the Picmy being used to represent resistance against status ailments.

IT_EQ_STATUS_BIG.NAME: Goddess Figurine
IT_EQ_STATUS_BIG.EXPR: Stun Res +7, Paralyze Res +7, Sleep Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_STATUS_BIG.FLAVOR: An idol figurine depicting a guardian goddess. It purifies evil energy as it enters the body, and guards against it trying to infect it again. When placed by a window so that the moonlight hits it, it is rumored to grant even greater protection to the owner.

IT_EQ_ARMSWORD.NAME: Brave Sword
IT_EQ_ARMSWORD.EXPR: [Soldier-Only Equipment] PDEF +12, HP +32, LUCK +9, Fire Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_ARMSWORD.FLAVOR: This prestigious sword is awarded to soldiers in return for their first act of distinguished service. It is modeled after the swords used back when the "soldier" profession was first established, and although somewhat archaic in design, it boasts extremely high strength and durability.

IT_EQ_HUNTERMANTLE.NAME: Hunting Cape
IT_EQ_HUNTERMANTLE.EXPR: [Hunter-Only Equipment] PATK +16, CRIT +12, DEX +6, AGI +2, Thunder Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_HUNTERMANTLE.FLAVOR: Defensive capes of this type are worn by archers when hunting in woods and grasslands. Each one is carefully hand-sewn, and a wide variation can be seen between those from different regions and villages, with various different sewing techniques used and colors produced. When worn, this cape mysteriously fills the wearer with a feeling of determination.

IT_EQ_ARROWCASE.NAME: Dragon Scale Quiver
IT_EQ_ARROWCASE.EXPR: [Ranger-Only Equipment] PATK +16, DEX +18, CRIT +12, AGI +2, Wind Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ARROWCASE.FLAVOR: This mystical quiver changes color according to how the light hits it. It is awarded to those who have mastered the way of the ranger. The dragon scales used to make it are still imbued with the memories and powers of the dragon, and when equipped these are passed on to the user.

IT_EQ_HEELHAT.NAME: Hat of Tranquility
IT_EQ_HEELHAT.EXPR: [Priest-Only Equipment] AGI +3, LUCK +12, MATK +9, Light Res +1, Max Jewels +16, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_HEELHAT.FLAVOR: Only full-fledged priests are permitted to wear this hat. It is decorated with birds that symbolize peace, and the sight of it in battle brings peace of mind to many soldiers. It is said to grant the wearer the ability to survive even the most fearsome of battles.

IT_EQ_HARP.NAME: Goddess Harp
IT_EQ_HARP.EXPR: [Bard-Only Equipment] DEX +16, MATK +12, AGI +3, LUCK +9, Charm Res +5, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_HARP.FLAVOR: This magnificent harp is adorned with the figure of a goddess of good fortune. It is said to manifest different degrees of power according to its bearer's love of music and purity of heart. The sound it makes can heal the hearts of men and mesmerize even the most savage beasts.

IT_EQ_HOOK.NAME: Steel Hook
IT_EQ_HOOK.EXPR: [Thief-Only Equipment] Jewels +16, AGI +3, DEX +9, Poison Res +5, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_HOOK.FLAVOR: One who has mastered the use of this hook is considered to have become a true thief. It is a rather crude tool, and being able to use it as an extension of one's limbs requires a considerable amount of time. Once mastered, however, there is no target that cannot be captured with it.

IT_EQ_MAGICBREATH.NAME: Magic Bracelet
IT_EQ_MAGICBREATH.EXPR: [Mage-Only Equipment] MATK +30, MDEF +10, CRIT +9, Water Res +1, Max Jewels +20, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_MAGICBREATH.FLAVOR: Bracelets such as this are passed down in mage families, and are traditionally presented to young mages upon coming of age. It boosts the wearer's magical abilities, but is said to tightly constrict the wrist if worn by one lacking the necessary skill and experience.

IT_EQ_JAMADHAR.NAME: Jamadhar
IT_EQ_JAMADHAR.EXPR: [Shadow Assassin-Only Equipment] PATK +16, AGI +4, CRIT +12, HP +16, Paralyze Res +13, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_JAMADHAR.FLAVOR: Weapons of this sort are used by expert assassins. They require a high degree of skill to use, but once mastered can inflict strikes that are too fast to be seen with the naked eye. As a result, there is a certain mysticism attached to such weapons, and those who use them are said to never fail to fell their targets.

IT_EQ_ELEMENTAL.NAME: Medallion of Wisdom
IT_EQ_ELEMENTAL.EXPR: [Sage-Only Equipment] MATK +35, MDEF +10, CRIT +9, Wind Res +1, Max Jewels +30, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_ELEMENTAL.FLAVOR: Only those who have mastered the way of the sage are permitted to wear this medallion. Its shape is said to signify omniscient wisdom. It amplifies the bearer's magical power to its limits, as well as providing protection against magical attacks.

IT_EQ_TRIDENT.NAME: Trident
IT_EQ_TRIDENT.EXPR: [Spearman-Only Equipment] HP +40, DEX +12, PATK +9, LUCK +6, Thunder Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_TRIDENT.FLAVOR: Tridents such as this are used by elite spearmen. It has a beautiful, almost crystal-like appearance, but is also a fearsome weapon. Despite its somewhat bulky form, it is extremely light-weight, and can be used to unleash swift and effective strikes.

IT_EQ_SPE_FLAGSPEAR.NAME: Promised Holy Banner
IT_EQ_SPE_FLAGSPEAR.EXPR: [Sacred Spearman-Only Equipment] HP +40, PATK +26, DEX +12, CRIT +9, Thunder Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_SPE_FLAGSPEAR.FLAVOR: This banner is carried into battle by the most elite of sacred spearmen. By asserting their presence on the battlefield, it helps boost their comrades' spirits and dampen their opponents' morale. Although designed mainly as a banner, its pointed spear tip is sharp enough to pierce heavy armor.

IT_EQ_MUCHI.NAME: Briar-Whip of Discipline
IT_EQ_MUCHI.EXPR: [Beast Tamer-Only Equipment] HP +40, AGI +3, PATK +9, MATK +6, Stun Res +5, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_MUCHI.FLAVOR: Covered in sinister thorns, this whip is designed specifically for training beasts. Despite its appearance, it is very light, and can strike with great precision. However, if used ineptly it can easily cause injury to the user or those nearby, so its use is prohibited for everyone except proficient beast tamers.

IT_EQ_MAGICALLAMP.NAME: Magical Lamp
IT_EQ_MAGICALLAMP.EXPR: [Dancer-Only Equipment] PATK +16, MDEF +10, CRIT +9, AGI +2, LUCK +6, Charm Res +5, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_MAGICALLAMP.FLAVOR: This incense burner is modeled after a legendary magic lamp that is spoken of in desert regions. When incense is burned in it, it grants heightened powers of concentration and incredible light-footedness, and steels the mind against distraction and temptation.

IT_EQ_ORB.NAME: Stellar Orb
IT_EQ_ORB.EXPR: [Enchanter-Only Equipment] MATK +16, MDEF +10, HP +40, AGI +3, LUCK +6, Petrify Res +13, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_ORB.FLAVOR: This mystical orb depicts the circling of the stars. It prevents evil energy from taking hold of the body, and grants increased resistance against magical attacks. The gemstone set in its center sometimes twinkles like a star, or glows like a falling comet.

IT_EQ_ANGELA.NAME: Rod of Recovery
IT_EQ_ANGELA.EXPR: [Bishop-Only Equipment] MATK +16, MDEF +10, LUCK +9, CRIT +6, Light Res +1, Max Jewels +24, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_ANGELA.FLAVOR: A rod tipped with the figure of a beautiful four-winged goddess. It is imbued with prayers for good fortune, and grants a range of protective blessings upon the bearer. The goddess's name is unknown, but her gentle and kindly face soothes all those who see it.

IT_EQ_CRANE.NAME: Prayer Crane
IT_EQ_CRANE.EXPR: [Samurai-Only Equipment] CRIT +16, PATK +12, DEX +9, AGI +1, Blind Res +5, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_CRANE.FLAVOR: A traditional charm from Wadatsumi, featuring an exquisitely patterned bird atop a gold ball. It is imbued with prayers for those traveling far away from home, and is considered a symbol of reunion and good fortune.

IT_EQ_ZUKIN.NAME: Master Ninja's Hood
IT_EQ_ZUKIN.EXPR: [Ninja-Only Equipment] PATK +16, AGI +3, DEX +9, LUCK +6, Wind Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ZUKIN.FLAVOR: A hood with a forehead protector attached that is used by ninja to help them blend into the shadows. It allows the wearer to sense the presence of enemies by reading subtle changes in the air, helping his or her blade find its mark even in the dead of night. It also boosts the wearer's powers of concentration, allowing for swift movement and dexterous attacks.

IT_EQ_VISIONMASK.NAME: Entrancing Mask
IT_EQ_VISIONMASK.EXPR: [Chronomancer-Only Equipment] MATK +16, MDEF +10, DEX +9, Charm Res +5, Sleep Res +5, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_VISIONMASK.FLAVOR: This bewitching mask covers half the face. Its intricate design almost suggests a decorative piece, but it was in fact created by a Chronomancer for the purpose of sharpening the mind. It guards the wearer against deception and temptation, heightening resistance against Charm and Sleep attacks.

IT_EQ_LABAN.NAME: Geomantic Compass
IT_EQ_LABAN.EXPR: [Geomancer-Only Equipment] HP +40, MDEF +10, PDEF +7, Wind Res +1, Water Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_LABAN.FLAVOR: This compass is said to allow the user to understand all the laws of the universe. Such instruments originated in Greed Dike, before spreading to Wadatsumi. It awakens dormant power within the user, and its readings cannot be understood by anyone else.

IT_EQ_CSWORD.NAME: Crystal Sword
IT_EQ_CSWORD.EXPR: [Magic Swordsman-Only Equipment] MDEF +12, HP +32, AGI +2, Fire Res +1, Water Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_CSWORD.FLAVOR: An ancient crystal sword used by veteran magic swordsmen. It is not really that well-suited to swordplay, and its true value lies in its ability to amplify its bearer's magical powers, granting additional magical energy and boosting elemental resistance.

IT_EQ_WEDDING.NAME: Marriage Letter
IT_EQ_WEDDING.EXPR: [Bridge/Bridegroom-Only Equipment] LUCK +16, PATK +20, MATK +20, HP +40, Blind Res +5, Charm Res +13, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_WEDDING.FLAVOR: This letter, a symbol of celebration, glows with a dazzling light. It was written by a joyful man and woman vowing to spend the rest of their lives together, and brings good fortune to all those who take it in hand. It is also said to blow away dark clouds that hang over the future, and to guard against seduction by others.

IT_EQ_TWINSWORD.NAME: Trace Blades
IT_EQ_TWINSWORD.EXPR: [Twin-Blade Swordsman] CRIT +16, AGI +3, HP +24, LUCK +6, Wind Res +1, Jewels +6, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_TWINSWORD.FLAVOR: A pair of blades that can only be wielded by twin-blade swordsmen. They make it possible to inflict swift chain-attacks on opponents. It is said that if one of the blades becomes chipped, the other one will chip at the exact same spot.

IT_EQ_COWBOY.NAME: Gunner's Hat
IT_EQ_COWBOY.EXPR: [Gunner-Only Equipment] PATK +16, AGI +3, CRIT +9, LUCK +6, Thunder Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_COWBOY.FLAVOR: When worn by a gun user, this mysterious hat instantly boosts the wearer's powers of concentration. It fits the head so well that after wearing it once, one will experience a vague feeling of unease whenever it is not worn. For maximum effect, it should be worn low so that the eyes are partially covered.

IT_EQ_MEDICINE.NAME: Medical Tome
IT_EQ_MEDICINE.EXPR: [Chemist-Only Equipment] LUCK +16, DEX +12, CRIT +9, Sleep Res +5, Paralyze Res +13, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_MEDICINE.FLAVOR: This ancient tome is filled with knowledge about medicinal concoctions. However, some parts are missing, and the owner must fill in these gaps for him or herself. The book is apparently also imbued with blessings of good fortune, in order to aid the owner in doing this.

IT_EQ_GAUNTLET.NAME: Lion Gauntlet
IT_EQ_GAUNTLET.EXPR: [Martial Artist-Only Equipment] HP +40, AGI +3, PATK +9, CRIT +6, Paralyze Res +5, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_GAUNTLET.FLAVOR: This gauntlet is emblazoned with a lion-like holy beast that originates from Wadatsumi, and is said to ward off evil spirits. It fills the wearer with fighting spirit and grants extraordinary strength. The inside of it is engraved with some sort of magic spell, written in the ancient script of Wadatsumi.

IT_EQ_WAIST.NAME: Engineer's Waist Pouch
IT_EQ_WAIST.EXPR: [Crafter-Only Equipment] AGI +4, PATK +12, DEX +8, PDEF +7, Thunder Res +1, Fire Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_WAIST.FLAVOR: This pouch is ordinarily used for holding tools. It's made from a special material that grants the owner added resistance against Thunder and Fire. What is kept in it is up to the owner.

IT_EQ_PENDANT.NAME: Magic Dragon Pendant
IT_EQ_PENDANT.EXPR: [Dragon Knight-Only Equipment] HP +40, PATK +12, DEX +9, LUCK +6, Fire Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_PENDANT.FLAVOR: Only dragon knights are permitted to wear this pendant. The power of the dragon it is modeled after is said to reside inside it, and it protects the wearer against various forces. It is rumored that through additional training it is even possible for the wearer to become one with the dragon.

IT_EQ_HOLYSHIELD.NAME: Sacred Shield
IT_EQ_HOLYSHIELD.EXPR: [Holy Knight-Only Equipment] PDEF +12, HP +32, LUCK +9, DEX +6, Light Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_HOLYSHIELD.FLAVOR: A holy shield, adorned with radiant pure-white wings. Such shields are only given to seasoned holy knights. Not only does it protect the bearer from harm, it also endows him or her with surging courage, granting the strength to endure any battle.

IT_EQ_DARKSWORD.NAME: Dark Sword
IT_EQ_DARKSWORD.EXPR: [Dark Knight-Only Equipment] HP +40, AGI +3, PATK +9, DEX +6, Dark Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_DARKSWORD.FLAVOR: A greatsword, decorated in dark colors and adorned with a horned skull. Despite its heftiness, for an experienced dark knight it is the perfect weight. When swung it is said to be able to cleave through darkness itself.

IT_EQ_SUZU.NAME: Shrine Maiden's Bells
IT_EQ_SUZU.EXPR: [Shrine Maiden-Only Equipment] MATK +16, LUCK +12, AGI +2, Light Res +1, Fire Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_SUZU.FLAVOR: The sound made by this set of bells drives away beasts and demons, while at the same time bringing comrades together. It is a ritual instrument, used by shrine maidens in a traditional dance to make offerings to the gods.

IT_EQ_DRIFTER.NAME: Drifter's Hat
IT_EQ_DRIFTER.EXPR: [Drifter-Only Equipment] CRIT +16, PATK +12, LUCK +9, AGI +1, Thunder Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_DRIFTER.FLAVOR: Hats of this type can only be worn by Drifters who are experienced in gun use and have passed a certain level. They are widely renowned as a symbol of a master gunman, and for this reason some Drifters purposely do not wear them, in order to avoid making themselves into targets.

IT_EQ_LIES_2_BRACELET.NAME: Precious Bangle
IT_EQ_LIES_2_BRACELET.EXPR: [Wizard-Only Equipment] MATK +20, HP +16, MDEF +26, AGI +1, Jewels +16, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_LIES_2_BRACELET.FLAVOR: This magic bangle was a group present from everyone at Katya's bar, given to Lisbeth to congratulate her on getting into Venus Magic School. It is filled with everyone's thoughts of encouragement and support for Lisbeth, who finds magic a little tricky.

IT_EQ_DRAGON.NAME: Dragon Sphere
IT_EQ_DRAGON.EXPR: [Dragon Cavalier-Only Equipment] HP +40, PATK +12, DEX +9, LUCK +6, Fire Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_DRAGON.FLAVOR: Only dragon cavaliers, a more powerful form of the dragon knight, are permitted to carry orbs such as this. They symbolize a bond with dragons, and are said to bestow all the powers of the beasts upon the bearer. Those carrying this orb are treated with awe and respect by dragons everywhere.

IT_EQ_RIFLE.NAME: Nocturne Rifle
IT_EQ_RIFLE.EXPR: [Sniper-Only Equipment] CRIT +16, AGI +3, DEX +9, PATK +6, Blind Res +5, Paralyze Res +8, PATK +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_RIFLE.FLAVOR: A type of rifle, equipped with a night-vision scope, that is used by veteran snipers. Its sleek, stylish form belies an awesome destructive power, and even on the darkest of moonless nights it allows the sniper to hit his or her target as easily as in broad daylight.

IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH.NAME: Holy Brawler's Sash
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH.EXPR: [Holy Brawler-Only Equipment] HP +40, AGI +3, PATK +9, CRIT +6, Stun Res +5, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_WAISTCLOTH.FLAVOR: Originally from Greed Dike, but now found across the world, this type of sash is worn by only the most experienced of holy brawlers. Each of the ornamentations adorning it has a specific purpose, and not only does it raise the wearer's strength and powers of concentration, it also boosts physical agility.

IT_EQ_HOLYARMOR.NAME: Brilliant Wings Armor
IT_EQ_HOLYARMOR.EXPR: [Holy Cavalier-Only Equipment] HP +40, PDEF +10, LUCK +9, DEX +6, Light Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_HOLYARMOR.FLAVOR: A meticulous reproduction of the armor said to have once been worn by a legendary holy knight. As well as offering excellent defensive ability, it also raises the wearer's fighting spirit to fearsome levels. When worn by one lacking the necessary strength and ability, however, it is worthless.

IT_EQ_DARKKABUTO.NAME: Sinister Helmet
IT_EQ_DARKKABUTO.EXPR: [Dark Cavalier-Only Equipment] AGI +3, PATK +12, CRIT +9, HP +16, Dark Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_DARKKABUTO.FLAVOR: A helmet worn by soldiers who have been possessed by darkness. When worn it sharpens the mind, allowing for more accurate and powerful attacks. The helm's design is modeled after a demon who once tried to plunge the world into darkness.

IT_EQ_SHOULDER.NAME: Laboratory Flasks
IT_EQ_SHOULDER.EXPR: [Professor-Only Equipment] DEX +16, LUCK +12, AGI +2, Paralyze Res +5, Poison Res +5, Paralyze Res +8, Stun Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_SHOULDER.FLAVOR: This set of handcrafted flasks are made from a powerful form of glass. The chemicals inside them contain potent magical energy that only this special glass can withstand. A favorite with professors everywhere.

IT_EQ_BOILER.NAME: Power Boiler
IT_EQ_BOILER.EXPR: [Machinist-Only Equipment] CRIT +16, PATK +12, DEX +18, AGI +2, LUCK +6, Thunder Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_BOILER.FLAVOR: Power boilers such as this can only be used by Machinists—ones who have completely mastered the Crafter profession. The steam that it produces creates unlimited power, and its liquid energy source never becomes exhausted. A testament to the genius of mankind.

IT_EQ_ANVIL.NAME: Firesteel Anvil
IT_EQ_ANVIL.EXPR: [Blacksmith-Only Equipment] HP +60, PDEF +40, PATK +20, DEX +15, Fire Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ANVIL.FLAVOR: An essential forging tool for any blacksmith. A smith will treasure and carefully maintain his or her own anvil, and many are very particular about them, often refusing to work on another person's anvil.

IT_EQ_BLA_GOLDSTAMP.NAME: Gold Seal of Seas and Winds
IT_EQ_BLA_GOLDSTAMP.EXPR: [Martial Master-Only Equipment] PATK +24, PDEF +30, HP +18, CRIT +16, Daze Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8, AGI +2
IT_EQ_BLA_GOLDSTAMP.FLAVOR: Golden stamps such as this are thought to have been presented to the retainers of a once-prosperous dynasty in recognition of either success in maritime trade, or naval service. Despite its small size, it is solid gold and fairly weighty, so it also makes an excellent paperweight.

IT_EQ_MAJ_GUNHOLDER.NAME: Handy Holster
IT_EQ_MAJ_GUNHOLDER.EXPR: [Magia Gunslinger-Only Equipment] MATK +24, MDEF +20, CRIT +16, DEX +16, AGI +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_MAJ_GUNHOLDER.FLAVOR: This stylish set features a highly practical belt and holster, with a decorative star badge attached. No discerning Magia Gunslinger will want to be without one.

IT_EQ_LAMI_GAUNTLET.NAME: Royal Gauntlet
IT_EQ_LAMI_GAUNTLET.EXPR: [Lamia/Dragon Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +54, PATK +36, DEX +9, LUCK +6, Fire Res +3
IT_EQ_LAMI_GAUNTLET.FLAVOR: A gauntlet awarded only to outstanding members of the knighthood. It was given to Lamia as a sign of official recognition of her service to the kingdom in battle. It combines the sturdiness to withstand sword blows with incredible lightness and beauty.

IT_EQ_LAMI_SPEAR.NAME: Legendary Spear
IT_EQ_LAMI_SPEAR.EXPR: [Lamia/Dragon Cavalier+ Equipment] PATK +36, MATK +16, CRIT +18, Fire Res +3, Poison Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_LAMI_SPEAR.FLAVOR: Lamia's trusty spear. It is specially designed to channel Alchemia particles from inside the user's body and use them to increase the destructive power of its thrusts. Even now that the war has ended, it continues to be spoken of among the knighthood as a legendary spear.

IT_EQ_LAMI_ARMOR.NAME: Black-Winged Dress
IT_EQ_LAMI_ARMOR.EXPR: [Lamia/Dragon Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +50, PDEF +40, MDEF +30, Water Res +1, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_LAMI_ARMOR.FLAVOR: This black dress, which was made by a royal dressmaker, is adorned with wings at the back. It is said to be able to stabilize the wearer's emotions during battle by controlling Alchemia particles inside the body.

IT_EQ_LAMI_PENDANT.NAME: Pendant of Comfort
IT_EQ_LAMI_PENDANT.EXPR: [Lamia/Dragon Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +40, DEX +12, LUCK +12, Fire Res +3, MDEF +24, AGI +3
IT_EQ_LAMI_PENDANT.FLAVOR: This pendant was given to Lamia by a master spearman, who she idolized and was secretly in love with, when she defeated him in battle. It is made using a special ore, and has a calming effect on the wearer.

IT_EQ_LAMI_WING.NAME: Crimson Winged Headband
IT_EQ_LAMI_WING.EXPR: [Lamia/Dragon Cavalier+ Equipment] AGI +16, CRIT +14, DEX +20, Wind Res +1
IT_EQ_LAMI_WING.FLAVOR: A winged headband used by Lamia to hold back her long hair. It was given to her by her master when she joined the knighthood, and she has worn it ever since. In battle it is said to grant courage to one's allies and strike fear in the hearts of one's foes.

IT_EQ_LAMI_STATUE.NAME: Vengeful Valkyrie Figurine
IT_EQ_LAMI_STATUE.EXPR: [Lamia/Dragon Cavalier+ Equipment] Stun Res +25, Paralyze Res +25, Sleep Res +25, Petrify Res +25, LUCK +10
IT_EQ_LAMI_STATUE.FLAVOR: This Valkyrie figurine was created by a renowned sculptor from Wratharis, who gave it to Lamia to congratulate her on being commended by the kingdom for her service in battle. When touched, music plays and the Valkyrie rotates.

IT_EQ_CHAL_GATLING.NAME: Gatling Heaven
IT_EQ_CHAL_GATLING.EXPR: [Caris/Sniper+ Equipment] PATK +38, CRIT +20, DEX +30, Fire Res +1, Paralyze Res +15, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_CHAL_GATLING.FLAVOR: Created by a mage-engineer from Little Heaven, this prototype model fires magic bullets at a breathtakingly high speed. Combining mobility with the destructive power of a Gatling gun, this weapon defies conventional wisdom and strikes fear in the hearts of all those who see it in battle.

IT_EQ_CHAL_JACKET.NAME: Thunder Gang Jacket
IT_EQ_CHAL_JACKET.EXPR: [Caris/Sniper+ Equipment] PDEF +26, HP +40, Poison Res +7, Fire Res +1
IT_EQ_CHAL_JACKET.FLAVOR: This jacket is part of the uniform of a mercenary group that Caris once belonged to. It was woven using a special fiber that is virtually untearable, no matter how roughly it is treated. Caris always wears it, but apparently this is actually because she really likes the red lining.

IT_EQ_CHAL_SUNGLASSES.NAME: Rider's Glasses
IT_EQ_CHAL_SUNGLASSES.EXPR: [Caris/Sniper+ Equipment] CRIT +16, DEX +34, LUCK +18, Dark Res +1, Blind Res +5
IT_EQ_CHAL_SUNGLASSES.FLAVOR: These goggles were originally designed with dust and sunlight protection in mind, but they've come to be known in biker circles as a symbol of biking spirit. This is because they are worn by Caris, who is considered the founder of Alchemia biking.

IT_EQ_CHAL_TIRE.NAME: Magic Wheel
IT_EQ_CHAL_TIRE.EXPR: [Caris/Sniper+ Equipment] PATK +21, AGI +6, Sleep Res +7, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_CHAL_TIRE.FLAVOR: An Alchemia Bike wheel. It channels Alchemia from the motor to create the bike's driving force. The surplus output is so great that it causes the whole tire to glow with a blue light. The bigger and brighter this light is, the higher the output.

IT_EQ_CHAL_BOOTS.NAME: Maiden's Boots
IT_EQ_CHAL_BOOTS.EXPR: [Caris/Sniper+ Equipment] HP +36, CRIT +9, AGI +4, Water Res +1
IT_EQ_CHAL_BOOTS.FLAVOR: These luxury boots are worn by female gunners. They have been woven from a fiber that repels magic bullets, and provide excellent protection for the feet and lower legs during even the most intense of gunfights. Caris wears them in order to help guard her bike's motor, as well.

IT_EQ_CHAL_BELT.NAME: Ammo Belt
IT_EQ_CHAL_BELT.EXPR: [Caris/Sniper+ Equipment] MDEF +22, Petrify Res +7, LUCK +18, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_CHAL_BELT.FLAVOR: A belt and pouch worn by Caris. The pouch contains repair tools and items, and was always carried by her when she traveled on her bike. The buckle also has an Alchemia-boosting effect.

IT_EQ_CANO_HAIR_ORNAMENTS.NAME: Memento Hairpin
IT_EQ_CANO_HAIR_ORNAMENTS.EXPR: [Kanon/Apprentice Paladin-Only Equipment] PDEF +3, MDEF +4, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_CANO_HAIR_ORNAMENTS.FLAVOR: This hairpin was given to Kanon before she was orphaned. It constantly emits a sacred glow. Being given it is one of her earliest memories, and it is all she has left of her family. It is imbued with blessings that protect the wearer against danger and misfortune.

IT_EQ_CANO_SHOES.NAME: Holy Order Boots
IT_EQ_CANO_SHOES.EXPR: [Kanon/Apprentice Paladin-Only Equipment] PATK +13, AGI +1, DEX +5, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_CANO_SHOES.FLAVOR: Boots such as these are worn by followers of the Holy Order of Babel. All the material used, from the fabric to the laces, has been blessed by the Holy Order. Not only do these boots boost the wearer's physical agility, they also provide protection against dark energy.

IT_EQ_CANO_CLOTHES.NAME: Dress of Blessings
IT_EQ_CANO_CLOTHES.EXPR: [Kanon/Apprentice Paladin-Only Equipment] PDEF +10, MDEF +4, HP +18, Dark Res +2, Charm Res +4, Sleep Res +4, Slow Res +4
IT_EQ_CANO_CLOTHES.FLAVOR: This dress was given to Kanon by the Holy Order when she became a knight-in-training. It's her favorite outfit, and has been imbued with the same blessings as the Holy Order Boots, meaning that it also provides protection against dark energy.

IT_EQ_CANO_SCABBARD.NAME: Holy Order's Scabbard
IT_EQ_CANO_SCABBARD.EXPR: [Kanon/Apprentice Paladin-Only Equipment] PATK +28, HP +22, DEX +13, CRIT +10, Dark Res +2, Charm Res +10, Sleep Res +10, Slow Res +10
IT_EQ_CANO_SCABBARD.FLAVOR: Scabbards such as this are supplied to all paladins, including trainee ones. The sense of duty that it imparts on the wearer is said to hone his or her powers of concentration and awaken dormant strength from within.

IT_EQ_CADA_CLOAK.NAME: Dragoon's Cape
IT_EQ_CADA_CLOAK.EXPR: [Cadanova/Dragon Slayer-Only Equipment] PDEF +12, MDEF +12, HP +60, Fire Res +2, Wind Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_CADA_CLOAK.FLAVOR: A cape worn by Cadanova, the Flame Dragon King. It was given to him by his master, and is said to be the very same cape that appears in a tale of a legendary dragon-slayer. It is woven from a mysterious material that is immune to flames, and provides increased resistance against Fire and Wind.

IT_EQ_CADA_ARMOR.NAME: Black Dragon Armor
IT_EQ_CADA_ARMOR.EXPR: [Cadanova/Flame Dragon King-Only Equipment] PDEF +16, PATK +18, HP +65, AGI +4, Fire Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_CADA_ARMOR.FLAVOR: Armor worn by Cadanova, the Flame Dragon King. It is made from a metal that contains a special ore that can only be found near the mouths of active volcanoes. It is said to be immune to the flames of dragons, and also boosts the wearer's physical agility.

IT_EQ_ROFI_FI_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Flaming Grimoire
IT_EQ_ROFI_FI_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: [Lofia/Chronomancer+-only Equipment] MATK +20, HP +30, CRIT +12, Poison Res +7, Fire Res +1, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_ROFI_FI_GRIMOIRE.FLAVOR: This forbidden grimoire was written by a witch who was said to have mastered fire magic better than any other before her. The ingenious fire magic techniques contained inside boost the owner's magical power and grant increased resistance against Poison and Fire.

IT_EQ_ROFI_WA_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Ice Blade Grimoire
IT_EQ_ROFI_WA_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: [Lofia/Chronomancer+-only Equipment] PDEF +12, HP +38, Charm Res +7, Water Res +1
IT_EQ_ROFI_WA_GRIMOIRE.FLAVOR: This forbidden grimoire was written by a witch who was said to have mastered water magic better than any other before her. The ingenious water magic techniques contained inside boost the owner's magical power and grant increased resistance against Charm and Water.

IT_EQ_ROFI_WI_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Whirlwind Grimoire
IT_EQ_ROFI_WI_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: [Lofia/Chronomancer+-only Equipment] PDEF +10, MDEF +12, AGI +2, Paralyze Res +7, Wind Res +1
IT_EQ_ROFI_WI_GRIMOIRE.FLAVOR: This forbidden grimoire was written by a witch who was said to have mastered wind magic better than any other before her. The ingenious wind magic techniques contained inside boost the owner's magical power and grant increased resistance against Paralyze and Wind.

IT_EQ_ROFI_TH_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Thunder Grimoire
IT_EQ_ROFI_TH_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: [Lofia/Chronomancer+-only Equipment] HP +32, DEX +18, Sleep Res +7, Thunder Res +1
IT_EQ_ROFI_TH_GRIMOIRE.FLAVOR: This forbidden grimoire was written by a witch who was said to have mastered lightning magic better than any other before her. The ingenious lightning magic techniques contained inside boost the owner's magical power and grant increased resistance against Sleep and Thunder.

IT_EQ_ROFI_SH_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Brilliant Grimoire
IT_EQ_ROFI_SH_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: [Lofia/Chronomancer+-only Equipment] MATK +16, LUCK +20, AGI +3, Petrify Res +7, Light Res +1
IT_EQ_ROFI_SH_GRIMOIRE.FLAVOR: This forbidden grimoire was written by a witch who was said to have mastered light magic better than any other before her. The ingenious light magic techniques contained inside boost the owner's magical power and grant increased resistance against Petrify and Light.

IT_EQ_ROFI_DA_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Grimoire of Eternal Darkness
IT_EQ_ROFI_DA_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: [Lofia/Chronomancer+-only Equipment] MATK +16, MDEF +12, Stun Res +7, Dark Res +1
IT_EQ_ROFI_DA_GRIMOIRE.FLAVOR: This forbidden grimoire was written by a witch who was said to have mastered dark magic better than any other before her. The ingenious dark magic techniques contained inside boost the owner's magical power and grant increased resistance against Stun and Dark.

IT_EQ_KAI_RUDDER.NAME: Navigator's Wheel
IT_EQ_KAI_RUDDER.EXPR: [Pirate-Only Equipment] HP +50, PATK +9, PDEF +6, LUCK +9, Jewels Obtained +3, Water Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_KAI_RUDDER.FLAVOR: This charm, shaped like a ship's wheel, was made to commemorate the first man to ever conquer the oceans, who is renowned among all those who set out onto the sea. It is customarily worn for good luck, and is said to grant protection against Water.

IT_EQ_KAGU_DRESS.NAME: Spring Dawn Kimono
IT_EQ_KAGU_DRESS.EXPR: [Kagura/Flame-Orb Princess-Only Equipment] MATK +18, MDEF +12, AGI +1, Water Res +1, Fire Res +1, Petrify +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_KAGU_DRESS.FLAVOR: Kagura's favorite kimono. Popular among the young women of Wadatsumi, this fashionable item of clothing is created using traditional methods from the region. It is said to grant the wearer increased resistance against Fire and Water.

IT_EQ_KUDH_ARMOR.NAME: Dark Shell-Armor
IT_EQ_KUDH_ARMOR.EXPR: [Kudanstein/Demonic Spearman-Only Equipment] HP +40, PATK +10, DEX +12, LUCK +6, Light Res +1, Jewels +9, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_KUDH_ARMOR.FLAVOR: Kudan's trusty armor. It offers only sparse protection, and is designed mainly with ease of movement in mind. At the same time, it symbolizes the fact that an experienced lancer has no need for heavy armor. When worn it is said to increase resistance against Light.

IT_EQ_SEK_CLOE_DRAGON_SCALE.NAME: Dragon Scale
IT_EQ_SEK_CLOE_DRAGON_SCALE.FLAVOR: This armored jacket can only be equipped by Dragoons, whose defensive powers match that of a mighty dragon. It has been crafted from the scales of a dragon, and is said to grant protection against enemy attacks by boosting the body's resistance against magic.

IT_EQ_SEK_CLOE_LOINCLOTH.NAME: Devil's Waistgarb
IT_EQ_SEK_CLOE_LOINCLOTH.FLAVOR: This waistguard is often worn by skilled Masurao swordsmen. It is adorned with a demon mask traditionally worn by the Selian people. It grants the wearer magical protection, sharpens the senses, and enables more agile movement.

IT_EQ_DILG_SWORD.NAME: Justice Sword
IT_EQ_DILG_SWORD.EXPR: [Dilga/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] PATK +20, DEX +16, CRIT +12, Jewels Obtained +3, Initial Jewels +10, Charm Res +15, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_DILG_SWORD.FLAVOR: Dilga's trusty sword. He was awarded it by the king in recognition of his services to the Royal Knighthood. It is a symbol of justice, and serves as a constant reminder of the trust and hope placed in him by the king, reinforcing his spirits. As well as raising attack power and so forth, it is also said to grant increased resistance against Charm attacks.

IT_EQ_DILG_SHIELD.NAME: Justice Shield
IT_EQ_DILG_SHIELD.EXPR: [Dilga/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] PDEF +30, HP +32, MDEF +12, Wind Res +1, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_DILG_SHIELD.FLAVOR: Dilga's trusty shield. A weapons dealer acquaintance of his ordered it for him specially when he joined the Royal Knighthood. Not only does this sturdy shield provide increased defensive power, it is also said to boost resistance against Fire and Wind magic.

IT_EQ_DILG_ARMOR.NAME: Justice Armor
IT_EQ_DILG_ARMOR.EXPR: [Dilga/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +50, PDEF +30, MDEF +12, LUCK +9, Water Res +1
IT_EQ_DILG_ARMOR.FLAVOR: Dilga's trusty armor. He has it regularly adjusted to account for his ever-growing frame, a result of his constant training. Not only does it increase his stamina and defensive power, it is also said to grant increased resistance against Water magic.

IT_EQ_DILG_BUSTLE.NAME: Muscle Bustle
IT_EQ_DILG_BUSTLE.EXPR: [Dilga/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +32, MDEF +12, PDEF +10, Initial Jewels +10, Paralyze Res +7, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_DILG_BUSTLE.FLAVOR: Dilga's trusty hip guard. You'll never find a sturdier piece of armor than this--it's designed to offer the best possible protection against critical blows that might render him unable to continue combat. Not only does it raise stamina and defensive power, it is also said to grant increased resistance against Paralyze and Poison attacks.

IT_EQ_DILG_GRIEVE.NAME: Justice Greaves
IT_EQ_DILG_GRIEVE.EXPR: [Dilga/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +32, PDEF +16, LUCK +12, Sleep Res +7, Light Res +1
IT_EQ_DILG_GRIEVE.FLAVOR: Dilga's trusty leg greaves. They're extremely well-made--they need to be to support Dilga's huge frame! Not only do they boost his stamina and luck, they're also said to provide increased resistance against Sleep attacks and Light magic.

IT_EQ_DILG_GAUNTLET.NAME: Muscle Gauntlet
IT_EQ_DILG_GAUNTLET.EXPR: [Dilga/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] PDEF +28, CRIT +14, DEX +12, Stun Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_DILG_GAUNTLET.FLAVOR: Dilga's trusty gauntlet. It provides good protection for his precious sword hand, allow him to focus on unleashing powerful attacks. Not only does it boost defensive power, critical rate, and dexterity, it is also said to provide increased resistance against Petrify and Stun attacks.

IT_EQ_LAEV_JACKET.NAME: Laeva Jacket
IT_EQ_LAEV_JACKET.EXPR: [Laevateinn/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +32, PDEF +12, AGI +5, Water Res +3, Wind Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_LAEV_JACKET.FLAVOR: Laevateinn's trusty jacket. It may not look like it'll aid the wearer's defensive ability in any way, but it in fact provides not only a boost to defensive power but also a sizable one to stamina, as well as increased resistance against Water and Wind magic.

IT_EQ_LAEV_PATCH.NAME: Ragnarok Crest
IT_EQ_LAEV_PATCH.EXPR: [Laevateinn/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] MATK +16, MDEF +10, HP +30, DEX +18, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_LAEV_PATCH.FLAVOR: This badge is emblazoned with the emblem of the Ragnarok Church, which Laevateinn is a member of. It has been purified by the church, and as a result is said to raise not only the wearer's defensive and offensive power but also his or her resistance against Charm.

IT_EQ_LAEV_PLANT.NAME: Yggdrasil Plant
IT_EQ_LAEV_PLANT.EXPR: [Laevateinn/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] PATK +40, AGI +4, LUCK +12, Poison Res +7, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_LAEV_PLANT.FLAVOR: A miniature replica of the Tree of Yggdrasil, which lies at the center of the continent of Ragna and has a strong connection to Laevateinn. The vast mana energy flowing inside it is said to raise the bearer's luck and physical agility, and to also provide increased resistance against Poison and Stun attacks.

IT_EQ_LAEV_MANA.NAME: Laeva Mana Seed
IT_EQ_LAEV_MANA.EXPR: [Laevateinn/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] MDEF +12, Fire Res +1, Water Res +1, Wind Res +1, Thunder Res +1
IT_EQ_LAEV_MANA.FLAVOR: Laevateinn's mana seed. Such seeds contain an Alchemia-like substance known as mana. Because of this, they are said to not only boost defensive ability against magic but to also provide increased resistance against a range of different elemental attacks.

IT_EQ_LAEV_SHIELD.NAME: Laeva Edge Shield
IT_EQ_LAEV_SHIELD.EXPR: [Laevateinn/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +48, PDEF +12, CRIT +28, Fire Res +1, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_LAEV_SHIELD.FLAVOR: This bladed shield bears a design depicting Laevateinn's trusty sword. As well as increasing defensive ability and stamina, the blades attached to it boost the bearer's critical hit rate. It is also said to increase resistance against fire magic and paralysis attacks.

IT_EQ_LAEV_DOLL.NAME: Vidofnir Doll
IT_EQ_LAEV_DOLL.EXPR: [Laevateinn/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] PATK +50, DEX +20, CRIT +14, MATK +10, AGI +4
IT_EQ_LAEV_DOLL.FLAVOR: This rubber ducky was named "Vidofnir" by Laevateinn after the bird that she has long dreamed of defeating. As a result of her extreme determination, simply holding this rubber duck is said to increase her attack power, critical hit rate, and other stats.

IT_EQ_FLAM_PATO.NAME: Ikupasuy
IT_EQ_FLAM_PATO.EXPR: [Flamel/Beast Tamer+ Equipment] PATK +20, CRIT +12, MATK +6, DEX +10, Wind Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_FLAM_PATO.FLAVOR: A ceremonial stick used in sacred rituals of communication between humans and gods or spirits. Sticks such as this are made using wood from a remote forest in the Saga Region that lies far from civilization. This item also symbolizes Flamel's love for his hometown, and you could say that it's part of the source of his power.

IT_EQ_FLAM_BAG.NAME: Universal Bag
IT_EQ_FLAM_BAG.EXPR: [Flamel/Beast Tamer+ Equipment] LUCK +12, HP +40, MATK +16, DEX +12, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_FLAM_BAG.FLAVOR: Flamel--who is ordinarily something of a recluse--always carries this bag with him when he leaves his home. Apparently, as it holds so much, Flamel secretly worries that he now carries too many items in it...

IT_EQ_FLAM_BELT.NAME: Woodland Belt
IT_EQ_FLAM_BELT.EXPR: [Flamel/Beast Tamer+ Equipment] CRIT +14, HP +24, PATK +20, PDEF +12, Water Res +1
IT_EQ_FLAM_BELT.FLAVOR: This belt is always worn by the slender Flamel. It takes advantage of the natural characteristics of the material used, and is very comfortable. It also increases the wearer's strength and critical hit rate.

IT_EQ_FLAM_BOOTS.NAME: Woodland Boots
IT_EQ_FLAM_BOOTS.EXPR: [Flamel/Beast Tamer+ Equipment] AGI +5, DEX +18, LUCK +10, Bind Res +7, Fire Res +3
IT_EQ_FLAM_BOOTS.FLAVOR: These knee-length boots are worn by Flamel. They provide good protection for the legs, and are perfect for traveling through woods and wilderness. Apparently, Flamel chose these stylish-looking boots in order to encourage himself to go outside more.

IT_EQ_FLAM_COAT.NAME: Coat of Sorcery
IT_EQ_FLAM_COAT.EXPR: [Flamel/Beast Tamer+ Equipment] HP +32, PDEF +12, MDEF +12, Wind Res +1, Thunder Res +1
IT_EQ_FLAM_COAT.FLAVOR: This coat is worn by Flamel to protect himself against the cold and other such troublesome things. It provides good defense against both physical and magical attacks. When he does go outside, Flamel can often be seen with his head nervously tucked down inside this coat's collar...

IT_EQ_FLAM_EAR.NAME: Lapin Earring
IT_EQ_FLAM_EAR.EXPR: [Flamel/Beast Tamer+ Equipment] AGI +3, PATK +9, MDEF +12, Charm Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_FLAM_EAR.FLAVOR: This earring has been designed especially for Flamel's long ears. It further boosts his birth-given abilities, and when worn apparently grants him a sense of calm and security, increasing his resistance against seduction and petrification.

IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_DRESS.NAME: Sacred Dress
IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_DRESS.EXPR: [Kanon/Paladin Equipment] PDEF +10, HP +18, MDEF +4, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_DRESS.FLAVOR: This dress was given to Kanon to congratulate her on becoming an official member of the Holy Guard. It remains almost completely unruffled even amidst the fiercest of battles, and provides increased defense, as well as boosting Dark resistance.

IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_PAD.NAME: Saintly Pauldron
IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_PAD.EXPR: [Kanon/Paladin Equipment] HP +22, PDEF +10, DEX +5, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_PAD.FLAVOR: This sacred shoulder-guard never gets in the way, no matter how much Kanon moves around during battle. It has been blessed by the Holy Order, and as well as providing increased defense also boosts Dark resistance. It is also very effective when barging through enemy lines.

IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_GANTLET.NAME: Holy Gauntlet
IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_GANTLET.EXPR: [Kanon/Paladin Equipment] PATK +13, AGI +1, DEX +13, CRIT +10, Jewels Obtained +2, Charm Res +11, Sleep Res +4, Slow Res +4
IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_GANTLET.FLAVOR: This gauntlet was made to order for Kanon, and is designed to combine defensive ability with maneuverability. As with her shoulder guard, it has been blessed by the Holy Order, and is said to grant increased resistance against Charm attacks.

IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_MANT.NAME: Crimson Cape
IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_MANT.EXPR: [Kanon/Paladin Equipment] PATK +28, MDEF +4, PDEF +10, AGI +1, Jewels Obtained +4, Paralyze Res +7, Charm Res +10, Sleep Res +10, Slow Res +10
IT_EQ_CANO_SEI_MANT.FLAVOR: Capes of this type are given to female knights upon becoming official members of the Holy Guard. It is made from a special material that catches the wind easily. Kanon loves it, as it allows her to move much more nimbly.

IT_EQ_SEDA_DRESS.NAME: Wind-Dance Dress
IT_EQ_SEDA_DRESS.EXPR: [Seida/Venom Archer-Only Equipment] PATK +16, DEX +12, HP +10, AGI +2, Fire Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_SEDA_DRESS.FLAVOR: Dresses such as this are passed down through the ruling family of the Alize chiefdom, the indigenous people of the Saga Region. They are worn by the daughters and granddaughters of the chieftain during a ceremonial dance. Seida was given this one by her family when she joined the Holy Guard.

IT_EQ_MONZ_ARMOR.NAME: Golden Lion Armor
IT_EQ_MONZ_ARMOR.EXPR: [Monzein/Indomitable Axe Knight-Only Equipment] PATK +20, HP +40, CRIT +10, Jewels Obtained +3, Water Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_MONZ_ARMOR.FLAVOR: Monzein's trusty armor. He had it made to order especially--on account of his large physique--and he polishes and maintains it daily without fail. As well as physical protection, it is also said to provide increased resistance against Water.

IT_EQ_WOR_AX.NAME: Gigant Axe
IT_EQ_WOR_AX.EXPR: [Warrior-Only Equipment] PATK +20, HP +40, CRIT +10, Water Res +2, Paralyze Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_WOR_AX.FLAVOR: Battle-axes such as this are sought after by seasoned soldiers everywhere. Its true capabilities can only be unlocked by Warriors. As well as boosting its wearer's offensive ability, it also provides increased defense and resistance against harm.

IT_EQ_SEN_EQUIP.NAME: Spellcard Holder
IT_EQ_SEN_EQUIP.EXPR: [Astrologer-Only Equipment] MATK +20, MDEF +20, AGI +6, Jewels Obtained +5, Dark Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_SEN_EQUIP.FLAVOR: This stylish pouch is made for astrologers to store their cards in. As well as stopping cards getting lost, and boosting the wearer's agility, it also increases his or her magical power.

IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_01.NAME: Holy Flame Branch
IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_01.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess Equipment] MATK +4, AGI +1, PATK +2, HP +6, Wind Res +1
IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_01.FLAVOR: This sacred branch of offering has long been passed down through the royal family of Wadatsumi. Throughout the years, it has always been held by female royals as they perform rites of offering to the gods. It is made entirely from materials found in Wadatsumi, and the ringing of the bell attached to it serves to steel Kagura's mind.

IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_02.NAME: Holy Flame Ornament
IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_02.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess Equipment] MDEF +8, PDEF +8, HP +6, DEX +6, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_02.FLAVOR: This ritual hair ornament has long been passed down through the royal family of Wadatsumi. It is worn by female royals when they perform rites of offering to the gods. It is one of the few reminders of home that Kagura managed to take with her when she fled her country.

IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_03.NAME: Holy Flame Garb
IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_03.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess Equipment] MATK +30, AGI +2, DEX +10, LUCK +8, Silence Res +9, Petrify Res +4, Stop Res +4
IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_03.FLAVOR: This ritual garb has long been passed down through the royal family of Wadatsumi. It is worn by female royals when they perform rites of offering to the gods. For Kagura, it is a poignant reminder of the gentle warmth of her mother, the previous queen of Wadatsumi.

IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_04.NAME: Holy Flame Guardian Figurine
IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_04.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess Equipment] MATK +50, LUCK +10, Fire Res +2, Water Res +2, Silence Res +17, Petrify Res +10, Stop Res +10
IT_EQ_KAGU_DAI_04.FLAVOR: This figurine is fashioned after a divine guardian god of Wadatsumi. It was once kept by the royal family of Wadatsumi, and has seen through many a sacred ritual. Kagura is thought to have taken it with her when she fled her country, but only she knows the truth.

IT_EQ_ZAYI_ARMOR.NAME: White Knight's Garb
IT_EQ_ZAYI_ARMOR.EXPR: [Zain/Lord Commander-Only Equipment] PATK +20, MATK +50, PDEF +10, Light Res +2, Dark Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_ZAYI_ARMOR.FLAVOR: Coats such as this are issued to Lord Commanders by the Holy Order. Each coat is imbued with the will of the Lord Commander who owns it, and no one is like another. As well as all-consuming darkness, it also provides protection against blinding light.

IT_EQ_YAUL_ARMOR.NAME: Plated Dress
IT_EQ_YAUL_ARMOR.EXPR: [Yauras/Twin-Blade Knight-Only Equipment] PATK +15, AGI +6, DEX +15, CRIT +13, Fire Res +2, Jewels +6, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_YAUL_ARMOR.FLAVOR: This suit of armor is like a physical representation of "nobility." Yauras always wears it when heading into important battles, and among the knighthood it is said that she has never been seen to lose when wearing it.

IT_EQ_SYO_HORN.NAME: Earthdrake Horn
IT_EQ_SYO_HORN.EXPR: [Summoner-Only Equipment] MATK +20, Jewels +10, MDEF +18, Dark Res +2, Light Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_SYO_HORN.FLAVOR: Made from the hollowed-out horn of a dragon, the monstrous power contained within this horn causes it to emit a sound that summons a range of beasts and allows the user to control them. Not only does it boost the owner's magical attack powers, it also increases resistance against Light and Dark.

IT_EQ_SHN_RUCK.NAME: Akindo Bag
IT_EQ_SHN_RUCK.EXPR: [Merchant-Only Equipment] HP +40, PDEF +10, AGI +1, LUCK +10, Jewels Obtained +3, Thunder Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_SHN_RUCK.FLAVOR: This high-capacity, many-pocketed rucksack is intended for use by merchants. Wearing it is said to increase one's fortune in business. It also apparently boosts the wearer's stamina and defensive power, as if protecting the things inside it.

IT_EQ_MFEN_SWORD.NAME: White Serpent Blade
IT_EQ_MFEN_SWORD.EXPR: [Blademaster-Only Equipment] PATK +21, HP +40, AGI +2, DEX +20, CRIT +16, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_MFEN_SWORD.FLAVOR: Blademasters carry blades such as this mainly for defensive use, such as when ambushed, and for situations when it is not convenient to use a long sword. The white serpent wrapped around the blade is a symbol of good fortune, and they are sometimes given to the daughters of warrior families to take with them when going to be married.

IT_EQ_ACTF_MIRROR.NAME: Mysterious Mirror
IT_EQ_ACTF_MIRROR.EXPR: [Actress-Only Equipment] MATK +21, HP +24, AGI +2, LUCK +10, Jewels Obtained +3, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ACTF_MIRROR.FLAVOR: A mirror is an essential item for any actress, and this one has come to be know as a bringer of good luck. It's very sturdy and never clouds over, and apparently the Alchemia contained inside the mirror does actually boost the bearer's Luck.

IT_EQ_MIUN_MITTEN.NAME: Flame Mittens
IT_EQ_MIUN_MITTEN.EXPR: [Miuna/Master Blacksmith Equipment] HP +60, PATK +16, PDEF +10, Jewels Obtained +4, Fire Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_MIUN_MITTEN.FLAVOR: Miuna always puts on this mitten before using her hammer. She says that as long as she's wearing it, even the most violent sparks don't bother her. It apparently also contributes somehow to the force of her strikes.

IT_EQ_BASI_CLOAK.NAME: Informer Cape
IT_EQ_BASI_CLOAK.EXPR: [Basheeny/Mobile Knight-Only Equipment] PATK +18, DEX +12, AGI +10, CRIT +18, Dark Res +2, Jewels +4, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BASI_CLOAK.FLAVOR: This cloak was given to Basheeny by a certain person when he was given his first assignment as an apprentice knight. As well as its defensive capabilities, it also increases agility and dexterity, and boosts various resistances, making it invaluable when working covertly.

IT_EQ_HWIZ_KABUTO.NAME: Extravagant Helmet
IT_EQ_HWIZ_KABUTO.EXPR: [Battle Mage-Only Equipment] HP +30, PDEF +20, MATK +16, MDEF +6, Max Jewels +10, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_HWIZ_KABUTO.FLAVOR: This helmet is a required piece of ceremonial wear. It is designed for Battle Mages, who possess high concentrations of Alchemia and magical energy inside them. It raises the wearer's maximum Jewels, allowing them to most effectively use their powers at important ceremonies.

IT_EQ_ALEX_DRIP.NAME: Eerie Drip Set
IT_EQ_ALEX_DRIP.EXPR: [Alexis/Bishop+ Equipment] Poison Res +11, Stun Res +11, Paralyze Res +11, Sleep Res +11, Petrify Res +11
IT_EQ_ALEX_DRIP.FLAVOR: Alexis is constantly connected to this drip. Apparently he carries several packs of fluid on him at all times to ensure that he never runs out. It has never been used by anyone else, so the validity of its effects is uncertain, but it is said to boost the body's resistance in a range of ways.

IT_EQ_ALEX_HOOD.NAME: Feeble Doctor's Hood
IT_EQ_ALEX_HOOD.EXPR: [Alexis/Bishop+ Equipment] MATK +26, LUCK +12, AGI +3, Blind Res +11, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_ALEX_HOOD.FLAVOR: Alexis wears this hood low to guard against bright light. He has been using it for many years, but he treats it very well and it shows no significant signs of wear. It is made of a special material found in the Saga Region that boosts resistance against Dark and Fire magic.

IT_EQ_ALEX_CLOTHES.NAME: Feeble Doctor's Garb
IT_EQ_ALEX_CLOTHES.EXPR: [Alexis/Bishop+ Equipment] MDEF +26, PDEF +26, LUCK +9, Dark Res +2, Light Res +2
IT_EQ_ALEX_CLOTHES.FLAVOR: Alexis is very sensitive to the cold, and wears this thick garb to keep himself warm. Its white sleeves show up bloodstains extremely clearly, but although Alexis claims to find the frequent washing that this necessitates very tedious, he seems to like the garb enough that he's prepared to put up with it.

IT_EQ_ALEX_BOOTS.NAME: Feeble Doctor's Boots
IT_EQ_ALEX_BOOTS.EXPR: [Alexis/Bishop+ Equipment] AGI +3, MDEF +26, CRIT +14, Water Res +2, Thunder Res +2
IT_EQ_ALEX_BOOTS.FLAVOR: The sturdy boots that support Alexis's not-so-sturdy legs. They're very well made, and won't tear under regular circumstances. As well as of course raising agility, they also play a part in boosting the wearer's critical rate and magical defense.

IT_EQ_ALEX_MEDICINES.NAME: Eerie Medicine
IT_EQ_ALEX_MEDICINES.EXPR: [Alexis/Bishop+ Equipment] MATK +26, CRIT +6, DEX +12, LUCK +12, Poison Res +11
IT_EQ_ALEX_MEDICINES.FLAVOR: Alexis carries these vials of medicine with him at all times. They may look pretty shady, but they're in fact extraordinarily effective. He carries all the medicines that he's likely to have a need for on his person, but if caught unprepared he'll also use these to concoct additional ones.

IT_EQ_ALEX_DAGGER.NAME: Eerie Dagger
IT_EQ_ALEX_DAGGER.EXPR: [Alexis/Bishop+ Equipment] PATK +16, AGI +3, CRIT +9, DEX +10, Wind Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_ALEX_DAGGER.FLAVOR: Alexis always carries this dagger at his waist. He claims to use it only occasionally, for cutting up materials and the like, but seems to be quite a deft hand with it. He keeps it well-maintained, and it looks perfectly capable of inflicting a fatal wound.

IT_EQ_ZEKE_SHEILD.NAME: Crowley Shield
IT_EQ_ZEKE_SHEILD.EXPR: [Zeke/Holy Cavalier Equipment] HP +40, PATK +8, PDEF +10, MDEF +8, LUCK +9, AGI +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_ZEKE_SHEILD.FLAVOR: After the Dawn of Wrath, Zeke took up arms to protect his comrades, and began carrying this shield. It helps minimize harms to his allies and can also be used to strike foes--an effective defensive and offensive item.

IT_EQ_MARE_DOLL.NAME: Li'l Woody
IT_EQ_MARE_DOLL.EXPR: [Mia/Sage+ Equipment] HP +80, MATK +16, PATK +16, LUCK +12, Dark Res +2, Light Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_MARE_DOLL.FLAVOR: Mia's constant companion, Woody. To Mia he's like a family member and a close friend in one. He is in fact a puppet, animated using witchcraft, but saying this out loud around Mia will cause her to become speechless with rage.

IT_EQ_MARE_ONEPIECE.NAME: Classical Dress
IT_EQ_MARE_ONEPIECE.EXPR: [Mia/Sage+ Equipment] Max Jewels +30, MDEF +16, PDEF +30, DEX +20, Dark Res +1, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_MARE_ONEPIECE.FLAVOR: Mia's favorite dress. It comes with a detachable neck scarf. She loves its subdued colors and moderate frills, and wearing it never fails to lift her spirits. It's also a very effective item in terms of both defense and resistance.

IT_EQ_MARE_BOOTS.NAME: Classical Boots
IT_EQ_MARE_BOOTS.EXPR: [Mia/Sage+ Equipment] AGI +3, DEX +20, CRIT +9, Wind Res +2, Blind Res +7
IT_EQ_MARE_BOOTS.FLAVOR: Mia's beloved boots. She insists that wearing them makes her feel lighter and more agile. They grant the wearer a firm and steady step, even amid total darkness or raging winds.

IT_EQ_MARE_ARMLET.NAME: Cross Armlets
IT_EQ_MARE_ARMLET.EXPR: [Mia/Sage+ Equipment] CRIT +14, LUCK +12, MATK +38, Jewels Obtained +10, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_MARE_ARMLET.FLAVOR: A pair of armlets that Mia wears together with her dress. She chose them to match the cross on the front of the dress, and if she doesn't wear them together with it she apparently becomes restless and uneasy.

IT_EQ_MARE_RABBIT.NAME: Bunny Familiar
IT_EQ_MARE_RABBIT.EXPR: [Mia/Sage+ Equipment] MDEF +16, AGI +4, DEX +20, Max Jewels +20, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_MARE_RABBIT.FLAVOR: Mia creates spectral rabbits such as this one using witchcraft. She summons them and pretends they're her family in order to distract her from her loneliness. As with Woody, though, pointing this out is of course guaranteed to incur Mia's wrath.

IT_EQ_MARE_BROOCH.NAME: Cross Brooch
IT_EQ_MARE_BROOCH.EXPR: [Mia/Sage+ Equipment] AGI +4, CRIT +9, MATK +20, Paralyze Res +7, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_MARE_BROOCH.FLAVOR: Mia wears this cross-shaped brooch on her chest at all times, though she usually keeps it hidden under her scarf. It is in fact one of the few mementos she has to remember her parents by; under regular circumstances it wouldn't have been given to her until she was a little older.

IT_EQ_VAL_WING.NAME: Valkyrie Headdress
IT_EQ_VAL_WING.EXPR: [Valkyrie-Only Equipment] HP +40, PATK +18, PDEF +10, MDEF +15, AGI +3, Dark Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_VAL_WING.FLAVOR: A divine headdress worn by Valkyries. It's sturdier than it looks, and regular attacks won't damage it at all. When worn it heightens the wearer's bond with her comrades, as well as boosting defensive power and resistance.

IT_EQ_ANAS_BLADE.NAME: Blade Blossom
IT_EQ_ANAS_BLADE.EXPR: [Anastasia/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] PATK +28, MATK +16, CRIT +12, DEX +18, Light Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_ANAS_BLADE.FLAVOR: This greatsword was made by a master craftsman especially for Anastasia, "Wratharis's secret weapon." The sword almost seems to have its own will, and will stubbornly refuse to manifest its power when taken in hand by anyone other than Anastasia.

IT_EQ_ANAS_GANTLET.NAME: Bloom Gauntlet
IT_EQ_ANAS_GANTLET.EXPR: [Anastasia/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] PATK +14, DEX +10, CRIT +15, LUCK +12, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_ANAS_GANTLET.FLAVOR: This gauntlet fits Anastasia perfectly. In part due to her great agility, it bears virtually no marks. Not only does it aid the wearer in producing powerful attacks, it also grants increased luck and resistance against Fire magic.

IT_EQ_ANAS_BARRETTA.NAME: Rose's Barrette
IT_EQ_ANAS_BARRETTA.EXPR: [Anastasia/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +32, PDEF +14, CRIT +10, Jewels Obtained +3, Water Res +1
IT_EQ_ANAS_BARRETTA.FLAVOR: The barrette that Anastasia wears in her hair. It is adorned with a rose motif that symbolizes Anastasia herself. It mainly provides her with physical benefits. She apparently secretly takes great delight in subtly changing its ornamentations according to the different seasons.

IT_EQ_ANAS_MAIL.NAME: Bloom Dressmail
IT_EQ_ANAS_MAIL.EXPR: [Anastasia/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +50, PDEF +10, MDEF +12, Dark Res +1, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_ANAS_MAIL.FLAVOR: This dress was tailored especially for Anastasia by a dressmaker who saw her not as a "secret weapon" but as a regular woman. It was crafted with wholehearted wishes for her safety and wellbeing in mind, and brings her a range of different blessings and protections.

IT_EQ_ANAS_BOOTS.NAME: Rose's High Boots
IT_EQ_ANAS_BOOTS.EXPR: [Anastasia/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] PDEF +10, AGI +6, Petrify Res +7, Paralyze Res +7, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_ANAS_BOOTS.FLAVOR: The boots that Anastasia wears in battle. It is said that the ringing of their approaching heels is like a death sentence for Anastasia's foes, plunging all those who hear it into a state of utter despair.

IT_EQ_ANAS_BLOSSOM.NAME: Mark of Blossom
IT_EQ_ANAS_BLOSSOM.EXPR: [Anastasia/Dark Cavalier+ Equipment] PATK +9, MDEF +12, AGI +10, Wind Res +1, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_ANAS_BLOSSOM.FLAVOR: This emblem is worn by Anastasia when on the battlefield, in order to ensure that the Wratharis troops do not mistake her for an enemy. Any enemy soldier who spots it will instantly turn tail and flee, but this is, of course, in vain...

IT_EQ_NEC_STORNE.NAME: Spirit Gravestone
IT_EQ_NEC_STORNE.EXPR: [Necromancer-Only Equipment] PATK +15, HP +30, Jewels +10, Dark Res +2, Debuff Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_NEC_STORNE.FLAVOR: Numerous spirits sleep within this gravestone. When the stone is used by a spirit-tamer, these spirits will lend him or her their powers. When the user passes away, his or her spirit and powers are also absorbed by the stone, ready to be imparted to its next owner.

IT_EQ_OTHI_ARMOR.NAME: Wizardry Coat
IT_EQ_OTHI_ARMOR.EXPR: [Othima/Phantom Master Equipment] HP +15, PDEF +9, MATK +18, MDEF +15, Charm Res +7, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_OTHI_ARMOR.FLAVOR: Othima's trusty coat. It's a versatile piece of equipment--in battle it serves as a strong defensive item, and he can also use it like a blanket when having a nap. Its seams have torn in several places due to heavy use, but Othima always carefully sews them back together.

IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_EMBLEM.NAME: Elite Guard's Emblem
IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_EMBLEM.EXPR: [Kanon/Elite Knight Equipment] HP +5, MATK +3, CRIT +5, Dark Res +2, Jewels Earned +2
IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_EMBLEM.FLAVOR: This emblem is worn by members of the elite guard, who are selected from the Holy Order. When worn it braces the body and mind, granting the wearer the firm heart to make it through ever more arduous missions.

IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_NECKLACE.NAME: Holy Sword Pendant
IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_NECKLACE.EXPR: [Kanon/Elite Knight Equipment] HP +8, PATK +15, AGI +2, DEX +14, Jewels Obtained +5
IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_NECKLACE.FLAVOR: This sword-shaped pendant was given to Kanon by the Lord Commander when she joined the elite guard. It is imbued with the power of all the successive Lord Commanders, and serves to boost the wearer's agility and physical attack power.

IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_STATUE.NAME: Holy Knight's Maiden Figurine
IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_STATUE.EXPR: [Kanon/Elite Knight Equipment] HP +25, PATK +23, PDEF +10, MATK +10, AGI +5, Charm Res +15, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_CANO_LOAD_STATUE.FLAVOR: Figurines such as this are awarded to those who do well in the Holy Order's training. They're considered very valuable, and even captains don't receive them unless their results are particularly good. When held in the hand they are said to fill the bearer with surging confidence.

IT_EQ_MICH_STAFF.NAME: Archmage Staff
IT_EQ_MICH_STAFF.EXPR: [Michael/Professor+ Equipment] MATK +24, PATK +16, CRIT +9, Dark Res +2, Light Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_MICH_STAFF.FLAVOR: This staff is made from the Alchemia-rich wood of a tree many hundreds of years old. It cannot be used by just anyone--only the mightiest of mages are able to wield it, and Michael is the only one in Lustburg who is able to equip it.

IT_EQ_MICH_GLASSES.NAME: Archmage Glasses
IT_EQ_MICH_GLASSES.EXPR: [Michael/Professor+ Equipment] DEX +16, LUCK +24, PDEF +30, PATK +16, Blind Res +11
IT_EQ_MICH_GLASSES.FLAVOR: Michael's glasses. He claims that they're fitted with special lenses that allow him to see the flow of Alchemia, but to all intents and purposes he seems to wear them because he's farsighted...

IT_EQ_MICH_HAT.NAME: Archmage Hat
IT_EQ_MICH_HAT.EXPR: [Michael/Professor+ Equipment] HP +32, MATK +12, Paralyze Res +11, Stun Res +11, Poison Res +11
IT_EQ_MICH_HAT.FLAVOR: Michael's trusty magic hat. It can only be worn by very powerful mages. As well as providing a high degree of protection against cold, rain, and the sun's rays, most importantly of all it makes the wearer less likely to become inflicted with status ailments.

IT_EQ_MICH_CLOAK.NAME: Archmage Cape
IT_EQ_MICH_CLOAK.EXPR: [Michael/Professor+ Equipment] PDEF +20, HP +42, MDEF +18, DEX +12, Paralyze Res +11
IT_EQ_MICH_CLOAK.FLAVOR: This cape was awarded to Michael by the king in recognition of his services. For all those who see it, it is a clear sign that the wearer is a mage of high standing, even in Lustburg, where women are generally valued above men.

IT_EQ_MICH_BOOK.NAME: Archmage Book
IT_EQ_MICH_BOOK.EXPR: [Michael/Professor+ Equipment] MATK +12, MDEF +18, DEX +12, Fire Res +2, Petrify Res +11
IT_EQ_MICH_BOOK.FLAVOR: This magic text was compiled by Michael, and is a result of his own research. Many of the spells contained within it can only be used by him, and he always carries it close. Apparently, the book will actually refuse to open for anyone except Michael.

IT_EQ_MICH_RING.NAME: Archmage Ring
IT_EQ_MICH_RING.EXPR: [Michael/Professor+ Equipment] AGI +2, LUCK +12, Water Res +2, Charm Res +11, Sleep Res +11
IT_EQ_MICH_RING.FLAVOR: This ring symbolizes a contract made between Michael and a water spirit. When worn it apparently summons this playful spirit, who helps out Michael in combat.

IT_EQ_BALT_TWIN_SWORD.NAME: Cyclone's Twin Edge
IT_EQ_BALT_TWIN_SWORD.EXPR: [Balt/Twin-Blade Swordsman+ Equipment] PATK +20, AGI +3, CRIT +16, HP +36, Jewels +6, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_BALT_TWIN_SWORD.FLAVOR: These twin blades are the source of the name "Cyclone Balt." Their large blades, combined with Balt's powerful swing, produce a slash so strong that it could indeed almost be mistaken for a raging cyclone. They were made to fit Balt's hands, and they raise his attack power and so forth.

IT_EQ_BALT_BOOTS.NAME: Desert Boots
IT_EQ_BALT_BOOTS.EXPR: [Balt/Twin-Blade Swordsman+-Only Equipment] AGI +3, PDEF +18, CRIT +12, PATK +16, Wind Res +2
IT_EQ_BALT_BOOTS.FLAVOR: These exquisitely crafted boots allow the wearer to travel swiftly across sinking sands. As well as providing excellent functionality, they are beautifully designed, and when wearing them Balt stands out clearly, even amid a sandstorm when only his feet can be seen. They grant the wearer both high mobility and increased defense.

IT_EQ_BALT_BOTTOM.NAME: Desert Weave Cloth
IT_EQ_BALT_BOTTOM.EXPR: [Balt/Twin-Blade Swordsman+ Equipment] HP +36, MDEF +24, DEX +20, Water Res +2, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_BALT_BOTTOM.FLAVOR: These pantaloons have been woven using a traditional method known as Sakur. They protect the wearer's body against heat and sand, boosting stamina. Items woven using this method are highly valued by desert peoples and nomads in arid regions--not only articles of clothing but also rugs, bags, and the like.

IT_EQ_BALT_JACKET.NAME: Desert Weave Jacket
IT_EQ_BALT_JACKET.EXPR: [Balt/Twin-Blade Swordsman+ Equipment] HP +36, PDEF +18, MATK +16, Fire Res +2, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_BALT_JACKET.FLAVOR: This hooded jacket has been woven using a traditional method known as Sakur. It is an extremely well-made piece, and guards the wearer's body against the harsh desert sun and heat. People decorate these jackets in different ways, and the various sounds that these ornamentations make allows the wearer to be easily distinguished.

IT_EQ_BALT_BANDANA.NAME: Carthamus Bandana
IT_EQ_BALT_BANDANA.EXPR: [Balt/Twin-Blade Swordsman+-only Equipment] DEX +12, CRIT +14, PATK +10, LUCK +12, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_BALT_BANDANA.FLAVOR: This bandana has been dyed using a flower known as a Carthamus that grows in arid regions. Articles dyed with the flower's petals are said to ward off harmful desert insects and the like. Apparently, all desert people own at least one Carthamus-dyed item.

IT_EQ_BALT_MEDALLION.NAME: Hawk Medallion
IT_EQ_BALT_MEDALLION.EXPR: [Balt/Twin-Blade Swordsman+-only Equipment] AGI +3, LUCK +6, Stun Res +7, Sleep Res +7, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_BALT_MEDALLION.FLAVOR: This medallion is engraved with the image of a hawk. All members of the Sand Hawks are said to wear one somewhere on their bodies. Its power is activated by the bond between comrades, granting each of the members increased resistance against various ailments.

IT_EQ_CHIH_OGI.NAME: Oracle's Fan
IT_EQ_CHIH_OGI.EXPR: [Chihaya/Dancer+ Equipment] PATK +20, AGI +6, DEX +10, CRIT +18, MDEF +12, Jewels Obtained +3, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_CHIH_OGI.FLAVOR: This fan is used by Chihaya when she dances. Her dancing represents the battling gods of Wadatsumi, and trying to interfere with it can easily result in unexpected injury. The bell on the fan's handle rings with a beautiful, clear tone.

IT_EQ_CHIH_DRESS.NAME: Oracle's Garb
IT_EQ_CHIH_DRESS.EXPR: [Chihaya/Dancer+ Equipment] PDEF +12, HP +32, MDEF +12, Petrify Res +7, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_CHIH_DRESS.FLAVOR: The clothes worn by Chihaya when performing rituals or heading into crucial battles. They serve to soften the impact of blows to the body, and are said to increase the wearer's powers of concentration. A unique item, crafted by one of the most renowned dressmakers in Wadatsumi.

IT_EQ_CHIH_ACCESSORY.NAME: Winged Ornament
IT_EQ_CHIH_ACCESSORY.EXPR: [Chihaya/Dancer+-Only Equipment] MDEF +12, PDEF +12, HP +24, PATK +10, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_CHIH_ACCESSORY.FLAVOR: A hair ornament worn by Chihaya. It was clearly made by an expert in his craft--it's sturdy, but feels light, allowing it to be worn in any situation without being a hindrance. Furthermore, it grants the wearer divine protection that increases resistance against Dark magic.

IT_EQ_CHIH_GETA.NAME: Frivolous Clogs
IT_EQ_CHIH_GETA.EXPR: [Chihaya/Dancer+ Equipment] AGI +7, HP +24, Paralyze Res +7, Stun Res +7, Water Res +2
IT_EQ_CHIH_GETA.FLAVOR: Chihaya's trusty clogs. They're a one-off piece, made especially for her, and apparently allow such smooth movement that it feels as if she's floating above the ground as she walks. They also provide resistance against water, which means they can safely be worn on rainy days, too.

IT_EQ_CHIH_MARI.NAME: Festival's Orb
IT_EQ_CHIH_MARI.EXPR: [Chihaya/Dancer+ Equipment] DEX +20, CRIT +16, Sleep Res +7, Light Res +2, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_CHIH_MARI.FLAVOR: A ball used in "kemari," a traditional ball game played in Wadatsumi as a ritual of offering to the gods. Chihaya usually keeps it hidden away, so others rarely get a chance to see it. As the ball's owner, she practices in secret so that she's able to kick it high up into the sky.

IT_EQ_CHIH_HAIRPIN.NAME: Exquisite Hairpin
IT_EQ_CHIH_HAIRPIN.EXPR: [Chihaya/Dancer+ Equipment] LUCK +12, PATK +20, AGI +6, Charm Res +7, Wind Res +2
IT_EQ_CHIH_HAIRPIN.FLAVOR: This hairpin was created especially for Chihaya by a master craftsman. It is modelled in the shape of a sweet osmanthus flower, which in Wadatsumi is said to represent nobility. Although the humble Chihaya will insist bashfully that there's nothing "noble" about her, she does love the hairpin itself.

IT_EQ_KAM_MAGATAMA.NAME: Jeweled Choker
IT_EQ_KAM_MAGATAMA.EXPR: [Priestess-Only Equipment] HP +34, MDEF +18, LUCK +36, Jewels +15, Dark Res +2, Jewels Obtained +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_KAM_MAGATAMA.FLAVOR: Necklaces such as this are used by priestesses in order to facilitate divine communication. The comma-shaped jewel that hangs from it contains an extremely high concentration of Alchemia, and those who lack sufficient training are thus unable to even wear the necklace. Apparently the string and the additional jewels and shells adorning it are a way for the priestess to express her own individuality.

IT_EQ_KAGU2_PEARL.NAME: Lantern Orbs
IT_EQ_KAGU2_PEARL.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess+ Equipment] MATK +50, PATK +16, Water Res +5, Petrify Res +20, Sleep Res +7, Stop Res +10, Silence Res +10
IT_EQ_KAGU2_PEARL.FLAVOR: These flaming orbs are controlled by Kagura. Each one of them contains powerful Alchemia, and now that she's older Kagura is able to use them to release devastating magical attacks. During combat they reach very high temperatures, and touching one is sure to cause a serious burn.

IT_EQ_KAGU2_DRESS.NAME: Angelic Robe
IT_EQ_KAGU2_DRESS.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess+ Equipment] MDEF +12, PDEF +12, AGI +3, LUCK +5, Blind Res +7
IT_EQ_KAGU2_DRESS.FLAVOR: This robe was made specially for Kagura after her sudden growth spurt. At her explicit request, careful attention has been paid to its style and ease of movement. It also serves to protect her against a range of different attacks, both physical and magical.

IT_EQ_KAGU2_SLEEVE.NAME: Anti-Magic Sleeve
IT_EQ_KAGU2_SLEEVE.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess+ Equipment] MATK +16, LUCK +12, CRIT +9, Fire Res +2, Silence Res +7
IT_EQ_KAGU2_SLEEVE.FLAVOR: This protective sleeve covers from the upper arm down to the wrist. It's extremely flexible, and stretches together with the wearer's arm, meaning that it never comes loose, even during the most intense combat. It has been made from a pure white material that is imbued with abundant magical energy, and is said to steer Kagura away from impending danger.

IT_EQ_KAGU2_SHOES.NAME: Anti-Magic Leg Ornament
IT_EQ_KAGU2_SHOES.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess+ Equipment] AGI +4, DEX +10, CRIT +14, Light Res +1, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_KAGU2_SHOES.FLAVOR: This set consists of knee-length stockings and traditional geta clogs. They are said to secrete a magical power that wards off danger, protecting the wearer against both physical and mental harm. When Kagura was younger they were too big for her, but now that's she's grown they're an astonishingly perfect fit.

IT_EQ_KAGU2_BELL.NAME: Scarlet Sash String
IT_EQ_KAGU2_BELL.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess+ Equipment] HP +8, DEX +12, AGI +3, Wind Res +1, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_KAGU2_BELL.FLAVOR: The sash string used to tie Kagura's kimono. It's a deep, fiery scarlet color, which suits Kagura to a tee, seeing as she herself wields flames in combat. The bell hanging from its tip is apparently just for decoration. When worn it braces the body, granting great lightness of foot.

IT_EQ_KAGU2_COMB.NAME: Anti-Magic Hairpin
IT_EQ_KAGU2_COMB.EXPR: [Kagura/Blaze-Orb Princess+ Equipment] HP +6, PDEF +12, LUCK +7, Jewels +10, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_KAGU2_COMB.FLAVOR: This comb is used to hold up Kagura's long hair. It has been crafted from the wood of a spirit tree said to be hundreds of years old, and grants the wearer a range of blessings. Perhaps due to the protection against dark energy that it grants, Kagura apparently feels calm and secure when she's wearing it.

IT_EQ_LOGI_SWORD.NAME: Innocent Blade
IT_EQ_LOGI_SWORD.EXPR: [Logi/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] PATK +40, MATK +20, CRIT +26, AGI +3, Petrify Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_LOGI_SWORD.FLAVOR: Zeke gave Logi this blade to congratulate him on joining the Blue Flame Guard. The day he received it--his first sword of his own--he was apparently so excited that he was unable to sleep that night. Its silver blade is as straight and true as Logi himself.

IT_EQ_LOGI_ARMOR.NAME: Blue Dragon Knight Armor
IT_EQ_LOGI_ARMOR.EXPR: [Logi/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +40, PDEF +20, MDEF +12, Charm Res +7, Poison Res +5
IT_EQ_LOGI_ARMOR.FLAVOR: Logi received this armor when he joined the Blue Flame Guard. There were several different colors available to choose from, but Logi went for this shining white variation, which to him represents pure and undefiled justice.

IT_EQ_LOGI_BOOTS.NAME: Blue Dragon Knight Boots
IT_EQ_LOGI_BOOTS.EXPR: [Logi/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] HP +36, AGI +3, DEX +28, LUCK +21, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_LOGI_BOOTS.FLAVOR: Logi received these boots when he joined the Blue Flame Guard. They match the shining white of his armor, which means that on some expeditions they can quickly become badly stained. Even so, Logi apparently doesn't mind this, and enjoys wiping them clean and seeing the sparkling white underneath.

IT_EQ_LOGI_GAUNTLET.NAME: Blue Dragon Knight Gauntlets
IT_EQ_LOGI_GAUNTLET.EXPR: [Logi/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] MATK +12, HP +32, DEX +28, CRIT +26, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_LOGI_GAUNTLET.FLAVOR: Logi received these gauntlets when he joined the Blue Flame Guard. They protect his arms against attacks, and to him are invaluable. He cleans and maintains them well, and the variety of scratches that cover them aren't really even noticeable.

IT_EQ_LOGI_SHIELD.NAME: Brave Shield
IT_EQ_LOGI_SHIELD.EXPR: [Logi/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] PDEF +24, MDEF +12, LUCK +21, Sleep Res +7, Thunder Res +1
IT_EQ_LOGI_SHIELD.FLAVOR: Logi's shield is the same color as his hair. Even when going deep into enemy territory, as long as he's carrying it he says that he is never scared. Dias and Agatha often tease him for the great pride that he takes in it.

IT_EQ_LOGI_EMBLEM.NAME: Crimson Emblem
IT_EQ_LOGI_EMBLEM.EXPR: [Logi/Holy Cavalier+ Equipment] Light Res +1, Dark Res +1, Fire Res +1, Water Res +1, Wind Res +1
IT_EQ_LOGI_EMBLEM.FLAVOR: This medallion is modeled after Logi's shield. When acting in their capacity as members of the Blue Flame Guard, all knights are required to wear medals such as this. Each medal is a symbol of its wearer's pride, and they also allow the knights to easily distinguish each other.

IT_EQ_EDGA_GUN.NAME: Lady Betty
IT_EQ_EDGA_GUN.EXPR: [Edgar/Drifter+-Only Equipment] PATK +20, DEX +24, CRIT +26, AGI +2, Thunder Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_EDGA_GUN.FLAVOR: Edgar's trusty Sloth-made revolver. He has even given it a name, "Lady Betty," and never lets a day go by without carefully cleaning and maintaining it. The fact that it never malfunctions despite its age is thanks to Edgar's love and attention.

IT_EQ_EDGA_JACKET.NAME: Rotation Jacket
IT_EQ_EDGA_JACKET.EXPR: [Edgar/Drifter+-Only Equipment] HP +38, PDEF +12, MDEF +12, Poison Res +7, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_EDGA_JACKET.FLAVOR: Thick leather jackets such as this can be purchased across Slothstein. They're pretty durable considering their low price, and Edgar always wears this one when he's working. The cuffs of the sleeves can be turned back for extra stylishness.

IT_EQ_EDGA_BOOTS.NAME: Spurred Boots
IT_EQ_EDGA_BOOTS.EXPR: [Edgar/Drifter+-Only Equipment] AGI +2, CRIT +14, DEX +24, LCK +18, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_EDGA_BOOTS.FLAVOR: These ubiquitous leather boots can be found for purchase across Slothstein. Edgar sometimes goes to some pretty dangerous places, and he has to make sure his feet are well-protected in order to avoid any unnecessary injuries.

IT_EQ_EDGA_SCARF.NAME: Cogwheel Scarf
IT_EQ_EDGA_SCARF.EXPR: [Edgar/Drifter+-Only Equipment] HP +22, PATK +20, LCK +18, AGI +2, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_EDGA_SCARF.FLAVOR: The stylish scarf that Edgar wears around his neck. He wears it because he says that otherwise being dressed completely in leather makes him look too drab. He in fact has several different-colored variants, but this purple one is his absolute favorite.

IT_EQ_EDGA_HOLSTER.NAME: Gyro Holster
IT_EQ_EDGA_HOLSTER.EXPR: [Edgar/Drifter+-Only Equipment] PDEF +8, MDEF +20, DEX +22, Sleep Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_EDGA_HOLSTER.FLAVOR: A standard gun hostler of the type that can be seen across Slothstein. For Edgar, it's one of his most important work tools, and he becomes agitated if he doesn't have it on.

IT_EQ_EDGA_ROSE.NAME: Sweet Rose
IT_EQ_EDGA_ROSE.EXPR: [Edgar/Drifter+-Only Equipment] LCK +12, CRIT +10, MATK +20, Dark Res +2, Charm Res +11
IT_EQ_EDGA_ROSE.FLAVOR: A single red rose--the item that Edgar most commonly picks as a gift for a woman. Edgar never talks about the first person he gave a rose to, but apparently it was a famous dancing girl.

IT_EQ_RAHU_POT.NAME: Oriental Pots
IT_EQ_RAHU_POT.EXPR: [Rahu/Chronomancer+ Equipment] MATK +16, PATK +16, AGI +4, Dark Res +2, Blind Res +7, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_RAHU_POT.FLAVOR: Rahu always wears these cute little pots on her head. They fit her rolled-up buns perfectly, holding them firmly in place. Apparently, when she gets really mad, steam rises from their spouts...

IT_EQ_RAHU_SCARF.NAME: Desert Scarf
IT_EQ_RAHU_SCARF.EXPR: [Rahu/Chronomancer+ Equipment] MDEF +20, AGI +3, DEX +10, Light Res +2, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_RAHU_SCARF.FLAVOR: Rahu wears this scarf around her neck at all times to protect herself against sandstorms. She wears it folded up like a scarf, but when spread out it's pretty big,, and she sometimes also uses it as a shawl on cold nights.
