IT_EQ_RAHU_CLOTHES.NAME: Magic Skirt
IT_EQ_RAHU_CLOTHES.EXPR: [Rahu/Chronomancer+ Equipment] HP +30, PDEF +12, DEX +9, Wind Res +2, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_RAHU_CLOTHES.FLAVOR: Rahu designed and made this skirt herself, and has imbued it with magical energy. Apparently she was a little short on materials after making her flying carpet, which explains the skimpy design of the top half of the outfit.

IT_EQ_RAHU_BOOT.NAME: Simoon Heels
IT_EQ_RAHU_BOOT.EXPR: [Rahu/Chronomancer+ Equipment] AGI +4, LUCK +12, DEX +12, Stun Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_RAHU_BOOT.FLAVOR: The cute little high heels that Rahu wears on her feet. They have pointed toes, like many shoes found in desert regions, and are adorned with little fluffy balls. They come with matching anklets, and are one of Rahu's favorite possessions.

IT_EQ_RAHU_CARPET.NAME: Magic Carpet
IT_EQ_RAHU_CARPET.EXPR: [Rahu/Chronomancer+ Equipment] PDEF +16, AGI +4, Max HP +15, MDEF +12, LUCK +12
IT_EQ_RAHU_CARPET.FLAVOR: Rahu's handmade flying carpet, which she wears around her like a skirt. Her magical powers aren't strong enough for soaring through the sky, and when she does try to fly on the carpet she hovers along at a light jogging speed.

IT_EQ_RAHU_LAMP.NAME: Magic Lamp
IT_EQ_RAHU_LAMP.EXPR: [Rahu/Chronomancer+ Equipment] MATK +16, LUCK +12, Paralyze Res +7, Sleep Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_RAHU_LAMP.FLAVOR: The Rahu's trusty partner, Mr. Lamp. The two of them are always together. Mr. Lamp is Rahu's mentor, and he always looks out for her. She's also the only person who can understand what he's saying.

IT_EQ_POLL_STAFF.NAME: Adorable Staff
IT_EQ_POLL_STAFF.EXPR: [Polin/Bard+ Equipment] MATK +12, PATK +10, Jewels Obtained +3, Poison Res +7, Fire Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_POLL_STAFF.FLAVOR: Polin carries this magic staff with her at all times. Apparently she's unable to pull off her magic-based selective flower breeding properly without it. She changes the ribbons attached to its handle according to her mood.

IT_EQ_POLL_HEADDRESS.NAME: Flower Headdress
IT_EQ_POLL_HEADDRESS.EXPR: [Polin/Bard+ Equipment] MATK +16, PDEF +12, HP +30, Wind Res +1, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_POLL_HEADDRESS.FLAVOR: This headdress was given to Polin by her friends. Polin loves flowers more than anything, and this headdress is adorned with elaborate artificial ones. The perfect gift for a girl who's trying to grow flowers in bitter-cold Lustburg.

IT_EQ_POLL_CAPE.NAME: Velvet Cape
IT_EQ_POLL_CAPE.EXPR: [Polin/Bard+ Equipment] HP +24, MDEF +30, PDEF +16, LUCK +12, Fire Res +1
IT_EQ_POLL_CAPE.FLAVOR: This cape, which comes together with a matching corset dress, has been imbued with special magic that holds in warmth. It was a present to Polin from her friends, who were worried about the way she was so absorbed in tending to her flowers in the dead of winter.

IT_EQ_POLL_BOOT.NAME: Sheepskin Boots
IT_EQ_POLL_BOOT.EXPR: [Polin/Bard+ Equipment] AGI +3, DEX +18, LUCK +9, Water Res +1, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_POLL_BOOT.FLAVOR: These warm and fluffy sheepskin boots are decorated with Polin's favorite--little pink ribbons. She fell in love with them the moment she saw them, and seems very proud of the fact that they allow her to stride confidently across even the slippiest snow or ice. Polin's a more practical young lady than you might first think!

IT_EQ_POLL_CORSAGE.NAME: Flowery Corsage
IT_EQ_POLL_CORSAGE.EXPR: [Polin/Bard+ Equipment] PATK +12, AGI +4, DEX +24, CRIT +24, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_POLL_CORSAGE.FLAVOR: Polin was given this magical corsage for her birthday. It uses magical energy to stop the pink rose on it from withering. Apparently Polin loves the rose so much that she doesn't wear the corsage and keeps it tucked away safely.

IT_EQ_POLL_FLOWER.NAME: Rosette Necklace
IT_EQ_POLL_FLOWER.EXPR: [Polin/Bard+ Equipment] PATK +18, DEX +12, CRIT +12, Stun Res +7, Charm Res +9
IT_EQ_POLL_FLOWER.FLAVOR: This necklace is adorned with a pink rose--Polin's favorite. She made it herself, and it was actually the first piece of rose-themed jewelry that she ever created. She apparently finds it a little crude to look at now, but it's a simple and attractive piece.

IT_EQ_ONM_SOUBI.NAME: Hidden Scroll
IT_EQ_ONM_SOUBI.EXPR: [Spy-Only Equipment] PATK +24, DEX +24, AGI +4, CRIT +8, Stop Res +7, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_ONM_SOUBI.FLAVOR: This scroll is enscribed with a forbidden art. Its use is only permitted when running into unexpected danger during covert activities. It is held firmly between the teeth of a demon, and cannot be used by one who does not possess the strength to first break the mask to free it.

IT_EQ_WEA_SOUBI.NAME: Kurima Chapo
IT_EQ_WEA_SOUBI.EXPR: [Diviner-Only Equipment] MATK +16, MDEF +20, AGI +2, LCK +16, Water Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_WEA_SOUBI.FLAVOR: This hat is made exclusively for Diviners, who are able to manipulate the weather. It offers complete and total head protection and comfort against all the elements--be it scorching sun, relentless rain, wailing winds, or swirling snow.

IT_EQ_LUCA_TWIN_SWORD.NAME: Alchemic Kukri
IT_EQ_LUCA_TWIN_SWORD.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] HP +40, PATK +36, MATK +16, DEX +12, CRIT +16, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_LUCA_TWIN_SWORD.FLAVOR: This kukri knife is engraved with a pattern that allows Alchemia particles to flow easily along its blade, efficiently combining the bearer's power with that of the Alchemia. Lucian himself had it made to order to his own weight and length specifications, and it's a beautiful piece.

IT_EQ_LUCA_HOOD.NAME: Soldier's Shemagh
IT_EQ_LUCA_HOOD.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] HP +40, PDEF +20, DEX +30, LCK +12, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_LUCA_HOOD.FLAVOR: This shemagh scarf is worn over the head or around the neck in order to guard against desert heat and sandstorms. Its modest design and inconspicuous coloring mean it doesn't get in the way during combat. The coins hanging from it are actually made from fabric, and are completely silent.

IT_EQ_LUCA_SCARF.NAME: Desolate Muffler
IT_EQ_LUCA_SCARF.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] HP +36, MDEF +12, AGI +3, CRIT +16, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_LUCA_SCARF.FLAVOR: Because Lucian is such an individualist, he deliberately chose this distinctive, purple-colored scarf so that he'd stand out. He probably should have gone for a less conspicuous color, like his shemagh, but he does find that being clad in this noble purple helps him steel himself.

IT_EQ_LUCA_CLOTH.NAME: Riot Gear
IT_EQ_LUCA_CLOTH.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] HP +50, CRIT +16, DEX +24, Fire Res +3, Water Res +1
IT_EQ_LUCA_CLOTH.FLAVOR: Lucian's combat gear, which also serves as his workwear. At first glance it looks no more remarkable than the other garish garms worn by many desert people, but it is in fact designed to provide optimal ease-of-movement during combat, as well as protection against both heat and cold. The waistband has been designed to match his purple scarf.

IT_EQ_LUCA_PANTS.NAME: Crest Charm
IT_EQ_LUCA_PANTS.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] PATK +24, PDEF +16, AGI +3, Wind Res +1, Jewels Obtained +1
IT_EQ_LUCA_PANTS.FLAVOR: Lucian wears this lucky necklace at all times. He had it made when he decided to become a mercenary, and it is crafted in the same shape as the Alchemia markings on his back. For Lucian, as a mercenary, it's like an identification tag.

IT_EQ_LUCA_SWORDS.NAME: Elphinda Guards
IT_EQ_LUCA_SWORDS.EXPR: [Lucian/Holy Brawler+-Only Equipment] Stun Res +7, Paralyze Res +7, Sleep Res +7, Petrify Res +7, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_LUCA_SWORDS.FLAVOR: Lucian freely wields these throwing daggers using the powers of Alchemia. Apparently he has a pretty large stock of them, but no one other than him knows exactly how many. They're also effectively defensively if thrown when attacked from a blind spot.

IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_01.NAME: Piercing Dawn Spear
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_01.EXPR: [Kudan/Magic Lancer+-Only Equipment] HP +38, PATK +24, DEX +24, LCK +24, Jewels Obtained +10, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_01.FLAVOR: Kudanstein's trusty lance, now clad in a dark aura. Kudan used and customized it over a long period, from before it became steeped in darkness, and it is said that no one other than him is able to use the weapon to its full potential.

IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_02.NAME: Dark Cell Shell-Armor
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_02.EXPR: [Kudan/Magic Lancer+-Only Equipment] HP +42, PDEF +12, MDEF +30, Wind Res +2, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_02.FLAVOR: Kudanstein's trusty armor, now clad in a dark aura. This light shell-armor has been designed mainly with ease-of-movement in mind, but the dark aura surrounding it means that it now provides ample protection.

IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_03.NAME: Dark Cell Armor
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_03.EXPR: [Kudan/Magic Lancer+-Only Equipment] HP +28, PDEF +20, LCK +12, AGI +3, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_03.FLAVOR: Kudanstein's trusty leg greaves, now clad in a dark aura. These leg greaves are designed to allow for agile movement, but the dark aura around them means that they now also provide increased defensive power and protection against paralysis.

IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_04.NAME: Dark Cell Cleaver
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_04.EXPR: [Kudan/Magic Lancer+-Only Equipment] PATK +18, DEX +30, CRIT +30, Water Res +2, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_04.FLAVOR: Kudanstein's trusty gauntlet, now clad in a dark aura. He needs it in order to best deliver swift lance thrusts and blows, and the dark aura surrounding it means that it now provides not only boosted attack power but also strengthened resistances.

IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_05.NAME: Dark Cell Mantle
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_05.EXPR: [Kudan/Magic Lancer+-Only Equipment] MATK +24, AGI +6, Fire Res +2, Light Res +2, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_05.FLAVOR: Kudanstein's trusty cloak, now clad in a dark aura. This cloak has proved invaluable during covert activities, but the dark aura now surrounding it makes it somewhat conspicuous... However, its resistance-boosting capabilities have been vastly enhanced.

IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_06.NAME: Dark Cell Scarf
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_06.EXPR: [Kudan/Magic Lancer+-Only Equipment] CRIT +24, DEX +24, AGI +6, Poison Res +7, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_KUDH_LAN2_06.FLAVOR: Kudanstein's trusty scarf, now clad in a dark aura. Kudan has worn it since before he joined the knighthood, and although it's a little worn and frayed he'd never dream of getting rid of it.

IT_EQ_FREE_LANCE.NAME: Silver Dragon Bone Spear
IT_EQ_FREE_LANCE.EXPR: [Freed/Dragon Cavalier+-Only Equipment] PATK +30, CRIT +20, HP +30, DEX +9, MATK +16, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_FREE_LANCE.FLAVOR: This spear is adorned with a silver-winged dragon crest, evidence of the bearer's position as Chief National Librarian. Apparently its handle has also been crafted from dragon bone. Although Freed, as a civil official, rarely wields it in battle, it is said to be very light and easy to use.

IT_EQ_FREE_BARRETTA.NAME: Spur Barrette
IT_EQ_FREE_BARRETTA.EXPR: [Freed/Dragon Cavalier+-Only Equipment] MDEF +18, PATK +18, DEX +10, Sleep Res +7, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_FREE_BARRETTA.FLAVOR: This barrette is made from a real bone spur taken from a dragon. This legendary beast's bones alone are very valuable, and to have developed bony spurs it must have been a large, battle-hardened creature of a fair age. Even among the army, accessories such as this are only given to the most elite troops.

IT_EQ_FREE_MEDAL.NAME: Silver-Winged Dragon Medal
IT_EQ_FREE_MEDAL.EXPR: [Freed/Dragon Cavalier+-Only Equipment] LCK +12, Jewels Obtained +4, CRIT +30, Wind Res +2, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_FREE_MEDAL.FLAVOR: This silver-winged dragon crest is evidence of the bearer's position as Chief National Librarian. It must be worn at all times when entering the closed-off area of the National Library, which contains classified national and military information. Very few people possess this level of access.

IT_EQ_FREE_BOOT.NAME: Formal Military Boots
IT_EQ_FREE_BOOT.EXPR: [Freed/Dragon Cavalier+-Only Equipment] AGI +8, DEX +24, PDEF +4, MDEF +6, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_FREE_BOOT.FLAVOR: These formal boots are worn by National Librarians, and are designed to match the rest of their formal uniform. They're made from a special material that stretches when worn so that they cover up to the thigh. Their heels and ornamentation are crafted using bone from a silver-winged dragon.

IT_EQ_FREE_FEILEADH.NAME: Formal Feria
IT_EQ_FREE_FEILEADH.EXPR: [Freed/Dragon Cavalier+-Only Equipment] HP +24, PDEF +10, AGI +4, Poison Res +7, Water Res +2
IT_EQ_FREE_FEILEADH.FLAVOR: This skirt-like waist garment is known as a kilt, and is part of the formal uniform for National Librarians. It also signifies that the wearer is a civil official, and when heading to battle it must be worn in order to distinguish them from troops.

IT_EQ_FREE_JACKET.NAME: Formal Jacket
IT_EQ_FREE_JACKET.EXPR: [Freed/Dragon Cavalier+-Only Equipment] PDEF +4, HP +30, MDEF +6, Dark Res +2, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_FREE_JACKET.FLAVOR: A formal jacket of the type worn by National Librarians. For a military jacket it's very decorative, with the bones of a silver-winged dragon used as the inspiration for its design. Freed apparently thought it a little over-the-top for a civil official at first, but grew used to it after wearing it for a while.

IT_EQ_LAHA_CLOTHES.NAME: Garb to Succeed the Demon King
IT_EQ_LAHA_CLOTHES.EXPR: [Laharl/Demon King-Only Equipment] PATK +18, AGI +8, CRIT +10, DEX +16, Charm Res +15, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_LAHA_CLOTHES.FLAVOR: These magic-infused garms are worn by the future Overlord so as to be presentable when meeting humans. What looks like a scarf is in fact his wings, transformed--as Overlord, he likes to always be able to show his wings off.

IT_EQ_ETON_CLOTHES.NAME: Etona's Imp Costume
IT_EQ_ETON_CLOTHES.EXPR: [Etna/Demonic Retainer-Only Equipment] HP +20, PATK +18, PDEF +18, DEX +16, Dark Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_ETON_CLOTHES.FLAVOR: This cute and devilish magic outfit is Etna's regular attire. She likes wearing it, but though she personally doesn't think anything of it, it's very exposing and tends to attract a lot of (mostly male) attention...

IT_EQ_PRIN2_PORCH.NAME: Prinny Pouch
IT_EQ_PRIN2_PORCH.EXPR: [Prinny/Prinny Crew-Only Equipment] PATK +10, CRIT +12, AGI +3, DEX +8, Fire Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_PRIN2_PORCH.FLAVOR: Prinnies are demons, but they are not human in form, and carry all their possessions with them at all times. This mysterious pouch boasts particularly limitless storage capacity, and apparently contains everything from fresh sardines to bombs...

IT_EQ_PRIN3_BOMB.NAME: Prinny Bomb
IT_EQ_PRIN3_BOMB.EXPR: [Prinny/Prinny General-Only Equipment] HP +18, PATK +8, PDEF +12, Fire Res +2, Water Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_PRIN3_BOMB.FLAVOR: Although Prinnies are demons, they possess less magical energy than other demons--rumor has it this is why they supplement their attack power with bombs. They apparently have no defensive power to speak of, as being hurt is a Prinny's destiny...

IT_EQ_PRIN1_BONE.NAME: Prinny Bone
IT_EQ_PRIN1_BONE.EXPR: [Prinny/Prinny God-Only Equipment] HP +12, PATK +22, PDEF +18, AGI +5, Fire Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_PRIN1_BONE.FLAVOR: Even among Prinnies--a type of demon--there are various different types of Prinny. The "Pringer Beam" is a special beam used by a particularly special type of Prinny, and this bone is said to be needed in order to fire one.

IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BROOM.NAME: Nostalgia Broom
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BROOM.EXPR: [Lisbeth/Wizard+-Only Equipment] MATK +20, MDEF +12, AGI +1, Charm Res +7, Water Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BROOM.FLAVOR: Lis carries this Broom Ace with her at all times. To her it's irreplaceable. It was once used by Katya, who gave it to Lis after she asked her to let her use it to fly to school.

IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_UNIFORM.NAME: Lust Uniform
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_UNIFORM.EXPR: [Lisbeth/Wizard+-Only Equipment] HP +16, PDEF +16, MDEF +26, Dark Res +2, Blind Res +7
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_UNIFORM.FLAVOR: This school uniform is worn by Lis when attending the Venus Academy of Magic. The warm coat and scarf, imbued with Katya's love, ensure that she never grows cold, even on the freezing streets of Lustburg.

IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BOOTS.NAME: Rouge Long Boots
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BOOTS.EXPR: [Lisbeth/Wizard+-Only Equipment] MATK +16, DEX +10, AGI +3, Paralyze Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BOOTS.FLAVOR: Lis's trusty long boots. Heavy snow is common in Lustburg, so most people there tend to wear long boots. Like her coat and scarf, they're well-made, soft, and comfy.

IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BOUQUET.NAME: Stub Rules Bouquet
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BOUQUET.EXPR: [Lisbeth/Wizard+-Only Equipment] HP +32, PATK +16, AGI +3, Stun Res +7, Wind Res +1
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BOUQUET.FLAVOR: Lis picked this bouquet of flowers for Katya after she brought up the subject of her parents. Although usually a gift given when proposing marriage, Katya apparently said that for her it signifies a family bond, which made Lis smile.

IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BARRETTE.NAME: Pretty Barrette
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BARRETTE.EXPR: [Lisbeth/Wizard+-Only Equipment] MATK +20, MDEF +20, CRIT +14, DEX +12, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BARRETTE.FLAVOR: Lisbeth's favorite hair barrette. She wears it most of the time. It's big and bold and goes well with her bright red hair. Apparently it does really hurt if you get your hair tangled up in it, though...

IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BADGE.NAME: Student Badge
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BADGE.EXPR: [Lisbeth/Wizard+-Only Equipment] Jewels +16, LCK +12, CRIT +9, AGI +3, Fire Res +5
IT_EQ_LIES_2CC_BADGE.FLAVOR: This badge signifies that the bearer is a student at Venus Academy of Magic. Lisbeth usually wears it without fail, but the one time she did forget it was the day they had a uniform check! She borrowed Alma's spare, apparently...

IT_EQ_YUAN_ARROW.NAME: Survive Arrow
IT_EQ_YUAN_ARROW.EXPR: [Yuan/Ninja+-Only Equipment] DEX +32, PATK +50, AGI +2, Jewels Obtained +2, Wind Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_YUAN_ARROW.FLAVOR: Yuan's treasured bow. He has used it for many years, and it's seen him through some pretty dangerous spots and shady missions. It's the most important thing in his life apart from Lucido, and apparently he doesn't plan on ever getting rid of it, no matter how old it gets.

IT_EQ_YUAN_BELT.NAME: Survive Belt
IT_EQ_YUAN_BELT.EXPR: [Yuan/Ninja+-Only Equipment] HP +90, PDEF +36, LCK +16, Fire Res +2, Poison Res +25
IT_EQ_YUAN_BELT.FLAVOR: The belt that Yuan wears around his waist. It's fitted with a range of professional tools, and is actually pretty heavy. His younger brother, Lucido, says it's goofy-looking, but Yuan finds it very useful and doesn't plan on getting rid of it any time soon.

IT_EQ_YUAN_GEAR.NAME: Reida's Gear
IT_EQ_YUAN_GEAR.EXPR: [Yuan/Ninja+-Only Equipment] PDEF +26, MDEF +26, HP +80, Stun Res +25, Water Res +2
IT_EQ_YUAN_GEAR.FLAVOR: Yuan's sturdy single shoulder pad. He chose it for its functionality above all else, and as a result hasn't sustained a shoulder wound since he bought it. Yuan would like Lucido to wear one as well, but Lucido isn't interested at all.

IT_EQ_YUAN_BUNDLE.NAME: Survive Bundle
IT_EQ_YUAN_BUNDLE.EXPR: [Yuan/Ninja+-Only Equipment] DEX +48, CRIT +32, LCK +26, AGI +2, Wind Res +2
IT_EQ_YUAN_BUNDLE.FLAVOR: Yuan carries this quiver with him when he heads into battle. Yuan is always practical and well-equipped, whereas his younger brother, Lucido, refuses flat-out to wear anything that doesn't look good--which is a constant source of worry for his older brother.

IT_EQ_YUAN_BOOTS.NAME: Reida's Boots
IT_EQ_YUAN_BOOTS.EXPR: [Yuan/Ninja+-Only Equipment] AGI +6, DEX +20, MDEF +32, Sleep Res +25, Paralyze Res +25
IT_EQ_YUAN_BOOTS.FLAVOR: Yuan wears these boots to protect his feet. He treasures them for their particularly thick soles, which help prevent needless injuries during battle. He often worries that the pointy tipped shoes worn by Lucido must be hurting his feet...

IT_EQ_YUAN_BLADE.NAME: Survive Blade
IT_EQ_YUAN_BLADE.EXPR: [Yuan/Ninja+-Only Equipment] PATK +50, AGI +2, CRIT +32, Charm Res +25, Petrify Res +25
IT_EQ_YUAN_BLADE.FLAVOR: Yuan carries these knives concealed around his body. They have a wide range of uses, so he always makes sure he has plenty spare. Lucido, on the other hand, finds the thought of having a knife hidden on your body scary because you might cut yourself...

IT_EQ_ARKI_HOOKAH.NAME: Sabel Shisha
IT_EQ_ARKI_HOOKAH.EXPR: [Arkil/Magic Swordsman+-Only Equipment] MDEF +24, MATK +26, LCK +16, Paralyze Res +7, Fire Res +3, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_ARKI_HOOKAH.FLAVOR: This fabled shisha pipe increases magical energy. It's used only with special tobacco that has a high concentration of Alchemia, and purified water. Arkil likes nothing more than relaxing with a smoke after a hard day's work.

IT_EQ_ARKI_TURBAN.NAME: Sabre Turban
IT_EQ_ARKI_TURBAN.EXPR: [Arkil/Magic Swordsman+-Only Equipment] PDEF +24, MATK +26, AGI +2, Poison Res +7, Water Res +3
IT_EQ_ARKI_TURBAN.FLAVOR: The ornate turban that adorns Arkil's head. The long piece of fabric hanging down from it that flutters in the wind is like his trademark. Not only is it beautiful, it's made from a very strong material that firmly guards/protects the head.

IT_EQ_ARKI_JACKET.NAME: Sabel Veston
IT_EQ_ARKI_JACKET.EXPR: [Arkil/Magic Swordsman+-Only Equipment] HP +36, PDEF +12, AGI +1, Charm Res +7, Wind Res +3
IT_EQ_ARKI_JACKET.FLAVOR: This colorful jacket is worn by Arkil. Its sleeves are made from a luxurious and highly flexible material that allows for incredible ease-of-movement. The shoulders, neck, and other important areas are embroidered and set with metal plates, and it offers excellent defensive capabilities.

IT_EQ_ARKI_GAUNTLET.NAME: Sabel Bracelet
IT_EQ_ARKI_GAUNTLET.EXPR: [Arkil/Magic Swordsman+-Only Equipment] PATK +32, CRIT +14, DEX +10, Stun Res +7, Thunder Res +3
IT_EQ_ARKI_GAUNTLET.FLAVOR: The gauntlet that adorns and protects Arkil's upper arm. Apparently Arkil doesn't wear it for its defensive capabilities at all, though--it's purely worn as a bracelet, in order to accentuate his outfit as a whole.

IT_EQ_ARKI_BOOTS.NAME: Sabel Hightops
IT_EQ_ARKI_BOOTS.EXPR: [Arkil/Magic Swordsman+-Only Equipment] HP +36, MATK +20, AGI +2, Sleep Res +7, Light Res +3
IT_EQ_ARKI_BOOTS.FLAVOR: Renowned for their comfort, these desert boots grant the ability to walk with ease in even the harshest of desert environments. Arkil's whole outfit is coordinated, with his turban as the focal point, and he apparently had these boots made-to-order especially to match it.

IT_EQ_ARKI_REVOLVER.NAME: Sabel Revolver
IT_EQ_ARKI_REVOLVER.EXPR: [Arkil/Magic Swordsman+-Only Equipment] PATK +32, MATK +20, CRIT +12, Petrify Res +7, Dark Res +3
IT_EQ_ARKI_REVOLVER.FLAVOR: The revolver that Arkil carries for self-defense purposes. As you'd expect from Arkil, who always pays adequate attention to beauty as well as function, its barrel is a glittering gold and its grip bears a beautiful engraving.

IT_EQ_SUTO_SAVER.NAME: Guilty Scimitar
IT_EQ_SUTO_SAVER.EXPR: [Strie/Assassin+-Only Equipment] PATK +24, AGI +6, CRIT +20, Jewels Obtained +4, Max Jewels +6, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_SUTO_SAVER.FLAVOR: Strie's beloved scimitar. She claims that this is simply because it suits her so well, but it's far more than just a decoration--its blade is like her partner, and has seen her safely out of more than one tight spot.

IT_EQ_SUTO_HAT.NAME: Carmine Hat
IT_EQ_SUTO_HAT.EXPR: [Strie/Assassin+-Only Equipment] PDEF +16, HP +30, DEX +16, Water Res +2, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_SUTO_HAT.FLAVOR: The extravagant hat worn by Strie. She likes it so much that she actually purchased it through legal means. The only times she ever takes it off outside are in order to arrange her hair, or to thank her opponent when winning big at gambling.

IT_EQ_SUTO_CLOTHES.NAME: Risky Cross
IT_EQ_SUTO_CLOTHES.EXPR: [Strie/Assassin+-Only Equipment] PDEF +12, HP +40, AGI +4, Wind Res +2, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_SUTO_CLOTHES.FLAVOR: The clothes worn by Strie for both work and battle. They're functional, but as Strie likes to be surrounded by luxurious and extravagant things at all times, they're naturally beautiful and gorgeous as well.

IT_EQ_SUTO_COAT.NAME: Carmine Coat
IT_EQ_SUTO_COAT.EXPR: [Strie/Assassin+-Only Equipment] HP +40, PDEF +16, MDEF +6, Fire Res +2, Poison Res +10
IT_EQ_SUTO_COAT.FLAVOR: The coat worn by Strie. The first thing you notice is the vivid color of its lining, which is apparently worth more than a year's wage for a regular person on its own. It's also very useful when you need to hide your hands when doing something underhand...

IT_EQ_SUTO_TRUMP.NAME: Risky Card
IT_EQ_SUTO_TRUMP.EXPR: [Strie/Assassin+-Only Equipment] LCK +32, MDEF +8, DEX +14, Charm Res +7, Stop Res +11
IT_EQ_SUTO_TRUMP.FLAVOR: Strie carries these cards with her at all times. She throws them at her opponents to dazzle them and divert their attacks, and they're sharp enough to cut through soft objects. She says she doesn't use them to cheat at cards, but whether this is true or not is uncertain.

IT_EQ_SUTO_ACCE.NAME: Guilty Jewels
IT_EQ_SUTO_ACCE.EXPR: [Strie/Assassin+-Only Equipment] CRIT +36, MATK +16, AGI +4, Petrify Res +7, Stun Res +10
IT_EQ_SUTO_ACCE.FLAVOR: The jewels worn by Strie. Everything she wears is elegant, extravagant, and expensive. To Strie they signify her chasing her dream as a gambler, and they're worth far more to her than their monetary value.

IT_EQ_DIOS_SWORD.NAME: Desire Blade
IT_EQ_DIOS_SWORD.EXPR: [Dias/Dark Cavalier+-Only Equipment] PATK +19, MATK +16, AGI +3, CRIT +16, Petrify Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_DIOS_SWORD.FLAVOR: Dias had this sword made when he joined the Holy Guard. When he did, he vowed to never again let any harm come to anyone or anything he cared about. It uses a special design, and is very keen and easy to use.

IT_EQ_DIOS_JACKET.NAME: Paladin's Black Armor
IT_EQ_DIOS_JACKET.EXPR: [Dias/Dark Cavalier+-Only Equipment] HP +26, MDEF +22, AGI +6, CRIT +12, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_DIOS_JACKET.FLAVOR: Dias has modified this armor, which he received when he joined the Holy Guard. There were various different-colored variations available, but Dias chose this jet-black one, which to him symbolizes a strong and determined will. He cleans and maintains it every night without fail.

IT_EQ_DIOS_BOOTS.NAME: Paladin's Black Boots
IT_EQ_DIOS_BOOTS.EXPR: [Dias/Dark Cavalier+-Only Equipment] HP +26, AGI +8, DEX +16, CRIT +16, LCK +14
IT_EQ_DIOS_BOOTS.FLAVOR: These knights' boots were given to Dias when he joined the Holy Guard. The color matches the rest of his equipment, so depending on what sort of environment they're stationed in he can be quite difficult for his comrades to spot. Apparently he finds this useful in order to strike his foes unsuspected, though.

IT_EQ_DIOS_GAUNTLET.NAME: Paladin's Black Gauntlet
IT_EQ_DIOS_GAUNTLET.EXPR: [Dias/Dark Cavalier+-Only Equipment] HP +26, PATK +16, PDEF +16, MATK +16, MDEF +16
IT_EQ_DIOS_GAUNTLET.FLAVOR: This gauntlet was given to Dias when he joined the Holy Guard. For Dias, who has a habit of rushing in, sword swinging, it offers indispensable protection for his sword arm. Upon careful inspection you can see that it's covered in nicks and scratches of all sizes.

IT_EQ_DIOS_SHIELD.NAME: Black Wall
IT_EQ_DIOS_SHIELD.EXPR: [Dias/Dark Cavalier+-Only Equipment] PDEF +36, MDEF +26, Stun Res +7, Paralyze Res +7, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_DIOS_SHIELD.FLAVOR: Dias's trusty black shield. He's been using it since long before he joined the Holy Guard, back when he was an apprentice knight in the Blue Flame Guard. He often says that with this shield alone he can protect everything dear to him. You can tell that that he's always liked black, too...

IT_EQ_DIOS_EMBLEM.NAME: Jet Emblem
IT_EQ_DIOS_EMBLEM.EXPR: [Dias/Dark Cavalier+-Only Equipment] Dark Res +1, Fire Res +1, Water Res +1, Wind Res +1, Thunder Res +1
IT_EQ_DIOS_EMBLEM.FLAVOR: This medallion is modeled after Dias's black shield. All knights are required to wear medals such as this when acting in their capacity as members of the Holy Guard. Each medal is a symbol of the chivalric vow its wearer has taken, and they also allow the knights to easily distinguish each other.

IT_EQ_VANE_KNIFE.NAME: Mistress Edge
IT_EQ_VANE_KNIFE.EXPR: [Vanekis/Sage+-Only Equipment] MATK +24, PATK +16, DEX +30, CRIT +15, Blind Res +7, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_VANE_KNIFE.FLAVOR: Vanekis carries this small blade hidden on her person. She apparently keeps it in her garter stockings, by her inner thigh, but no one has actually seen her pull it out and lived to tell the tale.

IT_EQ_VANE_CLOTHES.NAME: Mistress Dress
IT_EQ_VANE_CLOTHES.EXPR: [Vanekis/Sage+-Only Equipment] HP +36, PDEF +18, MDEF +18, Water Res +2, Wind Res +2
IT_EQ_VANE_CLOTHES.FLAVOR: Vanekis always wears this dress when she's in her bar. She loves its design, which she thinks perfectly combines the sexiness and dignity required of a hostess, and her customers are all unable to tear their eyes away from her partially exposed legs...

IT_EQ_VANE_GLOVE.NAME: Mistress Glove
IT_EQ_VANE_GLOVE.EXPR: [Vanekis/Sage+-Only Equipment] MATK +16, DEX +30, CRIT +22, MDEF +16, Light Res +2
IT_EQ_VANE_GLOVE.FLAVOR: Vanekis always wears this gauntlet when she's in her bar, "La Murmure." Most of her customers are well-behaved and gentlemanly, but occasionally someone will act out of line and need throwing out, which is why she wears this.

IT_EQ_VANE_FUR.NAME: Mistress Racket
IT_EQ_VANE_FUR.EXPR: [Vanekis/Sage+-Only Equipment] HP +28, PDEF +12, LCK +18, Petrify Res +18, Dark Res +2
IT_EQ_VANE_FUR.FLAVOR: The fur accessory that Vanekis wears at her waist. It may look soft and fluffy, but its inside is actually reinforced with leather and a racket-like slab of wood. She can sometimes be spotted giving badly behaved customers a quick slap with it.

IT_EQ_VANE_BOOT.NAME: Mistress Heel
IT_EQ_VANE_BOOT.EXPR: [Vanekis/Sage+-Only Equipment] AGI +8, MDEF +16, LCK +10, Paralyze Res +7, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_VANE_BOOT.FLAVOR: Vanekis wears these platform stilettos all the time when she's in her bar. As she's not very tall, she actually needs to wear them in order to be able to stand at the bar. Apparently lots of people are shocked to see how short she is when she takes them off...

IT_EQ_VANE_ROUGE.NAME: Mistress Rouge
IT_EQ_VANE_ROUGE.EXPR: [Vanekis/Sage+-Only Equipment] MATK +20, LCK +15, Sleep Res +50, Silence Res +50, Charm Res +50
IT_EQ_VANE_ROUGE.FLAVOR: The rouge lipstick that Vanekis puts on when she needs to pull out all the stops. When working in the bar she wears a lighter color, but when formally receiving important guests or using her skills of seduction to garner information, this is her lipstick of choice.

IT_EQ_ACHA_SGUARD.NAME: Arms Storage
IT_EQ_ACHA_SGUARD.EXPR: [Acht/Seven Tactics Master-Only Equipment] HP +32, PATK +38, PDEF +16, AGI +4, Fire Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_ACHA_SGUARD.FLAVOR: This backpack is fitted with the various different attachments that Acht uses. It's pretty heavy, and apparently it took quite a while for the slightly built Acht to be able to move around freely carrying it.

IT_EQ_VIER_PIPE.NAME: Aromatic Spell Kiselle
IT_EQ_VIER_PIPE.EXPR: [Vier/Phantom Master-Only Equipment] HP +20, MATK +24, MDEF +24, Hit Rate +6, Wind Res +2, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_VIER_PIPE.FLAVOR: Vier's trusty pipe. It's been customized based on detailed instructions from Vier, and as well as the mystical aromas it gives off, it's able to absorb magical energy from the surrounding atmosphere. She changes the aroma each day depending on her mood, apparently.

IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_01.NAME: Gold Leo Relief
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_01.EXPR: [Monzein/Indomitable Axe Knight+-Only Equipment]PDEF +24, DEX +24, CRIT +30, Water Res +2, Paralyze Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_01.FLAVOR: Designed to be hung on a wall, this relief depicts Monzein himself. Reliefs depicting each of the past captains are displayed at the Holy Guard's head office so that future generations will remember their contributions. Monzein had apparently been secretly thinking about a design for his relief ever since he was vice-captain.

IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_02.NAME: Gold Leo Guard
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_02.EXPR: [Monzein/Indomitable Axe Knight+-Only Equipment]HP +74, PATK +12, LCK +32, Wind Res +1, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_02.FLAVOR: Monzein wears this gauntlet to protect his sword arm and hand from damage, which in turn boosts his attack power. It's very strong, but is apparently quite time-consuming to get on and off.

IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_03.NAME: Gold Leo Boots
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_03.EXPR: [Monzein/Indomitable Axe Knight+-Only Equipment]HP +50, DEX +26, AGI +8, Water Res +1, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_03.FLAVOR: The greaves that protect Monzein's legs. Monzein moves very slowly, so they've been designed to increase agility wherever possible. Thanks to the careful care that Monzein has given them, there are no large scratches or dents to be seen.

IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_04.NAME: Gold Leo Cape
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_04.EXPR: [Monzein/Indomitable Axe Knight+-Only Equipment]HP +40, PDEF +18, MDEF +30, Fire Res +1, Poison Res +7
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_04.FLAVOR: The cape that covers Monzein's broad back. It has been blessed by the Holy Order, and is designed with magical defense firmly in mind. Monzein doesn't wear it with the intention of concealing himself, as indicated by its conspicuous color.

IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_05.NAME: 2nd Knight Faction Emblem
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_05.EXPR: [Monzein/Indomitable Axe Knight+-Only Equipment]PATK +32, AGI +12, CRIT +40, Sleep Res +7, Jewels Obtained +3
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_05.FLAVOR: The emblem of the Second Order, which Monzein is captain of. Each time he dons it, his chest apparently fills with resolve to see through his chivalric duty. Monzein's upstanding conduct is said to have inspired many young knights.

IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_06.NAME: Indomitable Axe Knight Piece
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_06.EXPR: [Monzein/Indomitable Axe Knight+-Only Equipment]PATK +24, MATK +24, CRIT +30, Fire Res +1, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_MONZ_WOR2_06.FLAVOR: This chesspiece represents Monzein on the Holy Order's War Board. Thanks to it, the Holy Order are able to easily follow the movements of the knight captain, who is often off on campaigns and overseas journeys. Apparently Othima is sometimes scolded for using it as a toy...

IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_01.NAME: Rose Breath Relief
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_01.EXPR: [Yauras/Twin-Blade Knight+-Only Equipment] PATK +40, DEX +18, CRIT +16, Fire Res +1, Poison Res +7, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_01.FLAVOR: Designed to be hung on a wall, this relief depicts Yauras herself. Reliefs depicting each of the past captains are displayed at the Holy Guard's head office so that future generations will remember their contributions. Yauras is very pleased with how beautifully hers turned out.

IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_02.NAME: Rose Breath
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_02.EXPR: [Yauras/Twin-Blade Knight+-Only Equipment] PATK +26, DEX +16, AGI +12, Wind Res +1, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_02.FLAVOR: Yauras's favorite hair accessory. She wears it at all times, no matter what--even on the most dangerous of battlefields. Apparently she bought it when she joined the Holy Order, to reward and encourage herself.

IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_03.NAME: Rose Breath Boots Diagram
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_03.EXPR: [Yauras/Twin-Blade Knight+-Only Equipment] HP +26, PDEF +30, MDEF +30, Fire Res +2, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_03.FLAVOR: The boots worn by Yauras. Yauras believes that it is important to be gorgeous at all times, which naturally includes clean boots. Even during the most deadly and intense combat, hers are always spotless.

IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_04.NAME: Rose Breath Bottle
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_04.EXPR: [Yauras/Twin-Blade Knight+-Only Equipment] HP +12, MATK +20, LCK +30, Water Res +1, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_04.FLAVOR: This perfume is the secret behind Yauras's bewitching aroma, which no one can avoid being charmed by. Even during combat, she carries a small bottle with her, so that she doesn't ever smell of sweat. Surrounded by the same familiar smell as always, Yauras is able to avoid being distracted or taken in by others around her.

IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_05.NAME: 1st Knight Faction Emblem
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_05.EXPR: [Yauras/Twin-Blade Knight+-Only Equipment] HP +36, AGI +10, CRIT +30, Fire Res +1, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_05.FLAVOR: The emblem of the First Order, which Yauras is captain of. Each time she dons it, a strong sense of duty to protect the world apparently steels her body and mind. Yauras's noble conduct is said to have encouraged many young knights.

IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_06.NAME: Twin-Blade Knight Piece
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_06.EXPR: [Yauras/Twin-Blade Knight+-Only Equipment] PATK +16, DEX +18, CRIT +28, Petrify Res +7, Jewels Obtained +6
IT_EQ_YAUL_SOL2_06.FLAVOR: This chesspiece represents Yauras on the Holy Order's War Board. Thanks to it, the Holy Order are able to easily follow the movements of the knight captain, who is often off on campaigns and overseas journeys. When the chesspiece was being made, Yauras herself put a lot of work into getting the design just right.

IT_EQ_MIEL_ROD.NAME: Amazing Rod
IT_EQ_MIEL_ROD.EXPR: [Mielikki/Bishop+-Only Equipment] MATK +18, MDEF +10, AGI +6, Petrify Res +19, Dark Res +11, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_MIEL_ROD.FLAVOR: Mielikki's trusty rod. Mielikki didn't want to go to the Academy of Magic because of her shyness, so her elder sister gave her this rod so she could practice her magic at home. She got her mom to add the butterfly-shaped ribbon.

IT_EQ_MIEL_HEADRIBBON.NAME: Papillon Ribbon
IT_EQ_MIEL_HEADRIBBON.EXPR: [Mielikki/Bishop+-Only Equipment] MATK +20, MDEF +18, PATK +16, CRIT +16, LCK +9
IT_EQ_MIEL_HEADRIBBON.FLAVOR: Mielikki loves butterflies, and this butterfly-shaped ribbon was a gift from her mother. Its design is based on a violet swallowtail, Mielikki's favorite butterfly of all.

IT_EQ_MIEL_DRESS.NAME: Precious Dress
IT_EQ_MIEL_DRESS.EXPR: [Mielikki/Bishop+-Only Equipment] HP +30, PDEF +26, MDEF +18, CRIT +14, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_MIEL_DRESS.FLAVOR: Mielikki's favorite dress. Without telling her mom, Mielikki wrote a letter to her dad, who apparently lives somewhere else, saying that she wanted "a butterfly princess dress!" A little while later, this dress arrived.

IT_EQ_MIEL_BOOTS.NAME: Precious Boots
IT_EQ_MIEL_BOOTS.EXPR: [Mielikki/Bishop+-Only Equipment] PDEF +26, MDEF +12, DEX +20, AGI +5, Wind Res +1
IT_EQ_MIEL_BOOTS.FLAVOR: Mielikki's trusty boots. Her mom put white pom-poms on them for her so that they'd match the dress her dad sent her. Mielikki was so pleased that her favorite boots were now even cuter, she now wears them together all the time.

IT_EQ_MIEL_BOUQUET.NAME: Favorite Bouquet
IT_EQ_MIEL_BOUQUET.EXPR: [Mielikki/Bishop+-Only Equipment] MATK +16, MDEF +18, LCK +12, Sleep Res +7, Paralyze Res +7
IT_EQ_MIEL_BOUQUET.FLAVOR: This adorable bouquet is made from a selection of Mielikki's favorite flowers. Not only does Mielikki grow flowers, she wants everyone else to love them as much as she does, so every day she makes one bouquet like this to take to a family member or someone else important to her.

IT_EQ_MIEL_ACCE.NAME: Crystal Papion
IT_EQ_MIEL_ACCE.EXPR: [Mielikki/Bishop+-Only Equipment] MATK +16, LCK +12, DEX +22, Dark Res +5, Light Res +5
IT_EQ_MIEL_ACCE.FLAVOR: This crystal butterfly charm was Celliers's first gift to Mielikki. Celliers made it all by himself, despite his fear of insects, and Mielikki loves and treasures it. Since meeting Celliers she's really started to love crystal crafts.

IT_EQ_ZYVA_ACC.NAME: Thorn Cross Barrette
IT_EQ_ZYVA_ACC.EXPR: [Sieba/Twin-Blade Master-Only Equipment] PATK +20, AGI +10, DEX +16, CRIT +20, Daze +23, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_ZYVA_ACC.FLAVOR: Sieba had this unique barrette made-to-order especially from a craftsman in Lost Blue. Her allergy to roses means she's unable to love the beautiful flowers, and it was her sense of gloom because of this that inspired the barrette's "thorny cross" design.

IT_EQ_NOIN_BOTTLE.NAME: Fine Wine - Red Demon
IT_EQ_NOIN_BOTTLE.EXPR: [Neun/Explosive Master-Only Equipment] HP +36, PATK +20, PDEF +6, AGI +9, Charm Res +30, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_NOIN_BOTTLE.FLAVOR: Neun carries this unrefined moonshine with him at all times, and gets very irritable when the bottle runs dry. A former chief brewer who escaped from Wadatsumi now makes it in Lost Blue. It's got an extremely high alcohol percentage, and would send any regular person into a drunken sickness.

IT_EQ_FURY_AMULET.NAME: Mikahayahi's Talisman
IT_EQ_FURY_AMULET.EXPR: [Fury/Cursed Cannon Master-Only Equipment] MATK +26, MDEF +30, Max Jewels +14, Wind Res +2, Silence Res +30, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8
IT_EQ_FURY_AMULET.FLAVOR: Fury received this talisman from the shrine that she served at back in Wadatsumi. Needless to say, the shrine no longer exists, and Fury still carries this battered talisman with her always, lest she forget the invasion of her homeland.

IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_01.NAME: Alizehan Amulet
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_01.EXPR: [Seida/Venom Archer+-Only Equipment] PATK +24, HP +24, MATK +30, Fire Res +2, Water Res +1, Paralyze Res +8, Daze +8, Bind +8
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_01.FLAVOR: Amulets like this are given by the people of Saga to those they care most dearly for. They are imbued with hopes for safety and wellbeing. This amulet was given to Seida by her late father, and she still feels like he is watching over and protecting her always.

IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_02.NAME: Alizehan Hair Feather
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_02.EXPR: [Seida/Venom Archer+-Only Equipment] DEX +30, CRIT +28, LCK +18, Dark Res +1
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_02.FLAVOR: This handmade hair ornament comes from the Saga Region. A good friend of Seida's gave it to her when she joined the Holy Order to take with her in his place. As she promised, Seida wears it always, no matter what--even during battle.

IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_03.NAME: Alizehan Fur Boots
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_03.EXPR: [Seida/Venom Archer+-Only Equipment] HP +32, AGI +4, Fire Res +1, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_03.FLAVOR: The protective boots worn by Seida. They're extremely well-made and reliable, and boots of their type are very popular in the Saga Region, which is home to many equestrian and nomadic tribes. They've been Seida's favorites for a long time, too.

IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_04.NAME: Alizehan Tea Set
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_04.EXPR: [Seida/Venom Archer+-Only Equipment] HP +20, DEX +24, LCK +12, Paralyze Res +7, Jewels Obtained +8
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_04.FLAVOR: This tea set was crafted using an unusual method unique to a tribe from the Saga Region that is famous for its arts and crafts. It's designed to extract optimal flavor from the tea leaves found in the Saga Region. On her days off, Seida likes to relax with it.

IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_05.NAME: 3rd Knight Faction Emblem
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_05.EXPR: [Seida/Venom Archer+-Only Equipment] PATK +24, AGI +4, Fire Res +1, Charm Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_05.FLAVOR: The emblem of the Third Order, which Seida is captain of. Each time she dons it, her heart apparently shakes with a sense of duty to enforce "absolute justice" across the continent. Seida's virtuous conduct is said to have inspired many young knights.

IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_06.NAME: Venom Archer Piece
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_06.EXPR: [Seida/Venom Archer+-Only Equipment] PDEF +30, MDEF +36, CRIT +28, Poison Res +7, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_SEDA_RAN2_06.FLAVOR: This chesspiece represents Seida on the Holy Order's War Board. Thanks to it, the Holy Order are able to easily follow the movements of the knight captain, who is often off on campaigns and overseas journeys. It may just be a simple chesspiece, but now and then Seida can be seen carefully polishing it.

IT_EQ_TINA01_SOUBI.NAME: Toxotes Braid
IT_EQ_TINA01_SOUBI.EXPR: [Tina/Wind Wielder-Only Equipment] DEX +30, AGI +4, HP +16, PATK +18, Action Jewels Obtained +3, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_TINA01_SOUBI.FLAVOR: Tina was given this friendship bracelet by her father, Adnet. He designed and made it completely by himself, and it contains faint ouija energy. When she wears it she says that she can sense her father's boundless love.

IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_01.NAME: Buccaneers Coat
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_01.EXPR: [Gormalas/Pirate+-Only Equipment] HP +30, PATK +25, MDEF +10, Water Res +2, Fire Res +3, Jewels Obtained +3, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_01.FLAVOR: This coat is a one-of-its-kind item. Gormalas designed it himself back when he first formed The Black Keels, in order that he, as captain, would look more brave and magnificent than any other pirate captain.

IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_02.NAME: Black Keel Pirate Flag
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_02.EXPR: [Gormalas/Pirate+-Only Equipment] PATK +28, MATK +16, HP +28, Poison Res +7, Water Res +5
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_02.FLAVOR: This pirate flag hangs from the fore mast of The Black Keels' ship. As well as being visually intimidating, it's been painted using Alchemia-infused paints, which apparently causes it to glow in response to Gormalas's orders.

IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_03.NAME: Legendary Pirate's Luxuries
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_03.EXPR: [Gormalas/Pirate+-Only Equipment] CRIT +14, MDEF +16, Paralyze Res +7, Stun Res +7, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_03.FLAVOR: Gormalas, who sails the seas around the continent of Babel as he pleases, is well-acquainted with luxury goods from around the world. Apparently he can't be without his particular favorites--fine spirits and fine cigars--when putting his feet up in the captain's cabin.

IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_04.NAME: Old Sea Chart + Compass
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_04.EXPR: [Gormalas/Pirate+-Only Equipment] DEX +14, LCK +21, Wind Res +2, Sleep Res +7
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_04.FLAVOR: Gormalas treasures this sea chart and compass greatly. They're the first he ever owned, back when he was a young man from the Saga Region dreaming of setting out to sea. They're useless now, but to him are precious treasures.

IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_05.NAME: Grinning Skull
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_05.EXPR: [Gormalas/Pirate+-Only Equipment] HP +32, PDEF +30, LCK +9, Max Jewels +10, Petrify Res +5
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_05.FLAVOR: This skull was among the first haul of treasure found by The Black Keels. Gormalas keeps it on display for luck, adorned with a pirate's hat.

IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_06.NAME: Hidden Treasure Carried by the Sea
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_06.EXPR: [Gormalas/Pirate+-Only Equipment] PATK +25, CRIT +16, DEX +12, HP +18, AGI +6
IT_EQ_GORM_KAI_06.FLAVOR: This jewelry is worn by Gormalas at all times. All of the treasure found by his crew is inspected by Gormalas himself, and tradition dictates that he keep the finest among it to wear himself.

IT_EQ_REIM_SWORD.NAME: Twilight Letter
IT_EQ_REIM_SWORD.EXPR: [Reimei/Blademaster+-Only Equipment] PATK +19, CRIT +18, MATK +16, LCK +12, Sleep Res +15, Charm Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_REIM_SWORD.FLAVOR: Reimei's trusty sword. A blacksmith from Wadatsumi made it for him especially after being awed by his skill in combat. It's a magnificent piece, and he carries it wrapped in a fabric sheath.

IT_EQ_REIM_COSTUME.NAME: Deep Dyed Garb
IT_EQ_REIM_COSTUME.EXPR: [Reimei/Blademaster+-Only Equipment] HP +18, AGI +2, MDEF +16, PDEF +8, Fire Res +2
IT_EQ_REIM_COSTUME.FLAVOR: The clothes usually worn by Reimei. Although a little on the conspicuous side for someone who works as an assassin, this is apparently a deliberate decision on Reimei's part. Regardless, his precision in seeing through missions is renowned even outside of Wadatsumi.

IT_EQ_REIM_TEKKO.NAME: Black Lacquer Gauntlet
IT_EQ_REIM_TEKKO.EXPR: [Reimei/Blademaster+-Only Equipment] DEX +14, CRIT +16, MDEF +14, PDEF +8, Charm Res +7
IT_EQ_REIM_TEKKO.FLAVOR: This thin but strong gauntlet is worn by Reimei.  Coated in a black lacquer, it's made using an ore that's rare in Babel but common in Wadatsumi, and is said to be as light as bamboo but as hard as steel.

IT_EQ_REIM_EYEPATCH.NAME: Dyed Eyepatch
IT_EQ_REIM_EYEPATCH.EXPR: [Reimei/Blademaster+-Only Equipment] HP +20, DEX +12, Poison Res +7, Paralyze Res +7, Stun Res +7
IT_EQ_REIM_EYEPATCH.FLAVOR: Reimei wears this eyepatch at all times, even when sleeping. He's worn it ever since injuring his eye as a child when training. It's partly because he was so young when he sustained the injury that he's able to judge distance and attacks so well with just one eye.

IT_EQ_REIM_FAN.NAME: Crow Feather Fan
IT_EQ_REIM_FAN.EXPR: [Reimei/Blademaster+-Only Equipment] AGI +2, Water Res +5, Wind Res +2, Stun Res +7, Petrify Res +7
IT_EQ_REIM_FAN.FLAVOR: Reimei carries this fan with him always, like a lucky charm. His father loved the traditional dances of Wadatsumi, and he taught Reimei them and gave him this fan. As well as being a memento of his father, more importantly it signifies his longing for the dances of Wadatsumi.

IT_EQ_REIM_KUNAI.NAME: Deep Crimson Blade Kunai
IT_EQ_REIM_KUNAI.EXPR: [Reimei/Blademaster+-Only Equipment] PATK +14, PDEF +8, CRIT +12, DEX +12, LCK +12
IT_EQ_REIM_KUNAI.FLAVOR: One of the concealed weapons that Reimei carries on his person. It also signifies his standing as the last remaining successor of a banned school, known as "Shiba Senko," that prioritizes victory above all else, not hesitating to utilize cowardly or underhand techniques.

IT_EQ_MOU_GAROMANTLE.NAME: Hungry Wolf Cape
IT_EQ_MOU_GAROMANTLE.EXPR: [Wild Beast Tamer-Only Equipment] HP +36, PATK +24, AGI +4, DEX +16, Paralyze Res +15, Daze Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_MOU_GAROMANTLE.FLAVOR: This fur cape erases all human scent from its wearer, fooling wild creatures into thinking he or she is another beast. It is made from the fur of a rare beast found only in steep rocky mountains, and carefully hand-tailored by a traditional craftsman from the Saga Region

IT_EQ_MAD_GLOBE.NAME: Magia Clarion
IT_EQ_MAD_GLOBE.EXPR: [Magic Marksman-Only Equipment] MATK +28, DEX +20, AGI +6, PDEF +10, MDEF +12, Petrify Res +8, Stop Res +8, Silence Res +8
IT_EQ_MAD_GLOBE.FLAVOR: Playing this veteran clarion when heading into combat is said to help magic bullets fly more accurately. It rings out like a horn, raising ambition and focusing concentration.

IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_WEAPON.NAME: Galatia Rocket Launcher
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_WEAPON.EXPR: [Megistos/Machinist+-Only Equipment] PATK +12, DEX +24, MATK +40, CRIT +4, Fire Res +5
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_WEAPON.FLAVOR: One of Megistos's most prized weapons; this rocket launcher never leaves his side. It's portable and flexible, and his trust in it is so great that as long as he has it he says he can get himself out of any predicament.

IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_COAT.NAME: Artillery Coat
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_COAT.EXPR: [Megistos/Machinist+-Only Equipment] HP +24, PDEF +12, MDEF +4, Petrify Res +5, Charm Res +5
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_COAT.FLAVOR: The coat usually worn by Megistos. It's a work coat, made from an antistatic material that allows him to carry out maintenance work on his guns and other precision instruments without worry. Apparently Megistos actually quite likes electric shocks anyway, though.

IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BULLET.NAME: Alice Flare
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BULLET.EXPR: [Megistos/Machinist+-Only Equipment] MATK +18, Sleep Res +10, Stun Res +10, Paralyze Res +24, Max Jewels +16
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BULLET.FLAVOR: One of Megistos's most prized weapons. Rather than attack purposes, this flare gun is specially designed for assisting allies. It can illuminate people in far away locations, making it very useful, but is so bright than it can sometimes inflict blindness...

IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_FLAK.NAME: Amalthea Anti-Air Gun
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_FLAK.EXPR: [Megistos/Machinist+-Only Equipment] PATK +16, MATK +26, DEX +24, AGI +6, CRIT +4, Wind Res +1
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_FLAK.FLAVOR: One of Megistos's most prized weapons. Out of all of them, this anti-aircraft gun has been created using the most cutting-edge technology. Megistos is very proud of how high up in the air it can shoot, and apparently no one other than him can use it properly.

IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BATTERY.NAME: Ophelia Field Artillery
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BATTERY.EXPR: [Megistos/Machinist+-Only Equipment] LCK +24, CRIT +4, Jewels Obtained +4, Poison Res +5, Thunder Res +5
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BATTERY.FLAVOR: One of Megistos's most prized weapons. He calls this very recent, portable, model his "youngest daughter." Megistos will talk passionately about the beautiful arc that it cuts across the sky, but apparently no one else really understands.

IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BOOT.NAME: Aircraft Boots
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BOOT.EXPR: [Megistos/Machinist+-Only Equipment] AGI +2, MDEF +6, HP +32, DEX +20, Water Res +1
IT_EQ_MEGISTOS_BOOT.FLAVOR: Megistos's trusty boots. Created using all the expertise of the airship development division to which Megistos belongs, these miraculous boots actually contain a tiny engine. Megistos is apparently considering the logistics of upgrading them by adding a tiny cannon...

IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_01.NAME: Sleeved Smith Apron
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_01.EXPR: [Miuna/Master Blacksmith+ Equipment] HP +64, PATK +38, PDEF +24, Fire Res +2, Paralyze Res +8, Daze Res +8
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_01.FLAVOR: Unlike a regular blacksmith's apron, this one has been designed to be as small as possible, so as not to obstruct Miuna's dynamic movements. Miuna says that to a blacksmith burns are like medals, but her father, Yogi Ku, would much prefer that she wore an apron that protected her whole body...

IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_02.NAME: Welding Goggles
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_02.EXPR: [Miuna/Master Blacksmith+ Equipment] PATK +50, DEX +12, LUCK +38, Charm Res +8, Paralyze Res +8
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_02.FLAVOR: These googles protect the wearer's eyes against flames, sparks, and flashes when smithing. They have been imbued with their maker's magical energy, and when necessary they darken like sunglasses in order to guard the corneas against ultraviolet and infrared rays.

IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_03.NAME: Blacksmith Tool Belt
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_03.EXPR: [Miuna/Master Blacksmith+ Equipment] HP +48, MATK +18, CRIT +14, Water Res +2, Sleep Res +8, Bind Res +8
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_03.FLAVOR: This sturdy tool belt is fitted with pockets for storing all the equipment and materials required by blacksmiths. Miuna is apparently always forgetting which pocket she put what in, though...

IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_04.NAME: Heat-Resistant Safety Boots
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_04.EXPR: [Miuna/Master Blacksmith+ Equipment] MDEF +20, AGI +14, Wind Res +2, Stun Res +8, Paralyze Res +8
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_04.FLAVOR: Smithing is a dangerous profession, and a good pair of safety boots is indispensable. They're not generally very cute, though, and that's why Miuna had these ones made to order especially. As well as being cute, they're also very well-made, and provide excellent protection for the feet.

IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_05.NAME: Firefan Bellows
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_05.EXPR: [Miuna/Master Blacksmith+ Equipment] PDEF +18, DEX +18, CRIT +16, Fire Res +2, Jewels Obtained +4
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_05.FLAVOR: When members of the Ku clan learn the smithing trade, they are given a miniature pair of bellows like this one by their master. Their small size makes them easy to use in a cramped, tool-packed forge, and they provide a fixed amount of air, making them very reliable.

IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_06.NAME: Mysterious Ore Pot
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_06.EXPR: [Miuna/Master Blacksmith+ Equipment] HP +38, AGI +10, CRIT +14, Thunder Res +2, Poison Res +8, Petrify Res +8
IT_EQ_MIUN_KAJ_CC_06.FLAVOR: Miuna happened upon this pretty ore when she was a child, and has kept it ever since. She has tried looking it up, but was never able to ascertain its identity. One day she hopes to find out what it is, and use it to make a fine weapon.

IT_EQ_PSI_HEADGEAR.NAME: Psycho Gazer
IT_EQ_PSI_HEADGEAR.EXPR: [Telekinetic Artist-Only Equipment]MATK +32, MDEF +28, HP +28, Hit Rate +2, Light Res +1, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_PSI_HEADGEAR.FLAVOR: This headset amplifies the brainwaves, boosting telekinetic ability. It converts electrical signals emitted by the brain into energy, supplementing the power of psychic attacks. It also makes thought energy visible to the wearer, thus revealing the locations of hidden enemies.

IT_EQ_HAYATE_SWORD.NAME: Wind-Rush Kodachi
IT_EQ_HAYATE_SWORD.EXPR: [Hayate/Spy+ Equipment] PATK +22, DEX +20, AGI +2, CRIT +8, LUCK +30, Jewels Obtained +4
IT_EQ_HAYATE_SWORD.FLAVOR: Hayate's trusty blade that he has used since his days as an apprentice. Provided that the wielder is able to make use of the wind effectively, it can be swung with an incredible swiftness. Needless to say, it took a lot of time and practice for Hayate to be able to wield it properly.

IT_EQ_HAYATE_COSTUMES.NAME: Formal Gyobu Wear
IT_EQ_HAYATE_COSTUMES.EXPR: [Hayate/Spy+ Equipment] HP +40, PDEF +12, Poison Res +16, Paralyze Res +8, Wind Res +2
IT_EQ_HAYATE_COSTUMES.FLAVOR: These clothes are given to members of the Gyobu clan, of which Hayate is a member, when they are recognized as full-fledged warriors. Anyone wearing them is supposed to have the full respect of the clan, though Hayate is something of an exception...

IT_EQ_HAYATE_MANT.NAME: Wind-Raccoon Cape
IT_EQ_HAYATE_MANT.EXPR: [Hayate/Spy+ Equipment] HP +30, Fire Res +2, Water Res +2, Stun Res +8, Stop Res +8, Petrify Res +8
IT_EQ_HAYATE_MANT.FLAVOR: This cape has been passed down through the Gyobu clan since ancient times. It is said to be imbued with the chakra of the legendary Furi, which makes it extremely useful to Hayate, who has some difficulty with metamorphosis and other tanuki arts.

IT_EQ_HAYATE_ACCE.NAME: Necklace of Disturbance
IT_EQ_HAYATE_ACCE.EXPR: [Hayate/Spy+ Equipment] MATK +6, PDEF +12, MDEF +16, DEX +18, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8
IT_EQ_HAYATE_ACCE.FLAVOR: Hayate made this necklace himself, as a gift for Rin, his unrequited love. He didn't want to seem like a "beta tanuki," though, and was never able to bring himself to give it to her--to this day, he still carries it in his pocket...

IT_EQ_HAYATE_BANDANA.NAME: Bandana of Discipline
IT_EQ_HAYATE_BANDANA.EXPR: [Hayate/Spy+ Equipment] PATK +20, AGI +4, CRIT +36, DEX +16, Daze Res +8
IT_EQ_HAYATE_BANDANA.FLAVOR: This bandana originally belonged to Rin--when Hayate was injured, she wrapped it around his wound. As she said that he didn't need to give it back, he now keeps it as a lucky charm. It helps to stop his tail from exploding when he thinks about her...

IT_EQ_HAYATE_BOOTS.NAME: Wadatsumi Swiftness Boots
IT_EQ_HAYATE_BOOTS.EXPR: [Hayate/Spy+ Equipment] PATK +18, AGI +6, LUCK +24, Bind Res +8, Stun Res +8, Paralyze Res +8
IT_EQ_HAYATE_BOOTS.FLAVOR: These boots are said to allow the wearer to run through the wildernesses of Wadatsumi without ever wearing out. They're well-made and extremely tough, but Hayate's intense and impassioned training has clearly been even tougher, as on close inspection they're quite worn and frayed.

IT_EQ_TEM_SHIELD.NAME: Divine Shield
IT_EQ_TEM_SHIELD.EXPR: [Sacred Knight-Only Equipment] HP +40, MATK +24, MDEF +30, PDEF +16, Light Res +2, Charm Res +8, Sleep Res +8, Slow Res +8
IT_EQ_TEM_SHIELD.FLAVOR: This magnificent-looking shield gives off a divine glow. Only sacred knights, enforcers of justice, are permitted to carry such shields, and it is set with a glistening blue jewel that signifies their authority. The sight of it fills the hearts of virtuous men with courage and strikes fear in those of evildoers.

IT_EQ_PIECE_TWOSWORDS.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Orichalcum Blades

IT_EQ_PIECE_FURO.EXPR: Collect 5 of these to create: Stamp of Certain Delivery

IT_EQ_PIECE_DICE.EXPR: Collect 20 of these to create: Dice of Fate

IT_EQ_PIECE_RABBITDOLL.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Lucky Rabbit Figurine

IT_EQ_PIECE_CHIKUONKI.EXPR: Collect 20 of these to create: Gramophone

IT_EQ_PIECE_RADIO.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Alchemic Radio

IT_EQ_PIECE_LAMI_GAUNTLET.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Royal Gauntlet

IT_EQ_PIECE_LAMI_WING.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Crimson Winged Headband

IT_EQ_PIECE_LAMI_STATUE.NAME: Vengeful Valkyrie Figurine Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_LAMI_STATUE.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Vengeful Valkyrie Figurine

IT_EQ_PIECE_CHAL_SUNGLASSES.NAME: Rider's Glasses Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_CHAL_SUNGLASSES.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Rider's Glasses

IT_EQ_PIECE_CHAL_TIRE.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Magic Wheel

IT_EQ_PIECE_CHAL_BOOTS.NAME: Maiden's Boots Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_CHAL_BOOTS.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Maiden's Boots

IT_EQ_PIECE_CHAL_BELT.NAME: Ammo Belt Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_CHAL_BELT.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Ammo Belt

IT_EQ_PIECE_CANO_HAIR_ORNAMENTS.NAME: Memento Hairpin Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_CANO_HAIR_ORNAMENTS.EXPR: Collect 10 of these to create: Memento Hairpin

IT_EQ_PIECE_CANO_SHOES.NAME: Holy Order Boots Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_CANO_SHOES.EXPR: Collect 20 of these to create: Holy Order Boots

IT_EQ_PIECE_CANO_CLOTHES.NAME: Dress of Blessings Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_CANO_CLOTHES.EXPR: Collect 30 of these to create: Dress of Blessings

IT_EQ_PIECE_ROFI_WI_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Whirlwind Grimoire Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_ROFI_WI_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Whirlwind Grimoire

IT_EQ_PIECE_ROFI_TH_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Thunder Grimoire Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_ROFI_TH_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Thunder Grimoire

IT_EQ_PIECE_ROFI_SH_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Brilliant Grimoire Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_ROFI_SH_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Brilliant Grimoire

IT_EQ_PIECE_ROFI_DA_GRIMOIRE.NAME: Grimoire of Eternal Darkness Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_ROFI_DA_GRIMOIRE.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Grimoire of Eternal Darkness

IT_EQ_PIECE_DILG_ARMOR.NAME: Justice Armor Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_DILG_ARMOR.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Justice Armor

IT_EQ_PIECE_DILG_BUSTLE.NAME: Muscle Bustle Piece
IT_EQ_PIECE_DILG_BUSTLE.EXPR: Collect 60 of these to create: Muscle Bustle

IT_KEY_QUEST_POK_SAM.NAME: Key of Truth
IT_KEY_QUEST_POK_SAM.EXPR: Once you collect three of this item, you can go to the Key Quest menu and use them to unlock For Whom the Princess Vanishes - Episode 1.
IT_KEY_QUEST_POK_SAM.FLAVOR: This key can only be obtained by those who have traversed each of the three worlds. It allows the bearer to travel past the Door of Truth, to the land where the three worlds meet, and be granted any one wish.

IT_KEY_QUEST_3TITLE_SUN.NAME: Key of the Sun
IT_KEY_QUEST_3TITLE_SUN.EXPR: Using this item at the Key Quest menu will unlock For Whom the Princess Weeps: The Sun God and the Golden Key.
IT_KEY_QUEST_3TITLE_SUN.FLAVOR: This sacred key is able to control and manipulate the power of the sun. It is also known as the "Golden Key," and its purpose is to save the shining sun and its guardian. It is imbued with a powerful energy, and the key itself is dazzling to behold.

IT_EV_FIRE_L_GOLEM.NAME: Little Fire Golem
IT_EV_FIRE_L_GOLEM.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Fire Phantoms
IT_EV_FIRE_L_GOLEM.FLAVOR: This fragmented Golem was created by accident as a result of attempts to mass-produce humanoid weapons that were carried out long ago. It cannot function as a weapon, and is essentially nothing more than a crystallized mass of Alchemia. It contains a small amount of Fire energy.

IT_EV_WIND_L_GOLEM.FLAVOR: This fragmented Golem was created by accident as a result of attempts to mass-produce humanoid weapons that were carried out long ago. IT_EV_ARUKEMYI01.NAME: Little Alchemia
IT_EV_ARUKEMYI01.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Phantoms of all elements
IT_EV_ARUKEMYI01.FLAVOR: This being, which is composed entirely of Alchemia, is said to have existed since the dawn of time. The creature's ecology remains a mystery to this day, but some theorize it continues to grow and develop endlessly. This specimen seems to have only just shed its shell, and is still very weak.

IT_EV_ARUKEMYI02.NAME: Mana Alchemia
IT_EV_ARUKEMYI02.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Phantoms of all elements
IT_EV_ARUKEMYI02.FLAVOR: This being, which is composed entirely of Alchemia, is said to have existed since the dawn of time. The creature's ecology remains a mystery to this day, but some theorize it continues to grow and develop endlessly. This specimen seems to be a hatchling. It is still weak and cannot move around much.

IT_EV_ARUKEMYI03.NAME: Soul Alchemia
IT_EV_ARUKEMYI03.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Phantoms of all elements
IT_EV_ARUKEMYI03.FLAVOR: This being, which is composed entirely of Alchemia, is said to have existed since the dawn of time. The creature's ecology remains a mystery to this day, but some theorize it continues to grow and develop endlessly. This appears to be an infant specimen, and it already seems to have grown fairly strong.

IT_EV_ARUKEMYI04.NAME: Arcane Alchemia
IT_EV_ARUKEMYI04.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Phantoms of all elements
IT_EV_ARUKEMYI04.FLAVOR: This being, which is composed entirely of Alchemia, is said to have existed since the dawn of time. The creature's ecology remains a mystery to this day, but some theorize it continues to grow and develop endlessly. This specimen has grown to quite a large size, and its strength has increased accordingly.

IT_EV_KAGURA01.NAME: Vermilion Bird Egg Chakra
IT_EV_KAGURA01.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Kagura
IT_EV_KAGURA01.FLAVOR: This being, which is composed entirely of Chakra, is said to have existed in Wadatsumi since the dawn of time. It can only be seen by the royals of Wadatsumi, and some theorize it continues to grow and develop endlessly. This specimen seems to have only just shed its shell, and is still very weak.

IT_EV_EGG_TOAST.NAME: Fried Eggs Bread
IT_EV_EGG_TOAST.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Fencer
IT_EV_EGG_TOAST.FLAVOR: A dish that has been around in Arcadia for a very long time. When it reached Babel, it started to be made with Alchemia-rich eggs, and proved a big hit for its nutritious qualities. It's also a favorite meal of Fencers.

IT_EV_PROMPUTO.NAME: Choco Doll
IT_EV_PROMPUTO.EXPR: Can be used to evolve Prompto
IT_EV_PROMPUTO.FLAVOR: A plush chocobo that was sold at a carnival. Prompto loves chocobos, and he immediately took a photo when he saw one on display. Apparently a photo alone wasn't enough, though, and he quickly headed to buy one.

IT_US_PARALYSIS.NAME: Neuro Potion
IT_US_PARALYSIS.EXPR: Medicine that recovers Paralyze *May be used in future

IT_US_REVIVAL_POTION.NAME: Revival Potion
IT_US_REVIVAL_POTION.EXPR: Medicine that can resurrect a unit *May be substituted for other item in future

$COIN.NAME: Gems
$COIN.EXPR: A mysterious stone that can be used to restore AP, summon units and equipment, and purchase items from shops.
$COIN.FLAVOR: This magic stone is said to be a shard of a Philosopher's Stone. The color with which it shines is said to change according to the amount of Alchemia secreted inside.

IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_2.NAME: Bronze Gear Shard
IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_2.EXPR: This item can be used to evolve a piece of 2★ gear in place of that piece of gear's corresponding Gear Shard.
IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_2.FLAVOR: This Alchemia-rich ore boasts good affinity with commonly available gear. It can be used to evolve a piece of gear in place of that piece of gear's corresponding Gear Shard.

IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_3.NAME: Silver Gear Shard
IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_3.EXPR: This item can be used to evolve a piece of 3★ gear in place of that piece of gear's corresponding Gear Shard.
IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_3.FLAVOR: This Alchemia-rich ore boasts good affinity with gear of medium-level availability. It can be used to evolve a piece of gear in place of that piece of gear's corresponding Gear Shard.

IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_4.NAME: Gold Gear Shard
IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_4.EXPR: This item can be used to evolve a piece of 4★ gear in place of that piece of gear's corresponding Gear Shard.
IT_AF_COMMON_RARE_4.FLAVOR: This Alchemia-rich ore boasts good affinity with very rare and valuable gear. It can be used to evolve a piece of gear in place of that piece of gear's corresponding Gear Shard.

IT_AF_COMMON_ALL.NAME: Rainbow Gear Shard
IT_AF_COMMON_ALL.EXPR: This all-purpose, Alchemia-rich ore boasts good affinity with any and all gear. It can be used to evolve a piece of gear in place of that piece of gear's corresponding Gear Shard.

IT_SET_SHAGEKI_01.EXPR: This great-value set contains items that are required for Missile-type jobs from Job Lv. 1-3. (Applicable jobs: Hunter, Ranger, Gunner, Drifter, Sniper, Crafter, and Machinist.)

IT_SET_MAKOU_01.NAME: MATK-Type Starter Kit
IT_SET_MAKOU_01.EXPR: This great-value set contains items that are required for magical attack jobs from Job Lv. 1-3. (Applicable jobs: Mage, Priest, Bishop, Chronomancer, Summoner, Enchanter, Astrologer, Magia Gunslinger, Battle Mage, Magic Marksman, Telekinetic Artist, Diviner, and Geomancer.)

IT_SET_MIKO_KUSUSHI_01.NAME: Shrine Maiden / Chemist Starter Kit
IT_SET_MIKO_KUSUSHI_01.EXPR: This great-value set contains items that are required for Shrine Maiden/Chemist-type jobs from Job Lv. 1-3. (Applicable jobs: Shrine Maiden, Priestess, Chemist, and Professor.)

IT_SET_KAKUTOU_01.NAME: Combat / Agility / Support Starter Kit
IT_SET_KAKUTOU_01.EXPR: This great-value set contains items that are required for martial arts/agility/support-type jobs from Job Lv. 1-3. (Applicable jobs: Martial Artist, Holy Brawler, Thief, Dark Assassin, Ninja, Spy, Samurai, Blademaster, Bard, Dancer, Beast Tamer, Wild Beast Tamer, Merchant, Martial Master, and Blacksmith.)

IT_SET_HAYA_01.NAME: Hayate Equipment Set

IT_SET_EQ_SOUL_MOU.NAME: Wild Beast Tamer Token x6
IT_SET_EQ_SOUL_MOU.EXPR: This set contains all six of the tokens needed in order to unlock the Wild Beast Tamer job.

IT_SET_SHISHI_EX.NAME: Nico Live Celebration Lion Set EX
IT_SET_SHISHI_EX.EXPR: [Niconico Live Celebration] This set contains 10 of the two main pieces of equipment that are required at high Job Levels.

IT_SET_MADOU_EX.NAME: Nico Live Celebration Mage Set EX
IT_SET_MADOU_EX.EXPR: [Niconico Live Celebration] This set contains 10 of the two main pieces of equipment that are required at high Job Levels. (For Magic-related jobs.)

IT_SET_TICKET_EX.NAME: Nico Live Celebration Skip Tickets x50
IT_SET_TICKET_EX.EXPR: [Niconico Live Celebration] This set contains lots of tickets that can be used to skip Story Quest battles. Special price to celebrate the Niconico Live Broadcast!

IT_SET_KYOUKA_EX.NAME: Nico Live Celebration Enhance Set
IT_SET_KYOUKA_EX.EXPR: [Niconico Live Celebration] This great-value set is packed with items that can be used to supercharge unit level, equipment, and gear. Special price to celebrate the Niconico Live Broadcast!

IT_SI_NIKONAMA_PI_TICKET_01.NAME: Nico Live Celebration Soul Shards x25 Selector
IT_SI_NIKONAMA_PI_TICKET_01.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon 25 Soul Shards for one 3-5★ Rare Summon unit of your choice. (Units released on or before 10/1 only. Does not include Templar units [Neun, Füry, Sieba, Acht, and Vier], limited-time units [Uzuma, Birgitta, and Blitz], or collab units.)

IT_SET_SI_NIKONAMA_PI_TICKET_01.NAME: Nico Live Celebration Soul Shards x25 Selector
IT_SET_SI_NIKONAMA_PI_TICKET_01.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon 25 Soul Shards for one 3-5★ Rare Summon unit of your choice. (Units released on or before 10/1 only. Does not include Templar units, limited-time units, or collab units.) Tap the item icon to show details. Can be purchased using Paid Gems. (Once purchased, the ticket will be shown in your Gifts.)

IT_SA_NIKONAMA_BUGU_TICKET.NAME: Nico Live Celebration Gear Selector
IT_SA_NIKONAMA_BUGU_TICKET.EXPR: Use this ticket to purchase one 3★ or 4★ piece of gear of your choice. (Gear available from Gear Summon and released on or before 10/1 only. Includes limited-time gear [Crowley Sword and Dirk of Projection], but does not include "Stellar Mage Hat", "Wonder Chronos", "Black Flame Ring", or collab gear.)

IT_SET_SA_NIKONAMA_BUGU_TICKET.NAME: Nico Live Celebration Gear Selector
IT_SET_SA_NIKONAMA_BUGU_TICKET.EXPR: Use this ticket to purchase one 3★ or 4★ piece of gear of your choice. (Gear available from Gear Summon and released on or before 10/1 only. Includes limited-time gear [Crowley Sword and Dirk of Projection], but does not include "Stellar Mage Hat", "Wonder Chronos", "Black Flame Ring", or collab gear.)

IT_SU_CHALLENGE_TICKET.NAME: [Challenges] Unit Selector
IT_SU_CHALLENGE_TICKET.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon the 5★ unit of your choice from all the units released up until December 30th, 2016 (excluding Sacred Stone Memories and Collaboration units.)

IT_SET_RINGO_MOBIUS.NAME: Mobius Apple Set
IT_SET_RINGO_MOBIUS.EXPR: [Mystic World Mobius Celebration] This set contains an assortment of Apples, which can be used to raise Unit Levels. Now available for a special price!

IT_SET_MOBIUS_BUKKOU_01.EXPR: [Mystic World Mobius Celebration] This set contains rare equipment that is required for physical attack jobs.

IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_01.NAME: Witch Lollipop
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_01.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (small amount) and raises MDEF.
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_01.FLAVOR: One of the lollipops that Lofia had ready as treats for Halloween. It looks so cute that you almost want to keep it on display rather than eat it. Just one lick fills the mouth with a magical, juicy sweetness.

IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_02.NAME: Zombie Lollipop
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_02.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (small amount) and raises MATK.
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_02.FLAVOR: One of the lollipops that Fung Liu had ready as treats for Halloween. It's bright and colorful, and looks very refreshing. Just one lick seems to make it melt in the mouth, releasing a cool, revitalizing sensation.

IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_03.NAME: Pirate Lollipop
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_03.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (small amount) and raises HP.
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_03.FLAVOR: One of the lollipops that Gormalas had ready as treats for Halloween. Its bizarre coloring makes it difficult to guess its taste, and it turns the entire tongue black with one lick, but it in fact has a surprisingly addictive flavor.

IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_04.NAME: Shining Beans
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_04.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (small amount) and raises PDEF.
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_04.FLAVOR: One of the little bottles of beautiful, red-colored jelly beans that Logi had ready for Halloween. They're a marvel just to look at, let alone eat--super-sweet and super-cute!

IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_05.NAME: Bloody Beans
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_05.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (small amount) and raises PATK.
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_05.FLAVOR: One of the little bottles of chic, blue-colored jelly beans that Dias had ready as treats for Halloween. Just looking at them is enough to make your mouth salivate with excitement! They're more savory than sweet, though--recommended for the mature jelly bean connoisseur.

IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_06.NAME: Nut-n-Bolt Cookie
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_06.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (small amount) and raises CRIT.
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_06.FLAVOR: Vlad had these crunchy cookies ready as treats for Halloween. They come in containers shaped like jack-o'-lanterns. They make the tongue tingle, but still have a faint sweetness, and are great fun to munch away at.

IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_07.NAME: Icebutter Cookie
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_07.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (small amount) and raises DEX.
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_07.FLAVOR: Neville had these crunchy cookies ready as treats for Halloween. They come in containers shaped like jack-o'-lanterns. They're cool and refreshing, and not too sweet.

IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_08.NAME: Flarechip Cookie
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_08.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (small amount) and raises AGI.
IT_US_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_2016_08.FLAVOR: Caesar had these crunchy cookies ready as treats for Halloween. They come in containers shaped like jack-o'-lanterns. They're piping hot, and a little on the spicy side, but they've got a delicious, delicately balanced flavor.

IT_EVENT_DISCOIN.NAME: Demonic Coin

IT_EVENT_VEDACOIN.NAME: Veda Coins

IT_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_COIN.NAME: Halloween Coin
IT_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_COIN.FLAVOR: A coin that can be obtained from the Halloween event.

IT_US_JOB_COIN.NAME: Enchant Coin

IT_EVENT_FRIEND_COIN.NAME: Friendship Coin
IT_EVENT_FRIEND_COIN.FLAVOR: A coin that can be used at the Friend Shop.

IT_EVENT_XMAS_CHICKEN.NAME: Michael Fried Chicken
IT_EVENT_XMAS_CHICKEN.EXPR: For use during battle. Recovers HP (medium amount) and raises JUMP by 1 for three turns.
IT_EVENT_XMAS_CHICKEN.FLAVOR: This delicious fried chicken is sold in the downtown area of Lustburg. Apparently Michael taught the shopkeeper the secret recipe used to make it, which is why it's named after him. It's said to increase jumping power, and greatly recover stamina.

IT_CV_OTOSHIDAMA_2017.NAME: New Year's Giftbag
IT_CV_OTOSHIDAMA_2017.EXPR: This item can be exchanged for 2017 Zeni.
IT_CV_OTOSHIDAMA_2017.FLAVOR: This bag is imbued with powerful feelings of gratitude and joy. Bags of this sort are pretty rare, and are only seen around this time of year. Their actual value is a mystery until they're opened. Happy New Year!

IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_01.NAME: Mystery Bag Ticket
IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_01.EXPR: Ticket for summoning an assortment of ten Apples of different types.

IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_02.NAME: Mystery Bag Ticket
IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_02.EXPR: Ticket for summoning ten Zeni-convertible items such as Gold Ingots.

IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_03.NAME: Mystery Bag Ticket
IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_03.EXPR: Ticket for summoning an assortment of ten equipment-enhancing items of different types.

IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_04.NAME: Mystery Bag Ticket
IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_04.EXPR: Ticket for summoning an assortment of ten gear-enhancing items of different types.

IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_05.NAME: Mystery Bag Ticket
IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_05.EXPR: This ticket is equivalent to a Rare Summon Ticket.

IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_06.NAME: Mystery Bag Ticket
IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_06.EXPR: This ticket is equivalent to a Gear Summon Ticket.

IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_07.NAME: Mystery Bag Ticket
IT_US_FUKUBUKURO_2017_07.EXPR: Use this ticket to summon one Soul Shard of a random element, including Rainbow.

IT_US_EVENT_VALENTINE_2017_01.NAME: Valentine Box
IT_US_EVENT_VALENTINE_2017_01.EXPR: For use during battle. Slightly recovers HP and raises MOVE by 1 for one turn.
IT_US_EVENT_VALENTINE_2017_01.FLAVOR: This heart-shaped box is packed full with Valentine's Day chocolates and presents for a loved one. When opened it restores HP, and fills the owner with an excited, happy feeling, raising MOVE.

IT_EVENT_MOTHERS_2017.NAME: Mother's Day Help Ticket
IT_EVENT_MOTHERS_2017.EXPR: A special ticket that is given on Mother's Day. It is packed with feelings of gratitude.

IT_EVENT_FATHERS_2017.NAME: Father's Day Gift Ticket
IT_EVENT_FATHERS_2017.EXPR: A special ticket that is given on Father's Day. It is packed with feelings of gratitude.

IT_OR_MEDAL_02.EXPR: A prestigious title that is awarded to brave players who have cleared the quest "Battle of Demonslaught."

IT_AF_ACCS_GL_CRYSTALROSE.NAME: Blue Crystal Rose Shard
IT_AF_ACCS_GL_CRYSTALROSE.EXPR: Collect 80 of these to create: Blue Crystal Rose

IT_EVENT_GL_VERSION2COIN.NAME: [Global v2.0 Celebration] Coin
IT_EVENT_GL_VERSION2COIN.EXPR: Exchange this coin for fabulous items in the Global v2.0 Celebration Coin Exchange Shop.
IT_EVENT_GL_VERSION2COIN.FLAVOR: Welcome to THE ALCHEMIST CODE Version 2.0!

AF_CANO_ARM.NAME: [Default Gear] Exclusive: Apprentice Paladin Kanon's Sword

AF_BASI_SOL.NAME: [Default Gear] Exclusive: Mobile Knight Basheeny Twin-Blade
