AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_GREEN.NAME: Poison Fang Blade
AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_GREEN.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, Chance of Poison
AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_GREEN.FLAVOR: This sword was meticulously crafted by a blacksmith working for the kingdom. It uses a bog-standard sword as its base, but its blade has been treated with a special substance, imbuing it with a dark-green glow. It occasionally inflicts Poison, draining the life force of enemies.

AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_YELLOW.NAME: Electrospike Blade
AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_YELLOW.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, Chance of Paralyze
AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_YELLOW.FLAVOR: This sword was painstakingly crafted by a blacksmith working for the kingdom. It uses a bog-standard sword as its base, but its blade has been treated with a special substance, imbuing it with a bright-yellow glow. It occasionally inflicts Paralyze, stopping enemies from moving.

AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_GRAY.NAME: Blade of Silence
AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_GRAY.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, Chance of Silence
AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_GRAY.FLAVOR: This sword was laboriously crafted by a blacksmith working for the kingdom. It uses a bog-standard sword as its base, but its blade has been treated with a special substance, imbuing it with a pale-blue glow. It occasionally inflicts Silence, preventing magical attacks by enemies.

AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_PINK.NAME: Charming Blade
AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_PINK.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, CRIT Up, Chance of Charm
AF_ARMS_SWO_MITHRIL_PINK.FLAVOR: This sword was arduously crafted by a blacksmith working for the kingdom. It uses a bog-standard sword as its base, but its blade has been treated with a special substance, imbuing it with a deep pink glow. It occasionally inflicts Charm, captivating and controlling enemies.

AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_GREEN.NAME: Poison Rod
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_GREEN.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, Chance of Poison
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_GREEN.FLAVOR: One of the rods that mages are first permitted to use after graduating from trainee status. The gemstone at its tip glows with a gentle, dark-green light when magical energy is channeled into it. When swung it occasionally spreads poison, draining the life force of enemies.

AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_YELLOW.NAME: Lightning Rod
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_YELLOW.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, Jewels Up, Chance of Paralyze
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_YELLOW.FLAVOR: One of the rods that mages are first permitted to use after graduating from trainee status. The gemstone at its tip glows with a dazzling golden light when magical energy is channeled into it. When swung it occasionally induces neuroparalysis, stopping enemies from moving.

AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_GRAY.NAME: Silencing Rod
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_GRAY.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, Chance of Silence
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_GRAY.FLAVOR: One of the rods that mages are first permitted to use after graduating from trainee status. The gemstone at its tip glows with a soft, milky-white light when magical energy is channeled into it. When swung it occasionally invokes an anti-magic effect, preventing magical attacks by enemies.

AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_PINK.NAME: Charming Rod
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_PINK.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, Jewels Up, MDEF Up, Chance of charm
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_PINK.FLAVOR: One of the rods that mages are first permitted to use after graduating from trainee status. The gemstone at its tip glows with a pale, cherry-pink light when magical energy is channeled into it. When swung it occasionally gives off a strange aroma, captivating and controlling enemies.

AF_ARMO_ROBE1.NAME: Star Robe
AF_ARMO_ROBE1.FLAVOR: Although intended for use by novices, robes of this type are popular with mages of all skill levels, including many seasoned veterans. They provide simple magic-blocking effects.

AF_ARMO_ROBE2.NAME: Cloak of Protection
AF_ARMO_ROBE2.EXPR: Attributes: MDEF Up, PDEF Up, Paralyze Res
AF_ARMO_ROBE2.FLAVOR: Cloaks of this type are popular among mages who dislike heavy and cumbersome robes and cloaks. Despite its simple, light-weight design, it still provides impressive defensive power. It has also been imbued with magic that neutralizes neuroparalysis.

AF_ARMO_ROBE3.NAME: Sacred Coat
AF_ARMO_ROBE3.EXPR:
Attributes: MDEF Up, HP Up, LCK Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Greatly raises Fire/Water/Wind/Thunder Res of ally units in area around self for one turn [Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMO_ROBE3.FLAVOR: This coat is made from the same materials as one that was once worn by a great mage spoken of in legend. It boasts very high magical defensive capabilities, and, if an incantation is chanted when wearing it, will supposedly completely nullify magic attack damage.

AF_ARMO_ARMOR.NAME: Crimson Guard
AF_ARMO_ARMOR.EXPR: Attributes: PDEF Up, HP Up, Charm Res
AF_ARMO_ARMOR.FLAVOR: This deep-crimson armor was excavated from the depths of a cave. Although old and rusted, amazingly, it can still stand shoulder-to-shoulder with pieces available on the market today. The fact that it was buried underground for so long seems to have made it particularly popular among armor connoisseurs.

AF_ARMO_LEGGUARDS.NAME: Duel Greaves
AF_ARMO_LEGGUARDS.FLAVOR: These golden greaves originate from the Saga Region. Despite their ornate appearance, they are in fact made from an extremely light-weight material, and designed with ease-of-movement firmly in mind. Excellent for swiftly escaping from binding attacks.

AF_ARMO_GAUNTLET.NAME: Knight's Gauntlet
AF_ARMO_GAUNTLET.EXPR: Attributes: PDEF Up, PATK Up, Daze Res
AF_ARMO_GAUNTLET.FLAVOR: This exquisite, flawlessly made silver and crimson gauntlet is ideal for adventurers and adventurers-at-heart. Its beautiful sheen lifts the spirits of the wearer, allowing him or her to fight without fear.

AF_ARMO_SHIELD.NAME: Great Shield
AF_ARMO_SHIELD.FLAVOR: A type of shield given to newly recruited knights who have sworn their allegiance to their country. The crest it bears represents their pride in their country and vow to protect it. As well as providing defense during hand-to-hand combat, it also grants protection against magic attacks and Poison.

AF_ACCS_EARRING.NAME: Sapphire Earrings
AF_ACCS_EARRING.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, All Status Res
AF_ACCS_EARRING.FLAVOR: These earrings are set with striking blue gemstones. They are said to instill tranquility and bravery in their wearer's heart, and are a popular gift for adventurers and mages. They possess the ability to transform wounds inflicted on the wearer into Jewels.

AF_ACCS_DOLL.NAME: Curious Doll
AF_ACCS_DOLL.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, LUCK Up, Jewels Obtained Up, All Elements Res
AF_ACCS_DOLL.FLAVOR: This plush bear is said to have been passed down through a certain royal family for generations. It's covered in patches, but is undeniably cute. All the love it has received over so many years has imbued it with miraculous powers, and it grants a range of blessings upon its owner.

AF_ACCS_CLOAK.NAME: Swallow's Scarf
AF_ACCS_CLOAK.EXPR: Attributes: AGI Up, DEX Up, Evasion Up
AF_ACCS_CLOAK.FLAVOR: This scarf is popular among mercenaries working in desert regions. It helps keep them concealed amid the darkness, and allows for swift and agile movement. Apparently, the more the silver mark on it glows, the lighter it makes the body.

AF_ACCS_BRACELET.NAME: Scorpio Bracelet
AF_ACCS_BRACELET.FLAVOR: This bracelet is modeled after a powerful and highly poisonous scorpion. Its design makes it popular among rogues and villains, but it is also often worn for self-defense. It stimulates the wearer's powers of concentration, allowing him or her to unleash powerful blows in rapid succession, just like a scorpion.

AF_ARMS_SWO_TYRHUNG.NAME: Mystic Blade Tyrfing
AF_ARMS_SWO_TYRHUNG.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/DEX/LUCK Up, Chance of Daze. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Tyrfing (Inflicts Light Phys Dmg on single target & Quicken [Range: 1, Height Range: 1])
AF_ARMS_SWO_TYRHUNG.FLAVOR: This mystical blade is said to be able to grant wishes. It is made from the same substance as Tyrfing's Killium. It is said that when equipped by one who bears the name Tyrfing, the Killium and Alchemia will react and unleash a special power.

AF_ARMS_SWO_LAEVATEIN.NAME: Mystic Blade Laevateinn
AF_ARMS_SWO_LAEVATEIN.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/CRIT Up, Chance of Bind. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Laevateinn (Inflicts Dark Phys Dmg on single target & MOVE +1 for next turn [Range: 1, Height Range: 1])
AF_ARMS_SWO_LAEVATEIN.FLAVOR: This mystical blade is said to have brought the world to ruin. It is made from the same substance as Laevateinn's Killium. It is said that when equipped by one who bears the name Laevateinn, the Killium and Alchemia will react and unleash a special power.

AF_ARMS_SWO_DANDELGA.NAME: Dandelga
AF_ARMS_SWO_DANDELGA.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/HP/Jewels Obtained Up, Chance of Sleep. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Vargas (Fire Phys Dmg to single target & PATK Up [Range: 1, Height Range: 1])
AF_ARMS_SWO_DANDELGA.FLAVOR: This greatsword was used by Vargas, one of the Six Heroes. It is imbued with his Brave. When equipped by one bearing his name, it is said that this Brave will react with the bearer's Alchemia, unleashing a special power.

AF_ARMS_SWO_LEQSIDA.NAME: Lexida
AF_ARMS_SWO_LEQSIDA.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/PDEF Up, Chance of Slow. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Selena (Water Phys Dmg to single target & PDEF Up [Range: 1, Height Range: 1])
AF_ARMS_SWO_LEQSIDA.FLAVOR: This longsword was used by Selena, one of the Six Heroes. It is imbued with her Brave. When equipped by one bearing her name, it is said that this Brave will react with the bearer's Alchemia, unleashing a special power.

AF_ARMS_KNI_SABARETA.NAME: Dirk of Projection
AF_ARMS_KNI_SABARETA.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/HP/AGI Up, Chance of Daze. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Sabareta (Light Phys Dmg to enemy units in target area & PDEF x2 [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_KNI_SABARETA.FLAVOR: This ancient dagger has been passed down through Sabareta's family for generations. Its blade is keen enough to slice off a finger just by brushing against it, and by slipping through chinks in an enemy's armor it can render even the most heavily armored foes immobile.

AF_ARMS_GUN_01.NAME: Paralyze Pistols
AF_ARMS_GUN_01.EXPR: PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of Paralyze
AF_ARMS_GUN_01.FLAVOR: These beautiful pistols, which feature stylish, yellow barrels, were created by a gunsmith from Slothstein. Magic bullets fired from them will occasionally paralyze the target.

AF_ARMS_GUN_02.NAME: Charm Pistols
AF_ARMS_GUN_02.EXPR: PATK Up, DEX Up, CRIT Up, Chance of Charm
AF_ARMS_GUN_02.FLAVOR: These beautiful pistols, which feature chic, pink barrels, were created by a gunsmith from Slothstein. Magic bullets fired from them will occasionally charm the target.

AF_ARMS_LAN_01.NAME: Paralyzing Lance
AF_ARMS_LAN_01.EXPR: PATK Up, CRIT Up, Chance of Paralyze
AF_ARMS_LAN_01.FLAVOR: This lance is a replica of one thought to have been used in ancient times of Alchemy. Its tip is made from a magical substance that emits a golden glow when its power is activated. This glow will occasionally dazzle foes and inflict Paralyze.

AF_ARMS_LAN_02.NAME: Mellow Lance
AF_ARMS_LAN_02.EXPR: PATK Up, CRIT Up, DEX Up, Chance of Charm (additional effect)
AF_ARMS_LAN_02.FLAVOR: This lance is a replica of one thought to have been used in ancient times of Alchemy. Its tip is made from a magical substance that emits a pink glow when its power is activated. This glow will occasionally entrance foes and inflict Charm.

AF_ARMO_ARMOR_01.NAME: Chronos Armor
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_01.EXPR: DEF Up, HP Up, MDEF Up, Stop Res
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_01.FLAVOR: Armor such as this is thought to have been used by a renowned expeditionary force of times past. It is made using fiber from a rare plant found in the Saga Region. As well as excellent defensive ability, it is also said to guard against the "time-stopping magic" used by Chronomancers.

AF_ARMO_SHIELD_01.NAME: Steel Cross Shield
AF_ARMO_SHIELD_01.EXPR: PDEF Up, HP Up, Debuff Res
AF_ARMO_SHIELD_01.FLAVOR: It is said that, if you strain your ears, a mysterious voice can be heard coming from this shield. This sound is in fact made by the minute vibrations emitted by the steel cross embedded in it. These vibrations are said to protect the bearer against a range of different attacks. The steel used is very hard to find, making this something of a high-end piece.

AF_ARMO_ARMOR_02.NAME: Armor of Wrath
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_02.EXPR: HP Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Light Res Up (Cannot be equipped on Archer or Zahar)
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_02.FLAVOR: This armor has been passed down through the knighthood of Wratharis for generations. The rage and wrath of all the knights who have died in battle surges through it, and it is said that these emotions seize control of the wearer and grant tremendous power. It is very dangerous.

AF_ARMS_SWO_CADANOVA.NAME: Guren Blade
AF_ARMS_SWO_CADANOVA.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, PATK/Fire Res/Jewels Obtained Up. Chance of MDEF Up when attacking. Flaming Crimson Blade (Fire Phys Dmg to single target & Fire Res Up [Range: 1, Height Range: 1]). Miracle Kanon Slash (Light Phys Dmg to single target & PATK Up [Range: 1, Height Range: 1])
AF_ARMS_SWO_CADANOVA.FLAVOR: The trusty sword of Cadanova, or the "Flame Dragon King" as he is known. It is said that when wielded by one who possesses the same "Holy Knight spirit" as Cadanova, an Alchemia reaction is triggered, engulfing its blade in flames and unleashing a special power.

AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_DAI.NAME: Binding Scepter
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_DAI.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, Initial Jewels Up, MDEF Up, Chance of Daze
AF_ARMS_ROD_WIZARD_DAI.FLAVOR: This scepter is said to have once been wielded by a High Mage. The red gemstone at its tip is unstable, and is constantly changing between solid and liquid states. Perhaps because of this, it occasionally prevents the enemy from moving after an attack is inflicted with it.

AF_ARMS_WEDSWO_PINK.NAME: Bride's Love Sword
AF_ARMS_WEDSWO_PINK.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, MATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of Charm
AF_ARMS_WEDSWO_PINK.FLAVOR: This weapon can only be wielded by one who has taken the vows of marriage. Its blade is enveloped in a glow that entrances opponents, and it sometimes inflicts Charm when striking. It draws on the wielder's love for her husband as the source of its power, and so can only be equipped by brides.

AF_ARMS_WEDSWO_DAT.NAME: True Groom's Edge
AF_ARMS_WEDSWO_DAT.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, MATK Up, Chance of Bind
AF_ARMS_WEDSWO_DAT.FLAVOR: This weapon can only be wielded by one who has taken the vows of marriage. Its blade is enveloped in a light that embodies its user's unwavering will, and it will sometimes prevent the enemy from moving after an attack is inflicted with it. It draws on the wielder's love for his wife as the source of its power, and so can only be equipped by bridegrooms.

AF_ARMS_SWO_CLOE.NAME: Dazzling Blade
AF_ARMS_SWO_CLOE.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/HP/CRIT Up, Chance of Quicken. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Chloe (Light Phys Dmg to single target & PDEF x3 for next turn [Range: 1, Height Range: 1])
AF_ARMS_SWO_CLOE.FLAVOR: The trusty sword of Chloe, Royal Commander of the Scarlet Flame Guard of Envylia. When it was forged, Chloe collected the crystals that are set in it herself to give to the blacksmith. The large crystal set in its guard is imbued with her wishes for the sword to serve as a shield to protect her comrades.

AF_ARMS_BOW_01.NAME: Crimson Bow of Wrath
AF_ARMS_BOW_01.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, AGI Up, Chance of lowering enemy unit's PATK
AF_ARMS_BOW_01.FLAVOR: Crimson bows of this sort were used by a warrior people who are said to have fought off a huge and powerful army. Crafted by a now-deceased bow maker, it allows arrows to be fired in rapid succession, making it highly sought after. The heads of its arrows are imbued with magic curses that occasionally lower the strength of those they wound.

AF_ARMS_BOW_02.NAME: Fierce Azure Bow
AF_ARMS_BOW_02.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of lowering enemy unit's PDEF
AF_ARMS_BOW_02.FLAVOR: Azure bows of this sort were used by a warrior people who are said to have fought off a huge and powerful army. Although a mass-produced item, it is a well-made, intricate piece. The heads of its arrows are imbued with magic curses that occasionally lower the defense of those they wound.

AF_ARMS_GLV_01.NAME: Crimson Cestus
AF_ARMS_GLV_01.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, AGI Up, Chance of PATK Up
AF_ARMS_GLV_01.FLAVOR: This cestus was used by a great hero who once wandered the land, fighting with only his fists. It is much lighter than other similar weapons, and allows for swift and agile attacks. Occasionally it will channel the spirit of its former owner, boosting the wearer's physical agility and its own destructive power.

AF_ARMS_GLV_02.NAME: Turquoise Cestus
AF_ARMS_GLV_02.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of DEX Up
AF_ARMS_GLV_02.FLAVOR: Cestuses of this type were used by the followers of a great hero who once wandered the land, fighting with only his fists. It is renowned for its exceptional ease of use. Occasionally it will channel the spirit of the hero, boosting the wearer's physical agility and granting increased accuracy when attacking.

AF_ARMS_SAB_CAPTAIN.NAME: Salty Dog Blade
AF_ARMS_SAB_CAPTAIN.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, CRIT Up, Thunder Res Up, Chance of PATK Up
Gear Ability: Phys Dmg + strong vs demons [RANGE: 1, Height RANGE: 2]
AF_ARMS_SAB_CAPTAIN.FLAVOR: This cutlass was used by a line of pirate captains who once sailed the seas. During the course of their travels, it was used to slay countless monsters, and it's rumored to even be capable of defeating demons. Occasionally it will seemingly channel the strength of its former owners, granting greatly increased attack power.

AF_ARMS_SAB_PIRATE.NAME: Caribbean Cutlass
AF_ARMS_SAB_PIRATE.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, Chance of Poison & Blind
AF_ARMS_SAB_PIRATE.FLAVOR: This cutlass was used by sailors who once sailed the seas on a pirate ship. Blades of this type are extremely useful during long voyages, and any seafarer will have used one at least once before. During the course of the sailors' travels, it was used to slay countless monsters, and it's rumored to even be capable of defeating demons. Occasionally it will also channel its former owners to inflict Poison and Blind when attacking.

AF_ARMS_RIF_SNIPER.NAME: Lethal Meister
AF_ARMS_RIF_SNIPER.EXPR:
Attributes: DEX Up, CRIT Up, PATK Up, Chance of Bind
Gear Ability: Phys Dmg & strong vs demons
AF_ARMS_RIF_SNIPER.FLAVOR: This high-performance rifle was once used by a legendary sniper known as "the master sniper." It has been imbued with his power, and is said to even be capable of shooting down demons. It will occasionally also prevent the enemy from moving.

AF_ARMS_RIF_ASSAULT.NAME: Lethal Slinger
AF_ARMS_RIF_ASSAULT.EXPR: Attributes: DEX Up, CRIT Up, Chance of Silence & Stun
AF_ARMS_RIF_ASSAULT.FLAVOR: This rifle was once used by a legendary sniper when he was still a young mercenary. Any sniper will be familiar with rifles of its type. It can inflict critical hits in rapid succession, and will occasionally also mute and stun enemies.

AF_ARMS_ROD_KAGURA.NAME: Takemikazuchi
AF_ARMS_ROD_KAGURA.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, MDEF Up, LUCK Up, Max Jewels Up. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Kagura (Inflicts Fire Mag Dmg & raises own MATK for three turns [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_ROD_KAGURA.FLAVOR: Kagura's trusty staff. It can only be wielded by those capable of using the secret arts of the royal family of Wadatsumi. The crimson jewel set in its tip is filled with the history of generation-upon-generation of royals, and the will to live up to that history.

AF_ARMS_LAN_KUDHAN.NAME: Piercing Dawn Spear
AF_ARMS_LAN_KUDHAN.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, AGI Up, Jewels Obtained Up. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Kudanstein (Physical attack (long-range, single target, 100% Hit) + raises own CRIT by 50% for two turns)
AF_ARMS_LAN_KUDHAN.FLAVOR: Kudanstein's trusty lance. He has grown up using it, even since before joining the knighthood, and over this time has customized it to best suit his needs. As a result, no one other than Kudan can use it to its full potential.

AF_ARMS_FEN_RAPIER.NAME: Light Metal Rapier
AF_ARMS_FEN_RAPIER.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, PDEF Up, AGI Up, Thunder Res Up, Chance of Evasion Rate Up. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Fencer (Inflicts Wind Phys Dmg on target enemy unit & greatly raises Evasion Rate for next turn [Range: 1, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_FEN_RAPIER.FLAVOR: Rapiers of this type are common in Arcadia. They're designed to be easy to use even for novice adventurers, and when wielded by a veteran can be used to unleash multiple combination attacks. Excellent for piercing attacks and pursuit attacks.

AF_ARMS_REA_SICKLE.NAME: Doom Size
AF_ARMS_REA_SICKLE.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, CRIT Up, Chance of Delay.
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Harbingers (Inflicts Dark Phys Dmg & Death Sentence on single target [Range: 3, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_REA_SICKLE.FLAVOR: This scythe is popular among Harbingers from Arcadia. The skull decoration at its top is said to absorb miasma. Although a difficult weapon to wield, those who are able to do so are considered to be full-fledged Reapers.

AF_ARMS_SHE_TAROT.NAME: Sacrifice Ritual
AF_ARMS_SHE_TAROT.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, MDEF Up, Max Jewels Up, Chance of Bind.
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Shamans (Fully recovers HP of units in area around self & PDEF/MDEF +100% until next turn [Area: Diamond (7), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_SHE_TAROT.FLAVOR: These ceremonial cards are used by Shamans from Arcadia. Each of them contain magical spells, and can be used to communicate with supernatural forces and channel various miraculous powers.

AF_ARMS_KUNAI_02.NAME: Demon Bane Kunai
AF_ARMS_KUNAI_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, DEX Up, Chance of PDEF Up
Gear Ability: Phys Dmg & strong vs demons [Range: 1, Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMS_KUNAI_02.FLAVOR: In Wadatsumi, kunai such as these are used by middle-ranking ninja. Their hilts are set with evil-warding talismans, and they are said to also have some effect against demons. Occasionally Alchemia will flow into the wielder from within them, boosting defensive power.

AF_ARMS_KUNAI_03.NAME: Ranunculus Kunai
AF_ARMS_KUNAI_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of Paralyze
AF_ARMS_KUNAI_03.FLAVOR: In Wadatsumi, kunai such as these are used by low-ranking ninja and ninja-in-training. Not only do they increase their user's attack power, their blades also contain buttercup petals that occasionally inflict paralysis on opponents.

AF_ARMS_CHAKRAM_02.NAME: Serenity Chakram
AF_ARMS_CHAKRAM_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, DEX Up, Chance of Quicken
Gear Ability: Inflicts Phys Dmg & lowers enemy's Slash ATK for three turns
AF_ARMS_CHAKRAM_02.FLAVOR: Chakrams of this type are popular among fighters who work as dancers. After luring in enemies with mystical and enticing dances, they can be used to swiftly fell them using dance-combat techniques. The Alchemia emitted from this chakram's blade also lowers the attack power of foes.

AF_ARMS_CHAKRAM_03.NAME: Namu Chakram
AF_ARMS_CHAKRAM_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of Paralyze
AF_ARMS_CHAKRAM_03.FLAVOR: This chakram is very easy to use, and is a staple weapon among dancers. Many learn the basics of fighting while dancing by using one such as this. The power of the crystal set in it will occasionally inflict paralysis on enemies when attacking.

AF_ARMO_SHIELD_02.NAME: Aegis Guard
AF_ARMO_SHIELD_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PDEF Up, MDEF Up, HP Up
Gear Ability: Raises PDEF/MDEF on units within area around self
AF_ARMO_SHIELD_02.FLAVOR: This extremely heavy shield is made from a rare "blue-mirror" ore found in Ragna. As the name "Aegis" suggests, it boasts a mighty defensive power. When the user and the shield's Alchemia are well-matched, it is said to grant a truly impregnable defense.

AF_ARMS_HARP_02.NAME: Tuuli Kantele
AF_ARMS_HARP_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, DEX Up, Chance of Stop
Gear Ability: Raises Slash ATK of ally units within area around self
AF_ARMS_HARP_02.FLAVOR: A traditional five-stringed instrument from the Saga Region. This one is renowned in bard circles, and is an instrument that many master bards would love to play. Its notes contain Alchemia that affects not only the user but also his or her allies.

AF_ARMS_HARP_03.NAME: Aeolian Harp
AF_ARMS_HARP_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of Delay
AF_ARMS_HARP_03.FLAVOR: A traditional five-stringed instrument from the Saga Region. It is often played by novice bards, and any bard will have used one at least once before. Its notes contain Alchemia that occasionally bewilders foes, slowing them down.

AF_ARMS_AXE_02.NAME: War Labrys
AF_ARMS_AXE_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, CRIT UP, Chance of PDEF Up
Gear Ability: Deals damage two squares forward
AF_ARMS_AXE_02.FLAVOR: This double-edged axe requires considerable strength and brawn to wield. It is said that only the strongest of Warriors have what it takes to harness its power, and that the axe will control and consume those who are not worthy.

AF_ARMS_AXE_03.NAME: Double-Edged Axe
AF_ARMS_AXE_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, Chance of PATK Up
AF_ARMS_AXE_03.FLAVOR: This double-edged axe requires considerable strength and brawn to wield. Among Warriors, however, axes of its type are widely used, even by novices.

AF_ARMS_SEDA_BOW.NAME: Tranquil Bow Alizehan
AF_ARMS_SEDA_BOW.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, AGI Up, Chance of Daze Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Seida (Inflicts Wind Mag Dmg on enemy units within target area & Quicken [Range: 6, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: Unlimited])
AF_ARMS_SEDA_BOW.FLAVOR: This bow has been passed down for generations among the Alize people of the Saga Region. When combined with the wind-dance abilities of the Alize people it is able to unleash tremendous power. Today it is used by Seida, and it is said that no one other than her is able to wield it.

AF_ARMS_MONZ_AXE.NAME: Steady Thunder Axe
AF_ARMS_MONZ_AXE.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, PDEF Up, Chance of PDEF Down. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Monzein (Thunder Dmg to enemy units within target area & PATK Up [Range: 3 sq line]
AF_ARMS_MONZ_AXE.FLAVOR: This powerful battleaxe was created by a weaponsmith from Envylia who also used smithing techniques from Wadatsumi. The axe's head is much larger than usual, and it was thought to be impossible for anyone to use, but Monzein took to it straight away and has used it ever since.

AF_ACCS_CANO_HEAD.NAME: Feather Headdress
AF_ACCS_CANO_HEAD.EXPR: Attributes: MDEF Up, PDEF Up, AGI Up Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Kanon (Raises All Elements Res of 1 ally unit [Range: 3, Height Range: 2])
AF_ACCS_CANO_HEAD.FLAVOR: Kanon's beautiful feather headdress. She has worn it ever since she was a knight-in-training. It is said to have become imbued with Kanon's powerful Light magic energy, and as a result increases the Dark resistance of other allies in the area around her.

AF_ARMO_FUNDOSHI.NAME: Mighty Loincloth
AF_ARMO_FUNDOSHI.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, AGI Up, Charm Res Up, Chance of Charm

AF_ARMS_TAROT_01.NAME: Twilight Tarot
AF_ARMS_TAROT_01.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK/HP/PDEF Up with chance of PDEF Up
Gear Ability: Slightly recovers own HP & increases range of normal attacks by 2.
AF_ARMS_TAROT_01.FLAVOR: A set of magical cards with a red-yellow gradient on the backs. This brightly colored pattern is created by the Alchemia that flows from within them. Their surging power means that anyone less than the most experienced of users will find them unmanageable as a fortune-telling tool, let alone a weapon.

AF_ARMS_TAROT_02.NAME: Clear-Sky Tarot
AF_ARMS_TAROT_02.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, MDEF Up, Chance of MDEF Up
AF_ARMS_TAROT_02.FLAVOR: A set of magical cards with a blue-green gradient on the backs. This brightly colored pattern is created by the Alchemia flowing from within them. Their stylish design and ease-of-use make them popular with novice astrologers.

AF_ARMS_GREAT_SWORD_01.NAME: Faustian Greatsword
AF_ARMS_GREAT_SWORD_01.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, CRIT Up, Chance of AGI Up
Gear Ability: Weak attack & casts Quicken on self.
AF_ARMS_GREAT_SWORD_01.FLAVOR: This double-edged greatsword is so powerful that it is said those lacking the skill and strength to wield it will be consumed by its power and plunged into eternal darkness. When used by an experienced dark knight, however, it offers unparalleled performance in battle.

AF_ARMS_GREAT_SWORD_02.NAME: Phantom Blade
AF_ARMS_GREAT_SWORD_02.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, Chance of PATK Up
AF_ARMS_GREAT_SWORD_02.FLAVOR: This double-edged greatsword's ease-of-use makes it particularly popular with newly converted dark knights. When the user is well attuned with it, it will occasionally boost his or her attack power.

AF_ARMS_DSWO_02.NAME: Twin Storm-Blades
AF_ARMS_DSWO_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, HP Up, Chance of Avoid Rate Up
Gear Ability: Raises Evasion Rate of ally units within area around self.
AF_ARMS_DSWO_02.FLAVOR: These twin blades are designed to be held underhand. They are intended for long periods of continued combat without rest. They can also increase the evasive ability of nearby allies, but their speed and power require a fair degree of skill to control effectively.

AF_ARMS_DSWO_03.NAME: Harbinger's Blades
AF_ARMS_DSWO_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of PATK Up
AF_ARMS_DSWO_03.FLAVOR: These twin blades are designed to be held underhand. They allow the wielder to dash around the battlefield, deftly cutting down foes. They grant the user increased attack power and agility, and are popular among those who like to get as many attacks in as possible.

AF_ARMS_ROD_02.NAME: Green Rod of Wisdom
AF_ARMS_ROD_02.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, Max Jewels Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Chance of MATK Up
Gear Ability: Super long-range healing of single target.
AF_ARMS_ROD_02.FLAVOR: This key-shaped rod is said to guide the bearer towards ultimate worldly wisdom. It allows the user to heal allies from long distances, but its awesome power means that only those with a sufficient degree of skill are even able to touch it.

AF_ARMS_ROD_03.NAME: Blue Rod of Sagacity
AF_ARMS_ROD_03.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, MDEF Up, Chance of PDEF Up
AF_ARMS_ROD_03.FLAVOR: This key-shaped rod is said to lead the bearer towards profound knowledge of self. It has been adapted to make it simpler to use, and although it does still require a certain degree of skill to wield effectively, it offers a good balance between power and ease-of-use, making it a popular item.

AF_ARMS_SWO_YAUL_01.NAME: Glory-Bringers
AF_ARMS_SWO_YAUL_01.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, Jewels Obtained Up. Chance of casting Auto Heal when attacking. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Yauras (4-Hit Water Dmg to single target & AGI Up [Range: 1, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_SWO_YAUL_01.FLAVOR: Yauras's trusty twin blades. They allow for lightning-fast attacks, and each of them alone boasts more power than most swords. Apparently, Yauras practices daily so as to avoid scratching or nicking them during battle and tarnishing their beauty.

AF_ARMO_TOWER_01.NAME: Armor of Mystic Winds
AF_ARMO_TOWER_01.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, Thunder Res Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, AGI Up, Slow Res Up
AF_ARMO_TOWER_01.FLAVOR: This armor is shrouded in mystery. It can only be obtained by those who have completed the campaign on Mystic Tower Veda. It is made from the same substance as the tower itself, and has also been imbued with powerful wind energy. It provides increased resistance against thunder energy.

AF_ARMO_TOWER_02.NAME: Armor of Mystic Thunder
AF_ARMO_TOWER_02.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, Water Res Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Stop Res Up, Delay Res Up
AF_ARMO_TOWER_02.FLAVOR: This armor is shrouded in mystery. It can only be obtained by those who have completed the campaign on Mystic Tower Veda. It is made from the same substance as the tower itself, and has also been imbued with powerful thunder energy. It provides increased resistance against water energy.

AF_ARMO_TOWER_03.NAME: Armor of Mystic Water
AF_ARMO_TOWER_03.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, Fire Res Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Max Jewels Up, Charm Res Up
AF_ARMO_TOWER_03.FLAVOR: This armor is shrouded in mystery. It can only be obtained by those who have completed the campaign on Mystic Tower Veda. It is made from the same substance as the tower itself, and has also been imbued with powerful water energy. It provides increased resistance against fire energy.

AF_ARMO_TOWER_04.NAME: Armor of Mystic Fire
AF_ARMO_TOWER_04.EXPR: Attributes: Wind Res Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, HP Up, Silence Res Up
AF_ARMO_TOWER_04.FLAVOR: This suit of armor is cloaked in mystery, and can only be obtained by those who have conquered Mystic Tower Veda. It is made from the same material as the tower, and has also been imbued with Fire energy. Also boosts resistance against Wind attacks.

AF_ARMO_TOWER_05.NAME: Armor of Mystic Light
AF_ARMO_TOWER_05.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, Dark Res Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Paralyze Res Up, Charm Res Up
AF_ARMO_TOWER_05.FLAVOR: This suit of armor is cloaked in mystery, and can only be obtained by those who have conquered Mystic Tower Veda. It is made from the same material as the tower, and has also been imbued with Light energy. Also boosts resistance against Dark attacks.

AF_ARMO_TOWER_06.NAME: Armor of Mystic Thunder
AF_ARMO_TOWER_06.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, Light Res Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Confuse/Rage Res Up, Petrify Res Up
AF_ARMO_TOWER_06.FLAVOR: This suit of armor is cloaked in mystery, and can only be obtained by those who have conquered Mystic Tower Veda. It is made from the same material as the tower, and has also been imbued with Dark energy. Also boosts resistance against Light attacks.

AF_ARMO_TOWER_07.NAME: Mystic Rainbow Guard
AF_ARMO_TOWER_07.EXPR: Attributes: All Elements Res Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Poison Res Up, Sleep Res Up
AF_ARMO_TOWER_07.FLAVOR: This armor is shrouded in mystery. It can only be obtained by those who have completed the campaign on Mystic Tower Veda. Made from the same substance as the tower itself, it has been imbued with energy of each of the different elements, and thus provides increased resistance against attacks of any element.

AF_ACCS_100CP_01.NAME: Alkemono Mascot
AF_ACCS_100CP_01.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, Increased chance of surviving fatal damage
AF_ACCS_100CP_01.FLAVOR: This adorable, fluffy mascot will fit snugly in a bag, so you're sure to want to take it with you on every adventure.

AF_ARMS_MEDICHINE_02.NAME: Psychedelic Flask
AF_ARMS_MEDICHINE_02.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, LUCK Up, Max Jewels Up, Chance of PDEF Up
Gear Ability: Inflicts Mag Dmg (Medium) [Range: 3, Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMS_MEDICHINE_02.FLAVOR: A flask containing a bizarre-looking medicine. Handling it requires the utmost caution, and many inexperienced professors will hesitate to even go near it. The medicine inside contains extremely powerful magical energy, and will sometimes increase the bearer's physical defensive power.

AF_ARMS_MEDICHINE_03.NAME: Mysterious Flask
AF_ARMS_MEDICHINE_03.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, Max Jewels Up, Chance of MDEF Up
AF_ARMS_MEDICHINE_03.FLAVOR: A flask containing a strange-looking medicine. It won't break easily, which makes it a popular choice among professors. The medicine inside contains extremely powerful magical energy, and will sometimes increase the bearer's magical defense power.

AF_ARMS_BEAST_01.NAME: Beast Lord Talons
AF_ARMS_BEAST_01.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, AGI Up, Chance of Petrify
Gear Ability: Inflicts Phys Dmg on enemy units in area around self.
AF_ARMS_BEAST_01.FLAVOR: This claw contains the power of a mighty beast. It arouses the wearer's fighting instincts, boosting not only attack power and agility, but also dexterity. It is a difficult weapon to use, but can sometimes even petrify foes when attacking.

AF_ARMS_BEAST_02.NAME: Nimble Beast Talons
AF_ARMS_BEAST_02.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of Paralyze
AF_ARMS_BEAST_02.FLAVOR: This claw contains the power of a fearsome beast. It fills the wearer with fighting energy, boosting attack power and agility. Compared to other weapons of its type it's relatively easy to use, and will also sometimes paralyze foes when attacking.

AF_ARMS_SWO_ZEKE_01.NAME: Crowley Sword
AF_ARMS_SWO_ZEKE_01.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, PDEF Up, Chance of Daze (additional effect.) Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Zeke (Large Dmg to single target & greatly lowers Slash Atk [Range: 4, Height Range: 1])
AF_ARMS_SWO_ZEKE_01.FLAVOR: This sword has seen Zeke through countless battles. He maintains it carefully, and its blade never loses its shine. Back when they were young, Logi and Dios apparently once got in trouble for trying to touch it without his permission...

AF_ARMS_LAN_03.NAME: Valhalla Lance
AF_ARMS_LAN_03.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, CRIT Up, Chance of PATK Up
Gear Ability: Swaps positions with target

AF_ARMS_KATANA_MASAMUNE_01.NAME: Masamune Blade
AF_ARMS_KATANA_MASAMUNE_01.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of AGI Up. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Masamune (Phys Dmg to single target & raises PATK/Evasion Rate [Range: 1, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_KATANA_MASAMUNE_01.FLAVOR: This famous blade is said to be a sword above all others. It's made from the same Killium as Masamune. It is said that when carried by one who bears the name "Masamune," the Killium and Alchemia react with each other, unlocking a special power.

AF_ARMS_BOW_SHEKINAH_01.NAME: Dazzling Shekinah Bow
AF_ARMS_BOW_SHEKINAH_01.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, Chance of Evasion Rate Up. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Shekinah (Inflicts Phys Dmg & raises Range by 1 [Range: 5, Height Range: Unlimited])
AF_ARMS_BOW_SHEKINAH_01.FLAVOR: This famous bow is said to be a bow above all others. It's made from the same Killium as Shekinah. It is said that when carried by one who bears the name "Shekinah," the Killium and Alchemia react with each other, unlocking a special power.

AF_ARMS_AXE_SITA_01.NAME: Cita Hurricane Axe
AF_ARMS_AXE_SITA_01.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, Chance of PDEF Up. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Cita (Inflicts Phys Dmg (High) & absorbs part of the Dmg inflicted as HP [Range: 1, Height Range:2])
AF_ARMS_AXE_SITA_01.FLAVOR: Known as the "weapon with seven heads," this axe can smash through countless foes with one mighty swing. It's made from the same Killium as Cita. It is said that when carried by one who bears the name "Cita," the Killium and Alchemia react with each other, unlocking a special power.

AF_ARMS_NEC_02.NAME: Soulstealer Scythe
AF_ARMS_NEC_02.EXPR:
PATK Up, HP Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Chance of PDEF Down
Gear Ability: Absorbs Jewels & MOVE +1
AF_ARMS_NEC_02.FLAVOR: This scythe can only be used by the most seasoned of Necromancers. Its brilliant blue, crystal-like blade means it is also a sought-after item among antique and curio collectors. However, some say that the magical energy contained in the scythe may in fact drain the life force of unsuspecting users.

AF_ARMS_MIK_02.NAME: Oracle's Prayer
AF_ARMS_MIK_02.EXPR:
MATK Up, LUCK Up, AGI Up, Chance of Quicken
Gear Ability: Summon that increases stats (mainly AGI)
AF_ARMS_MIK_02.FLAVOR: This staff is used to channel spirits in divine rituals. The sacred energy contained within it is said to boost the wielder's physical agility and luck. When used by an experienced shrine maiden, it can be used to not only channel the powers of but also summon deities.

AF_ARMS_MIK_03.NAME: Rod of Exorcism
AF_ARMS_MIK_03.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, LUCK Up, Chance of PATK Down
AF_ARMS_MIK_03.FLAVOR: This staff is used to channel spirits in divine rituals. Similar ones are found throughout Wadatsumi, and any shrine maiden will use one on a regular basis. The destructive forces contained within it are said to boost the wielder's physical attack power.

AF_ARMS_THI_02.NAME: Tiger Kris
AF_ARMS_THI_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, AGI Up, Chance of Paralyze
Gear Ability: Long-range attack with range of five squares.
AF_ARMS_THI_02.FLAVOR: This kris has a unique, asymmetric blade. Its green handle and sinister yellow and black blade are really striking. It has been imbued with magic curses used in the Saga Region that can apparently deal powerful damage and inflict paralysis on foes.

AF_ARMS_THI_03.NAME: Breaker Kris
AF_ARMS_THI_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of PDEF Down
AF_ARMS_THI_03.FLAVOR: This kris has a unique, asymmetric blade. Its crimson handle and keen, twisted blade are really striking. It has been imbued with magic curses used in the Saga Region that will apparently raise the wielder's attack power and occasionally also lower his or her opponent's defensive power.

AF_ARMS_SEN_04.NAME: Golden Jade Tarot
AF_ARMS_SEN_04.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, AGI Up, HP Up, Chance of PDEF Up
Gear Ability: Inflicts Mag Dmg on enemy units within target area and greatly boosts own MATK.
AF_ARMS_SEN_04.FLAVOR: A set of jade-colored magic cards with gold detailing. The Alchemia overflowing from within them causes the gold and jade to glitter and sparkle. Such cards are seldom seen for sale, and some rumors say that they in fact chose their owner, but any seasoned astrologer will be able to easily harness their power.

AF_ARMS_OTHI_01.NAME: Illusion Rod
AF_ARMS_OTHI_01.EXPR: Attributes: Jewels Up, MATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of inflicting Delay Enables Master Ability when equipped on Othima (Inflicts Mag Dmg on enemy units within target area & lowers enemy units' AGI for three turns [Range: 4, Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_OTHI_01.FLAVOR: This rod allows Othima to further draw out the powerful energy contained inside him. He's very fond of it, and as you might expect it's packed with a fair amount of Alchemia. Even within the Holy Guard there are few who would be able to withstand the effects of the fearsome energy that it emits when used.

AF_ARMS_HAMMER_02.NAME: Blacksmith Hammer
AF_ARMS_HAMMER_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, PDEF Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Chance of Quicken
Gear Ability: Casts Auto Jewel Regen on self for five turns
AF_ARMS_HAMMER_02.FLAVOR: This black hammer is truly excellent for forging weapons. It's the sort of item that any blacksmith who has mastered his craft will want to try out at least once. It's also said to boost its owner's natural healing ability, in order to make sure that he or she can continue using it for as long as possible.

AF_ARMS_HAMMER_03.NAME: Leveling Hammer
AF_ARMS_HAMMER_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, Chance of PATK Up
AF_ARMS_HAMMER_03.FLAVOR: This blue hammer is very good for forging weapons. It's relatively easy to use, and is very popular among apprentice blacksmiths. It can be used as both a tool and a weapon, and will occasionally also boost its wielder's attack power.

AF_ARMS_DOC_04.NAME: Techno Flask
AF_ARMS_DOC_04.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, HP Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Chance of Quicken
Gear Ability: Recovers large amount of HP of ally units in diamond-shaped area around self.
AF_ARMS_DOC_04.FLAVOR: The medicine inside this flask contains powerful magical energy. Its contents provide a wide range of benefits, replenishing life force and energy and also occasionally boosting physical agility. They can also be used to instantly provide healing for multiple nearby allies.

AF_ACCS_SNOWMAN_HAT.NAME: Snowman Hat
AF_ACCS_SNOWMAN_HAT.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, PDEF Up, Max Jewels Up, Water Res Up.
Gear Ability: Recovers Jewels of ally units within target area.
AF_ACCS_SNOWMAN_HAT.FLAVOR: This special hat is only sold during the winter holiday season. It is in fact more like a "snowman head" than a "snowman hat," and is great for getting everyone into the holiday spirit—especially the person wearing it.

AF_ARMS_EXCALIBUR.NAME: Excalibur
AF_ARMS_EXCALIBUR.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, MDEF Up, CRIT Up, Chance of AGI Up
3★ to 5★ Enables Master Ability when equipped on Saber when her job type is "Saber" (Inflicts Wind Phys Dmg & raises own Missile DEF for three turns [Range: 4, Height Range: 3])
AF_ARMS_EXCALIBUR.FLAVOR: Packed with the wishes of mankind and forged on a star, this divine weapon is the holiest of all holy swords. When equipped by Saber, its chosen owner, an even greater power is unlocked.

AF_ACCS_TOSAKA_PENDANT.NAME: Tohsaka's Pendant
AF_ACCS_TOSAKA_PENDANT.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, MATK Up, Water Res Up, Chance of inflicting Sleep
3★ to 5★ Enables Master Ability when equipped on Rin Tohsaka when her job type is "Jewel Magician" (Inflicts Fire Mag Dmg & Stop & raises own MATK for three turns [Range: 5, Height Range: 3])
AF_ACCS_TOSAKA_PENDANT.FLAVOR: This pendant is set with a gemstone that was left to Rin by her father. It glows a deep crimson, and is imbued with the magical energy of the successive heads of the Tohsaka family. When equipped by Rin Tohsaka, who is able to use all five of the Great Elements, it can be used to unleash even greater flame energy.

AF_ACCS_IRIYA_BIRD.NAME: Storch Ritter
AF_ACCS_IRIYA_BIRD.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Chance of inflicting Bind
3★ to 5★ Enables Master Ability when equipped on Illyasviel when her job type is "Master Magician" (Inflicts Water Phys Dmg & raises own MATK/AGI for three turns [Range: 4, Height Range: 3])
AF_ACCS_IRIYA_BIRD.FLAVOR: This beautiful, snowflake-like bird familiar was created from Illya's hair. Although small, it is a powerful familiar that is even able to generate its own magical energy. Its full power can only be unlocked when it is equipped by Illya.

AF_ACCS_GILG_SWORD.NAME: Gate of Babylon
AF_ACCS_GILG_SWORD.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Chance of inflicting Paralyze
3★ to 5★ Enables Master Ability when equipped on Gilgamesh when his job type is "King of Heroes" (Inflicts Thunder Phys Dmg on units within target area & raises own All Elements Res for three turns [Range: 4, Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 2])
AF_ACCS_GILG_SWORD.FLAVOR: This Noble Phantasm can be used to materialize and fire treasures en masse. Its full power can only be unlocked when it is equipped by Gilgamesh.

AF_ARMS_KANSYOUBAKUYA.NAME: Kanshou and Bakuya Swords
AF_ARMS_KANSYOUBAKUYA.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Chance of raising PATK for three turns
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Archer when his job type is "Archer" (Dark Phys Dmg & raises own Slash Res for three turns [Range: 5, Height Range: 3])
AF_ARMS_KANSYOUBAKUYA.FLAVOR: This pair of twin swords are both enscribed with yin-yang patterns. Kanshou's black blade is embossed with a tortoise shell pattern, while Bakuya has a pure white blade. When wielded by Archer their full potential is unlocked.

AF_ACCS_DOREI.NAME: Earthen Fortune Bells
AF_ACCS_DOREI.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, Debuff Res Up.
Gear Ability: Raises Max HP of target unit.

AF_ACCS_HAMAYA.NAME: Divine Spirit Arrow
AF_ACCS_HAMAYA.EXPR:
Attributes: AGI Up, All Elements Res Up.
Gear Ability: Raises MOVE of target unit.

AF_ARMS_SAM02.NAME: Ogre Slaying Blade
AF_ARMS_SAM02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, DEX Up, Chance of PATK Up
Gear Ability: Raises own PDEF/MDEF by 150% for one turn.
AF_ARMS_SAM02.FLAVOR: This long sword contains an incredible amount of Alchemia. It is said to be able to cut through anything, but does require a high degree of proficiency to wield. It is said to be a blade that all those who follow the way of the sword will want to try out at least once.

AF_ARMS_SAM03.NAME: Spirit Kabutowari
AF_ARMS_SAM03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of PDEF Down
AF_ARMS_SAM03.FLAVOR: This long sword contains an incredible amount of Alchemia. It's both keen enough to slice a fly clean in half and very easy to use. Blades of its type are used by all those who follow the way of the sword--from novices to seasoned veterans.

AF_ARMS_LNC_02.NAME: Giga Blaze Buster
AF_ARMS_LNC_02.EXPR:
Attributes: DEX Up, PATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of PDEF Up
Gear Ability: Doubles own PATK for one turn.
AF_ARMS_LNC_02.FLAVOR: This rocket launcher is well regarded among in-the-know Machinists. It has a strong recoil, so isn't the sort of weapon for everyone, but if used well its devastating firepower can completely overpower opponents.

AF_ARMS_LNC_03.NAME: Meteor Launcher
AF_ARMS_LNC_03.EXPR: Attributes: DEX Up, AGI Up, Chance of MDEF Up
AF_ARMS_LNC_03.FLAVOR: This rocket launcher is well-known among Machinists. It's been designed for minimal recoil, so is easy to use even for total beginners. It still packs considerable firepower, though--as well as excellent user safety.

AF_ARMS_KAM_02.NAME: Rod of Blessing
AF_ARMS_KAM_02.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, LUCK Up, PDEF Up, Chance of MATK Up
Gear Ability: Raises PATK and AGI of all ally units.
AF_ARMS_KAM_02.FLAVOR: This rod is an item used in a ceremony of spiritual cleansing. It can only be used by those the gods judge worthy, but to those they accept it grants immense power. The divine blessings contained within it mean that it raises the combat power of all the bearer's companions.

AF_ARMS_SHN_02.NAME: Staff of Thriving Business
AF_ARMS_SHN_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, LUCK Up, Max Jewels Up, Chance of Quicken
Gear Ability: Casts Auto Jewel Regen on ally units within cross-shaped area around self when equipped on a Merchant.
AF_ARMS_SHN_02.FLAVOR: The development of this staff is said to have been led by a merchant who traveled from land to land. The sphere at its tip is used to calculate the relative locations of different countries. The power secreted within it also boosts natural healing ability, making it a trusty companion on long journeys.

AF_ARMS_BLA_02.NAME: Roaring Slash
AF_ARMS_BLA_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, AGI Up, Chance of Paralyze Up
Gear Ability: Inflicts Phys Dmg on enemy units within target area
AF_ARMS_BLA_02.FLAVOR: This halberd was forged by the famous smith Zankuro, who was inspired by a heavenly dragon. Its use necessitates an innate natural ability, but if mastered it can massacre foes effortlessly, like a dragon toppling foes with gigantic roars.

AF_ARMS_BLA_03.NAME: Slumber Blade Kuro
AF_ARMS_BLA_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of Sleep
AF_ARMS_BLA_03.FLAVOR: This halberd was forged by the famous smith Zankuro, who imbued it with magical energy. With each swing, a gentle light seems to bubble from its blade, stopping foes from feeling any pain from its blows and beckoning them towards a deep, peaceful sleep...

AF_ARMS_MAJ_02.NAME: Magia Cleric Gun
AF_ARMS_MAJ_02.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, AGI Up, HP Up, Chance of MATK Up
Gear Ability: Recovers HP & recovers statuses [Range: 5, Height Range: Unlimited]
AF_ARMS_MAJ_02.FLAVOR: This pair of pistols was created especially for a magic gun user. Their barrels can withstand the use of magic bullets of any type, and they're renowned for their miraculous lightness, which allows them to easily be spun in the hand.

AF_ARMS_1STANNIVERSARY.NAME: Alchemist Code Memorial
AF_ARMS_1STANNIVERSARY.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, Counter Res Up
AF_ARMS_1STANNIVERSARY.FLAVOR: This charming gift box is packed to the brim with presents. The memories contained inside it motivate its owner during combat. It's given to people to say thanks for the past year and to wish them a bright future.

AF_ARMS_RENA_01.NAME: Battlefield Drama
AF_ARMS_RENA_01.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, AGI Up, Jewels Obtained Up
Gear Ability: Inflicts Dark Mag Dmg on enemy units within target area & raises own MATK/AGI for three turns [Range: 4, Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 3]
AF_ARMS_RENA_01.FLAVOR: This script indicates what the bearer's role should be in an upcoming battle. Its contents change each time it's opened, the letters on it vanishing once the foretold battle ends. Rena used it to effectively fulfill her role in combat, and as a result was able to survive countless battles.

AF_ARMS_MIUNA_01.NAME: Hephaestus Hammer
AF_ARMS_MIUNA_01.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, Initial Jewels Up, Chance of PDEF Up Enables Master Ability when equipped on Miuna (Inflicts Fire Phys Dmg on enemy units within target area & raises own MOVE by 1 and casts Auto Jewel Regen on self for three turns [Range: 2, Area: Square (3), Height Range: 3])
AF_ARMS_MIUNA_01.FLAVOR: This golden hammer has been passed down among the "Ku" people for generations. It has been used to create innumerable weapons, and behind the scenes has played a large role in maintaining peace across the continent. It also makes a very effective weapon itself, providing the bearer with both offensive and defensive support.

AF_ARMS_SWO_ZAYI_01.NAME: Excalibur
AF_ARMS_SWO_ZAYI_01.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, MDEF Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Chance of PATK Up Chance of Rising Sun (Light Phys Dmg to enemy units within area around self) or Eternal Glow (Light Phys Dmg to enemy units within target area & raises All Elements Res)
AF_ARMS_SWO_ZAYI_01.FLAVOR: This holy blade is passed down among the Lord Commanders, the most elite members of the Holy Guard Knights. When swung by one who possesses unwavering justice it boasts truly incredible power. It will never permit its wielder to stray from the path of righteousness.

AF_ARMS_SAKURA_00.NAME: Sakura Blade
AF_ARMS_SAKURA_00.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/AGI/DEX Up, Chance of raising PDEF/MDEF for two turns. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Sakura (For one turn, raises PATK/MATK by 50% and Jewels Obtained by 15 for ally units within target area [Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 3])
AF_ARMS_SAKURA_00.FLAVOR: The beauty of this stunning blade has been compared to that of cherry blossom in full bloom, illuminated by the spring morning sun. It is said to have been created for Sakura by a swordsmith from a ninja village, and possesses both great beauty and great keenness. Only Sakura is able to utilize its full power.

AF_ARMS_FOLCAS_00.NAME: Forcas Hell Lance
AF_ARMS_FOLCAS_00.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/AGI/CRIT Up, Chance of lowering target unit's PDEF for one turn. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Forcas (Inflicts 5-hit Dmg on target enemy unit [Range: Diamond (9), Height Range: 3])
AF_ARMS_FOLCAS_00.FLAVOR: This lance is said to have been used by a knight from hell. It is made from the same substance as Forcas's Killium. It is said that when equipped by one who bears the name Forcas, the Killium and Alchemia will react and unleash a special power.

AF_ARMS_BASYOSEN_01.NAME: Bashosen Artifact
AF_ARMS_BASYOSEN_01.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/DEX/AGI/Jewels Obtained Up (AGI/Jewels Obtained Up are added when evolving to 5★). Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Bashosen (For one turn, raises PATK/DEX by 50% and Evasion Rate by 30 for ally units within target area [Range: 3, Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 3])
AF_ARMS_BASYOSEN_01.FLAVOR: This fan is said to be powerful enough to calm the flames of a blazing mountaintop. It is made from the same substance as Bashosen's Killium. It is said that when equipped by one who bears the name Bashosen, the Killium and Alchemia will react and unleash a special power.

AF_ARMS_S_YOMI_00.NAME: Bow of Darkness
AF_ARMS_S_YOMI_00.EXPR: Attributes: PATK/PDEF/MDEF Up, Chance of lowering target unit's PATK/MATK for three turns. Unlocks Master Ability when equipped on Dark Princess Yomi (Inflicts Dark Dmg on enemy units within target area [Range: 4, Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 3]
AF_ARMS_S_YOMI_00.FLAVOR: This bow is thought to have lain sleeping in pitch darkness until it was awakened on the whim of a princess of the dead. It will accept no one other than the one who awakened it as its owner, and will burn anyone else who tries to touch it to a crisp. When wielded by its owner, though, it will unleash its true, devastating power.

AF_ACCS_CHOKER.NAME: Heart Choker
AF_ACCS_CHOKER.EXPR:
Attributes: DEX Up, AGI Up, Charm Res Up
Gear Ability: Recovers ally units' statuses.
AF_ACCS_CHOKER.FLAVOR: This heart choker makes the wearer more physically attractive and stops them from being seduced by others. When pointed at an ally who is in pain, its special powers will heal any adverse status effects that are affecting them.

AF_ARMS_HWIZ_02.NAME: Sanctuary Rod
AF_ARMS_HWIZ_02.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, PDEF Up, HP Up, Chance of PDEF Up
Gear Ability: Raises Missile Res of ally units.
AF_ARMS_HWIZ_02.FLAVOR: Hanging from the top of this rod are shield-like crystals that also offer protection against long-range attacks. The Alchemia inside the rod is said to boost resistance against missile attacks for all the bearer's allies.

AF_ARMS_SOL_04.NAME: Vorpal Geo Blades
AF_ARMS_SOL_04.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, PDEF Up, CRIT Up, Chance of PATK Up
Gear Ability: Area attack and then raises own MOVE/JUMP.
AF_ARMS_SOL_04.FLAVOR: These beautiful and deadly twin short swords were designed based on geometric principles. They're extremely keen, but hard for beginners to use. When mastered, however, they boost not only attack power but also movement ability.

AF_ARMS_BASINI_01.NAME: Spinning Blade
AF_ARMS_BASINI_01.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, AGI Up, Chance of AGI Up when evolving to 4★.
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Basheeny (3-hit Dark Phys Dmg (Medium) & ignores DEF when attacking from behind & greatly raises own AGI until next turn [Range: 1, Height Range: 3])
AF_ARMS_BASINI_01.FLAVOR: A certain person gave these twin swords to Basheeny as a present when he was given his first assignment as an apprentice knight. They are engraved with sinister patterns, and designed to unleash their dark power in its entirety when wielded by Basheeny.

AF_ARMO_ARMOR_04.NAME: Armor of Evil-Warding
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_04.EXPR:
Attributes: PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Delay Res Up
Gear Ability: Raises Magic Res of ally units [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_04.FLAVOR: The emblem emblazoned on this suit of armor generates a force field that repels attacks. It is particularly effective against magical attacks, and the bumps in the armor are designed to strengthen it.

AF_ARMO_SHIELD_03.NAME: Glitter Guard
AF_ARMO_SHIELD_03.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, Petrify Res Up
Gear Ability: Raises Slash Res of ally units [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMO_SHIELD_03.FLAVOR: This trapezium-shaped shield was discovered among some ancient ruins. Made using a combination of metal and a faintly-glowing crystal, it grants resistance against Slash attacks to those who possess Alchemia. The metal sections support the crystal parts, and can be repaired if damaged.

AF_ARMS_SPE_02.NAME: Saint's Sacrifice
AF_ARMS_SPE_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Chance of PATK Up
Gear Ability: Absorbs HP from enemy units within target area [Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMS_SPE_02.FLAVOR: This lance may be carried at formal occasions, such as important religious ceremonies. Although grand and lavishly decorated, its design has not sacrificed attack power. Both a divine, holy energy and a sinister and deadly sacrificial energy coexist inside it.

AF_ARMS_SPE_03.NAME: Grace Lancer
AF_ARMS_SPE_03.EXPR: Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, Chance of PDEF Up
AF_ARMS_SPE_03.FLAVOR: This lance may be carried at formal occasions, such as important religious ceremonies. It's an easy weapon for regular lancemen to obtain, and is famed for its usability. It's also popular because it boosts the wielder's defense, increasing his or her chances of survival.

AF_ARMS_HUN_02.NAME: Atomic Jaeger
AF_ARMS_HUN_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, Hit Rate Up, Chance of AGI Down
Gear Ability: Inflicts Phys Dmg on units within target area & interrupts charging [Range: 4, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: Unlimited]
AF_ARMS_HUN_02.FLAVOR: This special bow has been made using only materials that contain a high Alchemia concentration. It's also known as the "One Shot Killer" because it raises not only attack ability but also dexterity and accuracy. Naturally, it requires a high degree of skill to use effectively.

AF_ARMO_GAUNTLET_02.NAME: Belva Gauntlet
AF_ARMO_GAUNTLET_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, PDEF Up, DEX Up
Gear Ability: Greatly raises Strike Res for one turn [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMO_GAUNTLET_02.FLAVOR: This gauntlet has been designed around a "noble wolf" theme. It boosts not only attack and defense ability but also dexterity. As well as the wielder's abilities, it is also able to raise the Strike Res of ally units.

AF_ACCS_NECKLACE_01.NAME: Belva Pendant
AF_ACCS_NECKLACE_01.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, Jewels Obtained Up
Gear Ability: Raises All Elements Res of ally units for three turns [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2]
AF_ACCS_NECKLACE_01.FLAVOR: This pendant has been designed around a "noble wolf" theme. The parts that appear to glow blue are evidence of the high concentration of Alchemia particles inside. By diffusing these particles into the surrounding area, the pendant is able to raise the All Elements Res of all units.

AF_ARMS_ZIN_00.NAME: Eerie Agony Thousand Drop Blade
AF_ARMS_ZIN_00.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of inflicting Daze
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Jin (3-hit Dark Dmg & Poison to single target & raises own AGI until next turn [Range: 5, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_ZIN_00.FLAVOR: This kunai was entrusted to Jin by a young girl called Sen. It sucks blood from foes, which it is then able to convert into Alchemia. Jin takes the trust placed in him by Sen very seriously, and he won't let anyone else touch it.

AF_ARMS_NIN_04.NAME: Jikunai Satsuki
AF_ARMS_NIN_04.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, Jewels Obtained Up, AGI Up, Chance of casting Quicken on self
Gear Ability: Inflicts Dmg on units in area around self & move after attacking [Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2, MOVE Area: Diamond (7)]
AF_ARMS_NIN_04.FLAVOR: This kunai was crafted together with a Chronomancer; its smith's aim was to boost not only its attack power but also its monetary value. If the bearer performs the correct hand sign when using it, it is said to grant the power to control time.

AF_ARMS_NEC_03.NAME: Timestealer Scythe
AF_ARMS_NEC_03.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, AGI Up, Chance of inflicting Stop
Gear Ability: Dmg to units within target area & lowers units' MATK [Range: 4, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMS_NEC_03.FLAVOR: The rope tied around the handle of this scythe has been imbued with a time-stopping spell, and the special knot used means that the weapon will occasionally stop time when used. This powerful spell is said to also be able to lower the magical attack power of enemies.

AF_ARMO_ARMOR_BEGINNER_01.NAME: Moon Star
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_BEGINNER_01.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Auto Heal (Added when evolving to 5★)

AF_ARMO_SHIELD_04.NAME: World Tree Shield
AF_ARMO_SHIELD_04.EXPR:
Attributes: PDEF Up, PATK Up, HP Up
Gear Ability: Can survive fatal damage once only.

AF_ACCS_RING_01.NAME: Ring of the Bright Knight
AF_ACCS_RING_01.EXPR:
Attributes: Max Jewels Up, CRIT Up, Slash Res Up
Gear Ability: Recovers HP of units within target area & reduces Jewels Spent for three turns [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2]

AF_ACCS_RING_02.NAME: Ring Guard - Black Flames
AF_ACCS_RING_02.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, Fire Res Up, Dark Res Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Gear Ability can only be used by Templar units. Ability varies according to unit.)
AF_ACCS_RING_02.FLAVOR: This ring was created using techniques unique to Lost Blue. It raises resistance against Fire and Dark-elemental attacks, but exactly why it does this is unclear. It boosts a range of stats when wielded, but only the members of the Templar know how to use it properly.

AF_ARMS_ARM_03.NAME: Mirage Sword
AF_ARMS_ARM_03.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, MATK Up, Evasion Rate Up, Chance of MOVE +1
Gear Ability (Unlocked when evolving to 5★): Raises Evasion Rate of ally units for three turns [Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMS_ARM_03.FLAVOR: A transparent spiral mark runs up the blade of the slim sword. When swung, the Alchemia in the air makes contact with it and creates a mirage, which is said to boost the bearer's Evasion Rate and occasionally also his or her movement ability.

AF_ARMS_WEA_02.NAME: Umbrella Staff
AF_ARMS_WEA_02.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, LCK Up, Max Jewels Up, Chance of AGI Up
Gear Ability (Unlocked when evolving to 5★): Raises own LCK for three turns & reduces Jewels Spent
AF_ARMS_WEA_02.FLAVOR: The top of this staff is fitted with an umbrella canopy that is imbued with magical energy. It is said that when the bearer shakes the raindrop-shaped ornaments hanging from its tips, it causes a "rain of good fortune" to fall that boosts luck and lowers the amount of Jewels used.

AF_ACCS_ACHA_01.NAME: Restrained Eyepatch
AF_ACCS_ACHA_01.EXPR:
Attributes: AGI Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Strike Damage Up.
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Acht when evolving to 5★ (Inflicts Wind Phys Dmg on units within target area & cancels all buffs/debuff cast on units [Range: 2, Area: Lateral (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ACCS_ACHA_01.FLAVOR: The eyepatch that covers Acht's left eye. It was created by the greatest technological minds in Lost Blue in order to suppress the fearsome power possessed by his artificial eye. When Acht takes it off, this means he is ready to unleash this mighty power.

AF_ARMS_VIER_01.NAME: Silencing Rod
AF_ARMS_VIER_01.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, Slash Res Up
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Vier when evolving to 5★ (4-hit Thunder Mag Dmg [Range: 5, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_VIER_01.FLAVOR: Vier carries this rod in battle. It contains an extremely high concentration of magical energy, but the story behind it has been lost, and no one else knew how to use it, even within Lost Blue. Vier likes that it's mysterious, though...

AF_ARMS_SNI_04.NAME: Overheat Rage
AF_ARMS_SNI_04.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, DEX Up, AGI Up, Chance of AGI Down
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Inflicts non-elemental Missile Dmg on units within target area & raises own Missile ATK for three turns [Range: 5, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 3])
AF_ARMS_SNI_04.FLAVOR: This sniper rifle, which possesses incredible aiming ability, is said to have been designed by an engineer who was also well versed in black magic. A skilled user can temporarily "overheat" the Alchemia contained inside it to unleash a special attack.

AF_ARMS_HUU_02.NAME: Feng Shui White-Silver Board
AF_ARMS_HUU_02.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, LCK Up, HP Up, Chance of casting Quicken on self
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Places a panel that automatically recovers HP [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_HUU_02.FLAVOR: This geomantic board, which possesses large amounts of spiritual energy and good fortune, was created from a special silver with a high Alchemia concentration. The scarcity of this powerful metal means that such boards are rarely seen. Regardless, an inexperienced Geomancer will be unable to make use of its powers effectively.

AF_ARMS_HUU_03.NAME: Feng Shui Red-Brass Board
AF_ARMS_HUU_03.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, HP Up, Chance of inflicting Bind
AF_ARMS_HUU_03.FLAVOR: This geomantic board, which possesses large amounts of spiritual energy and good fortune, was created from a special bronze that contains Alchemia. This metal is widely found around the world, and the board's easy availability and ease-of-use make it a popular choice among Geomancers who are just starting out.

AF_ARMS_S_AMAT_00.NAME: Amaterasu Holy Rod
AF_ARMS_S_AMAT_00.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, LCK Up, AGI Up (Added when evolving to 5★.)
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Amaterasu (Fully recovers HP of ally units within target area & cancels all statuses [Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_S_AMAT_00.FLAVOR: This rod is said to have once been wielded by a mighty god who brought light to the world. The god's divine influence means that it possesses the power to prevent calamity, and guarantees its bearer a life of peace of safety. When wielded by its original owner, it demonstrates its true power...

AF_ARMS_STR_02.NAME: Stem Gauntlet
AF_ARMS_STR_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, PDEF Up, Chance of Quicken (Added when evolving to 5★.)
Gear Ability: Inflicts 3-hit non-elemental Dmg on units within target area [Range: 3, Area: 1 sq line, Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMS_STR_02.FLAVOR: Designed for hand-to-hand fighters, this gauntlet is particular highly prized within Greed Dyke. Legend says that it was worn by a hero who did battle with a holy beast. When used to its full potential it allows the wearer to unleash long-distance pressure attacks.

AF_ARMO_ARMOR_05.NAME: Precious Armor
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_05.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Increases Jewels Spent
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_05.FLAVOR: This cursed armor was the result of inhuman experiments carried out by leading figures in magic, alchemy, and science. It is strong both physically and magically, but in exchange it greatly increases the wearer's energy consumption.

AF_ARMS_POK_EROS_00.NAME: Cupid Bow Eros
AF_ARMS_POK_EROS_00.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, DEX Up, Chance of Hit Rate Up (Added when evolving to 5★.)
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Eros (4-hit Light Missile Dmg (100% Hit) on single target & absorbs part of Dmg inflicted as HP [Range: 5, Height Range: Unlimited])
AF_ARMS_POK_EROS_00.FLAVOR: This bow is said to have been wielded by a goddess of love and sex. It's made from the same Killium as Eros. It is said that when equipped by one who bears the name Eros, the Killium and Alchemia will react with each other and unleash a special power.

AF_ARMS_S_YURI_00.NAME: White-Lily Knife
AF_ARMS_S_YURI_00.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, PDEF Up, AGI Up, Chance of PATK/PDEF Up for two turns (Added when evolving to 5★.)
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Yuri (3-hit Thunder Slash Dmg to single target & greatly raises own PDEF/MDEF until next turn [Range: 1, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_S_YURI_00.FLAVOR: The beauty of this exquisite short sword has been compared to the white lilies of the land of Crimson Summer when in full bloom. A smith from a ninja village is said to have crafted it especially with Yuri in mind, and it possesses both sharp and graceful in equal measure. Only Yuri is able to utilize its full power.

AF_ARMS_KAI_04.NAME: Ocean Espada
AF_ARMS_KAI_04.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, Initial Jewels Up, Chance of PATK Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Straight-line Phys Dmg to target unit & doubles own PATK on following turn [Range: 3, Height Range: 2]
AF_ARMS_KAI_04.FLAVOR: This blue saber was stolen from its original owner by a great and feared pirate. When wielded by one with a strong will, it allows them to make the mighty ocean their ally. When wielded by one who does not possess such mental fortitude, however, it is said that the ocean will swallow him or her up whole...

AF_ACCS_RING_03.NAME: Shine Aqua
AF_ACCS_RING_03.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, Water Res Up, Light Res Up, PDEF Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Absorbs HP from target unit [Range: 4, Height Range: 3])
AF_ACCS_RING_03.FLAVOR: Rings like this are only made in a certain village that looks out across a strait. It is made using an alloy of Light and Water Alchemia, and has been crafted in a whirling, wave-like shape. This gives it a whirlpool-like suction power that steals stamina from enemies when attacking.

AF_ARMS_ZYVA_01.NAME: Charming Twin Blade
AF_ARMS_ZYVA_01.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, CRIT Up, Hit Rate Up, Chance of CRIT Rate Up (Added when evolving to 5★.)
Master Ability unlocked when equipped on Sieba when evolving to 5★ (4-hit Light Slash Dmg (100% Hit) to single target with chance of critical & greatly raises own Hit Rate for three turns [Range: 1, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_ZYVA_01.FLAVOR: Sieba always carries these twin blades into battle with her. She came up with the design herself and had them made to order; their rose design is another example of her longing for the flowers. She cares for the blades carefully every day, doing everything she can to maintain their beautiful shine and keenness.

AF_ARMO_NOIN_01.NAME: Unbreakable Armor
AF_ARMO_NOIN_01.EXPR:
Attributes: PDEF Up, HP Up, AGI Up
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Neun when his job type is "Explosive Master" when evolving to 5★ (Inflicts Dark Strike Dmg to units within target area & raises own AGI for three turns [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMO_NOIN_01.FLAVOR: The leg armor worn by Neun. When he first joined the Templar he would do battle with his legs unguarded, until Sol had this armor made especially for him. He initially turned his nose up at the thought of wearing leg armor, but came around and still wears it to this day.

AF_ARMS_FURY_01.NAME: Hateful Rod
AF_ARMS_FURY_01.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, Max Jewels Up, Evasion Rate Up, Chance of Auto Jewel Regen (Added when evolving to 5★.)
Enables Master Ability when equipped on Fury when evolving to 5★ (Greatly lowers Hit Rate/COMBO of enemy units within target area [Range: 5, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_FURY_01.FLAVOR: Fury carries this rod with her always. She uses it when performing important divinations. The crest adorning its tip was designed by Sol and inspired by Fury.

AF_ARMS_SAM_04.NAME: King of Herrings
AF_ARMS_SAM_04.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, HP Up, DEX Up, Chance of AGI Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Recovers own HP & raises Hit Rate for three turns)
AF_ARMS_SAM_04.FLAVOR: This treasured sword is spoken of in the legends of Wadatsumi. The tales say that its blade is made from the sea itself, solidified, but the details of this are unknown. When wielded it calms the bearer's heart, granting heightened powers of concentration and giving the illusion that time has stopped.

AF_ARMS_BEAST_03.NAME: Indigo Claw
AF_ARMS_BEAST_03.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, HP Up, Chance of MOVE +1
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (After moving, absorbs Jewels & raises PDEF for one turn [Range: 4, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_BEAST_03.FLAVOR: This claw is modeled after an ancient bird that is said to have once inhabited the continent of Babel. It replicates its stronger-than-steel talons and its blue feathers, which would entice foes. When equipped, it grants the a mighty power akin to that of this ancient bird.

AF_ARMO_FUNDOSHI_02.NAME: Pure Gold Mighty Loincloth
AF_ARMO_FUNDOSHI_02.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, AGI Up, Debuff Res Up, LCK Up

AF_ACCS_200CP_01.NAME: Nube Mascot
AF_ACCS_200CP_01.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, All Status Res
AF_ACCS_200CP_01.FLAVOR: This Nube plush toy is surrounded by celebratory flowers. Nube gives off a fragrant aroma together with the flowers, taken from Fairily's family's botanical garden. Thank you for two million downloads!

AF_ARMS_MAD_01.NAME: Revolutionary Tact
AF_ARMS_MAD_01.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, DEX Up, Max Jewels Up, Chance of casting MATK up on self
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Absorbs Jewels from units within target area [Area: Square (3), Height Range: 3])

AF_ARMS_MAD_02.NAME: Melodious Tact
AF_ARMS_MAD_02.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, AGI Up, Chance of casting Auto Heal on self

AF_ARMO_ARMOR_06.NAME: Holy Armored Wall
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_06.EXPR:
Attributes: PDEF Up, MDEF Up, Max Jewels Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Greatly raises own Area Attack Res for one turn)
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_06.FLAVOR: This robe has been passed down through the Old Convent, which has existed since even before the foundation of the Holy Order. Although termed a robe, parts of it are made of plate mail. It's strong against area attacks and can be equipped by any job.

AF_ARMS_SPE_04.NAME: Saint's Bicorn
AF_ARMS_SPE_04.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, AGI Up, CRIT Up, CRIT Rate Up, Hit Rate Up, Chance of PDEF Up for three turns
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Inflicts non-elemental Pierce Dmg & raises own MOVE by 1 for three turns [Range: 4, Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_SPE_04.FLAVOR: This lance is modelled after the horn of a holy beast that is said to have once existed. It's made from metal, but mysteriously, and inexplicably, some people can hear a heartbeat from inside it. When wielded by someone who can hear this heartbeat, it will grant him or her the sacred beast's protection.

AF_ACCS_EARRING_02.NAME: Saint's Meteor
AF_ACCS_EARRING_02.EXPR:
Attributes: AGI Up, LUCK Up, Jewels Obtained Up, Paralyze Res Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Recovers HP of ally units within target area & raises Max HP for three turns & recovers by amount raised [Range: 3, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ACCS_EARRING_02.FLAVOR: This earring is said to bring good fortune. It has been exquisitely crafted from gold, with a gemstone set in its center that is rumored to be a fragment of a star. It is also said to possess healing properties, and its popularity and scarcity means it has come to be sold for a truly "astronomical" price.

AF_ACCS_UNDOKAI2017_01.NAME: Sports Day - Ouroboros Prize
AF_ACCS_UNDOKAI2017_01.EXPR: Attributes: HP Up, PATK Up, MATK Up, AGI Up

AF_ACCS_HOURGLASS_01.NAME: Sephirium Hourglass
AF_ACCS_HOURGLASS_01.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, Hit Rate Up, Fire Res Up
Gear Ability unlocked when equipped on Uzuma (Inflicts 3-hit Wind Mag Dmg on units within target area [Range: 4, Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ACCS_HOURGLASS_01.FLAVOR: This hourglass was the first thing that Miuna the blacksmith ever made for someone else. It's made from a rare material known as Sephirium, and people with an eye for such things are often making Uzuma offers for it. She says she has no intention of letting it go, though.

AF_ARMS_PSI_01.NAME: Kinetic Chain Gauntlet
AF_ARMS_PSI_01.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, MDEF Up, Max Jewels Up Chance of Daze
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Casts Auto Jewel Regen on self & raises MOVE/JUMP by 1 on next turn)
AF_ARMS_PSI_01.FLAVOR: This glove, designed especially for Telekinetic Artists, is made from a special ore that amplifies the user's magical power and transforms it into kinetic energy. It uses an unique and intricate design that makes it possible to temporarily bind foes.

AF_ARMS_PSI_02.NAME: Kinetic Shadow Gauntlet
AF_ARMS_PSI_02.EXPR: Attributes: MATK Up, MDEF Up, Chance of MATK Up
AF_ARMS_PSI_02.FLAVOR: This glove, designed especially for Telekinetic Artists, is made from a special ore that amplifies the user's magical power and transforms it into kinetic energy. It allows the user to unleash special attacks that use his or her own emotions as a catalyst, and as a result can only be used by Telekinetic Artists who can withstand the effects of the conversion mechanism that makes this possible.

AF_ARMS_NIN_05.NAME: Cometic Kunai
AF_ARMS_NIN_05.EXPR:
Attributes: Initial Jewels Up, PATK Up, DEX Up, Chance of Evasion Rate Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Sacrifices own HP and inflicts Phys Dmg on enemy units in square area around self & move after attacking [Range: 1, Height Range: 2, Move Range: Diamond (9)])
AF_ARMS_NIN_05.FLAVOR: This set of twin kunai was created by a blacksmith from Wadatsumi. They are designed to enable graceful, sword dance-like movement during combat. When swung, all that is visible to the naked eye is their comet-like trail through the air, which is the source of their name.

AF_ACCS_DOLL_02.NAME: Halloween Ratty
AF_ACCS_DOLL_02.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, DEX Up, CRIT Rate Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Inflicts Confuse (greatly raises PATK & greatly lowers PDEF) on target unit [Range: 3, Height Range: 2])
