AF_ACCS_DOLL_02.FLAVOR: This plush toy depicts a Ratty who's really enjoying Halloween. When it detects that someone doesn't have any candy ready for Halloween, a mysterious built-in function that plays infuriating pranks on that person is activated.

AF_ARMO_HAT_01.NAME: Stellar Mage Hat
AF_ARMO_HAT_01.EXPR:
Attributes: MDEF Up, Hit Rate Up, Silence Res Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Raises own Mag Dmg for three turns)
AF_ARMO_HAT_01.FLAVOR: Hanging from this elegant mage's hat is a fragment of a star. The magical energy stored in it seeps out into the surrounding area, protecting the wearer from danger. In addition, it gives off a glow that calms the mind and boosts concentration.

AF_ACCS_CLOCK_01.NAME: Wonder Chronos
AF_ACCS_CLOCK_01.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, AGI Up, Delay Res Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Casts Quicken on self and target ally unit [Range: 3, Height Range: 2])
AF_ACCS_CLOCK_01.FLAVOR: This pocket watch is said to possess the ability to alter the flow of time itself. Changing the position of its magical energy-infused hands activates a mechanism that allows the bearer to move with such agility that time seems to have stopped.

AF_ARMS_TEM_02.NAME: Sunblade Prometheus
AF_ARMS_TEM_02.EXPR:
Attributes: PATK Up, MATK Up, Max Jewels Up, Chance of Jewels Spent Down
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Inflicts Light Phys Dmg on units in area around self & nullifies debuffs/statuses inflicted on self for three turns [Area: Diamond (5), Height Range: 2])
AF_ARMS_TEM_02.FLAVOR: This magnificent one-handed sword is emblazoned with a sun motif. Its blade is engraved with channels that conduct magical energy, boosting the efficiency of the wielder's magic. A highly coveted weapon among those who use combat styles that combine swords and magic.

AF_ACCS_BRACELET_02.NAME: Solar Bracelet
AF_ACCS_BRACELET_02.EXPR:
Attributes: MATK Up, MDEF Up, PATK Up for Light units
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Inflicts Mag Dmg & Knockback on units in area around self [Area: Cross (3), Height Range: 2])
AF_ACCS_BRACELET_02.FLAVOR: This golden bracelet is engraved with a sun motif. When Alchemia is channeled into it and then released, this creates an explosion that sends nearby foes flying. The amount of light it emits changes according to the amount of Alchemia that the wearer possesses.

AF_ARMO_ARMOR_07.NAME: Dragon-God Battledress
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_07.EXPR:
Attributes: HP Up, Max Jewels Up, Bind Res Up, Daze Res Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Doubles own Pierce ATK/PDEF for one turn)
AF_ARMO_ARMOR_07.FLAVOR: This light-weight shield is made partly from the scales of a dragon. The dragon's powerful life force still lingers in them, and this has the effect of allowing the bearer to fight for extended periods of time. They also grant a lightness of movement that weakens the effect of binding attacks.

AF_ACCS_NECKLACE_02.NAME: Legion-God Necklace
AF_ACCS_NECKLACE_02.EXPR:
Attributes: AGI Up, CRIT Rate Up, DEX Up
Gear Ability unlocked when evolving to 5★ (Raises Slash Res/Strike Res for three turns after appearing on map)
AF_ACCS_NECKLACE_02.FLAVOR: This necklace is set with a crystal that was once used in a faraway land as part of a prayer ritual dedicated to a war-god. The prayers imbued in it grant the wearer superhuman agility, and it is highly prized for its victory-bringing properties.

AF_ACCS_GL_CRYSTALROSE.NAME: Blue Crystal Rose
AF_ACCS_GL_CRYSTALROSE.EXPR: MDEF Up, Water Res UP,  Jewels Obtained Up. Unlocks Water of Lore, when equipped on Selena (Casts Auto Heal on self)
AF_ACCS_GL_CRYSTALROSE.FLAVOR: A magical blue rose, with unknown powers. It has been seen worn by a young maiden on her head, and brings calm to the people around her.

JB_RAN_TYPE_AVOID.NAME: Ranger [Falcon]
JB_RAN_TYPE_AVOID.CHARADESC:
[Strong vs airborne] Sniping Shot/Hunter's Eyes
[Strong vs monsters] Scouting Shot

JB_RAN_TYPE_MONS.NAME: Ranger [Lupus]
JB_RAN_TYPE_MONS.CHARADESC:
[Strong vs airborne] Sniping Shot/Hunter's Eyes
[Strong vs monsters] Hound Shot
[Strong vs beasts] Cerberos Rain

JB_RAN_TYPE_JEWELDAMEGE.NAME: Ranger [Serpent]
JB_RAN_TYPE_JEWELDAMEGE.CHARADESC:
[Strong vs airborne] Sniping Shot/Hunter's Eyes
[Strong vs monsters] Scouting Shot

JB_BLA_TYPE_TK_MONS.NAME: Martial Master [Beast]
JB_BLA_TYPE_TK_MONS.CHARADESC:
[Strong vs monsters] Anti-Demon Lance
[Strong vs beasts] Beeline Beast-Destroyer
[Strong vs humans] Burial Gun

JB_BLA_TYPE_TK_HUMAN.NAME: Martial Master [Survivor]
JB_BLA_TYPE_TK_HUMAN.CHARADESC:
[Strong vs humans] Funeral Gun/Beeline Man-Breaker
[Strong vs machines] Destructive Palm
[Strong vs monsters] Ogre-Slaying Spear

JB_BLA_TYPE_TK_MECHA.NAME: Martial Master [Dark Tinker]
JB_BLA_TYPE_TK_MECHA.CHARADESC:
[Strong vs machines] Anti-Tech Palm/Beeline Mech-Crusher
[Strong vs monsters] Ogre-Slaying Spear
[Strong vs humans] Burial Gun

JB_ROSA_ANK_WEP.NAME: Rosa Winter Holiday Dark Knight Equipment Set

IT_UG_APRIL_COIN.NAME: Gem of Experience
IT_UG_APRIL_COIN.EXPR: A cube that raises a unit's EXP (huge amount).
IT_UG_APRIL_COIN.FLAVOR: Often mistaken for its more well-known cousin, this crystal cube is imbued with the memories of Alchemists that can be used to grant experience to its user.

IT_US_APRIL_TEARS.NAME: Vial of Tears
IT_US_APRIL_TEARS.EXPR: Medicine that recovers a unit's HP (large amount).
IT_US_APRIL_TEARS.FLAVOR: A phial of miracle dew that is said to be a drink of the gods that can instantly heal any wound. The liquid is also noted to have a salty aftertaste.

IT_US_APRIL_SALT.NAME: Salt Salve
IT_US_APRIL_SALT.FLAVOR: Salt is a natural remedy for many ailments. In this world, salt is a prized commodity that is created every time the Door of Truth is opened.

SUMMER_MISSION_3_04.NAME: [Dilga's Manliness Lessons] To real men, your strongest enemies are your greatest friends!

RECORD_2016SEP_1_01.NAME: [Chloe's Full Moon Bun Plan] First of all I need to use this powder to get everyone in the mood...

RECORD_2016SEP_1_02.NAME: [Chloe's Full Moon Bun Plan] I've heard that lizard meat is a stimulant, actually...

RECORD_2016SEP_1_03.NAME: [Chloe's Full Moon Bun Plan] If I put this in, maybe Vettel will become faster, too...

RECORD_2016SEP_1_04.NAME: [Chloe's Full Moon Bun Plan] This twig looks like it's full of nutrition!

RECORD_2016SEP_1_05.NAME: [Chloe's Full Moon Bun Plan] I'll let them sleep in these pots...

RECORD_2016SEP_1_06.NAME: [Chloe's Full Moon Bun Plan] Finish them off with some gold powder to make them sparkle!

RECORD_2016SEP_2_01.NAME: [Flamel in the Fall] On these long fall nights, I feel like reading a good book...

RECORD_2016SEP_2_02.NAME: [Flamel in the Fall] Look at all the fresh apples!

RECORD_2016SEP_2_03.NAME: [Flamel in the Fall] I'm cold...I wish I had a thick hat.

RECORD_2016SEP_2_04.NAME: [Flamel in the Fall] Try pottery in the place where the moving flowers bloom!

RECORD_2016SEP_2_05.NAME: [Flamel in the Fall] Hunt down the rats that are ruining the crops!

RECORD_2016SEP_2_06.NAME: [Flamel in the Fall] I wonder what the people who live deep in the woods are like...

RECORD_2016SEP_2_0７.NAME: [Flamel in the Fall] Le niveau de la foret de Sherman a 10

RECORD_2016SEP_3_0１.NAME: Lofia "We need money to buy ingredients..."

RECORD_2016SEP_3_02.NAME: Lamia "I want to put apples in the cake, too!"

RECORD_2016SEP_3_03.NAME: Shayna "I found a colorful flower! Can we put it in, too?"

RECORD_2016SEP_3_04.NAME: Shayna "That Ratty's trying to steal some! Time to exterminate it!"

RECORD_2016SEP_3_05.NAME: Lofia "Now, a magic spell to make it tasty... Sugar Power!"

RECORD_2016SEP_3_06.NAME: Lamia "Treasure your memories together with us."

RECORD_2016OCT_2_02.NAME: Now it's time for the athletes to take the oath of fair play!

RECORD_2016OCT_2_03.NAME: Student-master teamwork from Dilga and Fraise in the giant ball race!

RECORD_2016OCT_2_04.NAME: All-out strength? Leave it to us! Lambert and Gane in the Ratty ball-toss!

RECORD_2016OCT_2_05.NAME: All eyes are on Shayna and Elizabeth in the ladies' jousting match!

RECORD_2016OCT_2_06.NAME: Emotions are running high! Vettel and Chloe in the three-legged race!

RECORD_2016NOV_2_01.NAME: Burn the end of the beginning into your memory!

RECORD_2016NOV_2_03.NAME: Witness the fate of the Land of Sloth!

RECORD_2016NOV_2_04.NAME: Prepare for a journey to a new land!

RECORD_2016NOV_2_05.NAME: Witness the beginning of a new story!

RECORD_2016NOV_2_07.NAME: Just how powerful is the new protagonist, Lisbeth?

RECORD_2016NOV_2_08.NAME: Cowardly terrorism will not be forgiven!

RECORD_2016NOV_3_01.NAME: Equip yourself so that person will find you!

RECORD_2016NOV_3_02.NAME: Show what a shrewd shopper you are!

RECORD_2016NOV_3_03.NAME: Sometimes it's important to rely on others, too!

RECORD_2016NOV_3_04.NAME: Grow stronger so that you can accept my love!

RECORD_2016NOV_3_05.NAME: I want the two of us to get through this by ourselves!
